A&O Copenhagen Norrebro is close to Norrebro Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Copenhagen and its surrounding areas. Those staying at the property can also easily discover nearby attractions, such as Nyhavn, University of Copenhagen and Rundetaarn.Revato

name: Andersen Boutique Hotel
description: Set in the trendy Vesterbro district, this boutique hotel is just 200 m from Copenhagen Central Station. It offers modern, design rooms with LED TVs and free Wi-Fi. Andersen Boutique Hotel provides stylish rooms with décor by award-winning company Designers Guild. Each room has soundproofed windows, a shower and Molton Brown toiletries. All feature a minibar, desk and safe. Vesterbro is a great choice for travellers interested in shopping, food and museums.#The property will be going through renovation works from Sun 01 Jan 2017 until Fri 07 Apr 2017. During this period, guests may experience some noise or light disturbances, and some hotel facilities and services may not be available.Expedia

name: Cph Hotel
description: Next to the trendy Kødbyen district, CPH Hotel is less than 1 km from City Hall Square. All rooms have cable TV and free WiFi. The Scandinavian-style rooms at CPH Hotel have wooden floors and light, spacious bathrooms with hair dryers. Room furnishings include a work desk and an armchair. Guests can enjoy breakfast at the outdoor terrace during the summer months. Tivoli Gardens and Copenhagen Central Station are a 4-minute walk from the hotel. Copenhagen International Airport is 20 minutes from the hotel by train.

name: Hotel Mayfair
description: Hotel Mayfair is located only 5 minutes from Copenhagen Central Station, so whether you take the train or taxi from the airport you are greeted at the reception 20 minutes later.Regardless of the room you book, itll meet your most important needs. Take off your shoes and relax on the bed, or connect to our Google Chromecast to stream your own content. Should you prefer a livelier setting, you can settle in our cozy lounge or sunny courtyard. At Hotel Mayfair we enjoy a good breakfast, thats why our new breakfast buffet is focused on organic, homemade & healthy products. You can expect creamy scrambled eggs, fresh juice, crispy bacon, high quality cold cuts and of course coffee. We also work with a local bakery, so we always have freshly baked sourdough bread ready for you in the morning.With our location at inner Vesterbro, youre a short walk from top restaurants, Tivoli and the popular Meatpacking district which is full of places to eat, art galleries and bars. We are always more than happy to help with recommendations and reservations.iHotelier/iStay

name: Copenhagen Downtown Hostel
description: Only a 5 minute’ walk from City Hall Square and Tivoli Gardens, This 24-hour hostel offers a popular bar with occasional live music. Copenhagen Downtown’s fresh, simple rooms have either private or shared bathroom facilities. Bed linen is included. Most rooms overlook the small square, Vandkunsten. Luggage storage is available in hostel for a small fee. Guests can relax in the lounge, or join in on free walking tours that are organized twice a day. Downtown Copenhagen is just 500 metres from the main shopping street, Strøget. Copenhagen Central Station is 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Coco Hotel
description: Coco Hotel is Copenhagen's newest sustainable boutique hotel located in the heart of Vesterbro.The hotel is best described as a small Parisian style hotel curated with a Danish sense of space and time. The interior is a mix between the modern and classic, vintage and new. Coco is designed to make you want to stay and never leave.Surrounding a green and serene courtyard, the hotel's 90 rooms are designed to make you feel welcome and comfortable whether you are staying for business or pleasure.Coco Hotel is centrally located in the heart of Vesterbro. From our doorstep, you have easy access to all of the city by foot, bicycle, public transportation or car.Hungry? Make sure you visit Caf Coco in our ground floor. Come mingle with the locals and let us take good care of you.iHotelier/iStay

name: Woodah Hostel
address: 1 Abel Cathrines Gade, 1654 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Located in Copenhagen’s Vesterbro district, this hostel offers an in-house bar and café, as well as rooms with free Wi-Fi access. Copenhagen Central Station is 5 minutes’ walk away. Bed linen is included in all Woodah Hostel rooms. Bathroom facilities are shared. Guests can relax in the outdoor seating area. The bar serves chirashi sushi bowls, wine, beer, sake, Danish pastries as well as coffee and tea. A breakfast based on organic products is served every morning. Snacks, drinks and fruit can be bought in the café, and baggage storage is included. Several restaurants and shops are found in the surrounding area. Tivoli Amusement Park is a 7-minute walk from the hostel. The property offers a concierge for tailor made recommendations and help with reservations.

name: Hotel Christian IV
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Copenhagen. It also offers a coffee bar, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. The rooms have bottled water, a flat-screen TV and a desk. Guests of Hotel Christian IV can relax at the on-site bar, suitably situated for socialising in the evening. Guests can also try one of the various bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. Christian IV Hotel Copenhagen is conveniently situated for discovering Copenhagen with Kongens Nytorv and Rundetaarn within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit University of Copenhagen, Church of Our Lady and Nyhavn.Revato

name: Kurhotel Skodsborg
description: Kurhotel Skodsborg offers two restaurants on site and free parking. The spa features a sauna and hot tub. A wide range of massage, spa and beauty treatments can also be booked. Copenhagen is just a 20 minutes' drive away. At Kurhotel Skodsborg, all rooms include a TV, seating area and private bathroom. WiFi is free. The sea-view restaurant offers modern Nordic fine dining with seasonal ingredients, herbs from the garden and freshly-baked breads. The comprehensive wine list completes the dining experience. The Brasserie offers more casual dining yet still focused on local produce. In the lobby, guests can take a coffee break, browse the reading collection or simply relax. Bicycles can be rented on site. Skodsborg Strand Park is 250 metres away. Skodsborg Station is a 10-minute walk from Skodsborg Kurhotel.

name: Bedwood Hostel
description: Nyhavn63 welcomes guests to experience Nyhavn in a truly unique way through their double luxury sleep cabins. The establishment offers luxurious accommodations with all the amenities one could wish for. Each cabin provides room for two people, ensuring complete privacy. Access to the cabins is granted through a personal code, providing a sense of safety and security. It is worth noting that the pricing is specified for two individuals, allowing guests to share both the experience and costs. The family-run capsule hotel, Nyhavn63, takes pride in its exceptional location in Copenhagen. Situated in the most captivating tourist area alongside the canals, where historic wooden ships dock, visitors can enjoy breathtaking views and immerse themselves in a charming atmosphere. Guests can indulge in an authentic Danish experience by staying in a historic property dating back to 1756. The outdoor courtyard offers a tranquil space to unwind and enjoy serenity, while the bar provides a diverse selection of high-quality products that will tantalize taste buds. As the only and first capsule hotel in Copenhagen, Nyhavn63 is housed within a unique historic Danish building at the heart of Nyhavn. Guests can relish the perfect blend of traditional charm and modern comfort and convenience during their stay.

name: Annex Copenhagen
description: Located in the trendy Vesterbro district, the Annex Copenhagen provides good-value accommodation only 400 metres from Tivoli Gardens and Copenhagen Central Station. Restaurants, shops and popular nightclubs are just steps away. The colourful rooms of Annex Copenhagen include Fatboy loungers and a flat-screen TV. Bathroom facilities are shared. Nearby attractions include the City Hall Square and Strøget, the longest pedestrian shopping street in Europe, both of which are about 10 minutes’ walk away. Staff at Annex Copenhagen will gladly suggest further places to visit.

name: a&o Copenhagen Sydhavn
description: Located in Copenhagen and with Tivoli Gardens reachable within 3.6 km, a&o Copenhagen Sydhavn provides a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. The property is set 3.7 km from Frederiksberg Slot, 3.8 km from Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek and 3.8 km from Danish Royal Library. Private parking is available on site. Rooms come complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, while certain rooms at the hostel also offer a seating area. Guest rooms include bed linen. Continental and vegetarian breakfast options are available daily at a&o Copenhagen Sydhavn. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Danish, German and English. Copenhagen Central Station is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Bella Center is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 12 km from a&o Copenhagen Sydhavn.

name: Go Hotel City Apartments
description: Situated 700 metres from Amager Strandpark, Go Hotel City Apartments features accommodation with a bar, a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is providedthroughout the property. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and kitchenware are also available, as well as a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy cycling and hiking nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Kastrup Søbad Beach is 2.8 km from Go Hotel City Apartments, while Church of Our Saviour is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Dragor Hotel & Apartments
description: This waterfront hotel is in Dragør’s historic centre, 12 km from central Copenhagen. It offers free Wi-Fi and parking. All apartments have a 32-inch flat-screen TV and a shared terrace. Dishwashers, electric cookers and tea/coffee facilities are standard features at Dragør Apartments. All apartments have a private entrance, and some provide harbour views. The courtyard garden offers seating areas and BBQ equipment. A traditional Danish restaurant is also found on site. Plaice, pork and steak tartare are just some of its dishes. Copenhagen International Airport is just 6 km from Dragør Hotel & Apartments.

name: Hotel d'Angleterre
description: Rooms Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 92 guestrooms, featuring heated floors and LCD televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a 24-hour health club, an indoor pool, and a steam room. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Copenhagen? This hotel has facilities measuring 8159 square feet (758 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location D'Angleterre, Copenhagen is centrally located in Copenhagen, a 2-minute walk from Nyhavn and 9 minutes by foot from Rosenborg Castle. This 5-star hotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Amalienborg Palace and 1 mi (1.6 km) from City Hall Square. Dining Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately DKK 350 for adults and DKK 175 for children Covered self parking fee: DKK 650 per day Covered valet parking fee: DKK 650 per day Rollaway bed fee: DKK 500.0 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at anytime The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measuresViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hotel Atlantic
description: Hotel Atlantic is centrally located by the waterfront in Aarhus just a short walk from the central station. Close to the hotel, youll find the large city library and culture centre, DOKK1, Den Gamle By (The Old Town), Latinerkvarteret, Aarhus Street Food and good shopping and restaurants. Start your day with our complimentary breakfast on the top floor and enjoy views of Aarhus city or the harbour. You can even spot The Rainbow on top of Aros Art Museum. Feel at home in our 102 modern and comfortable rooms, each offering great views as well. Relax with a Danish beer in the lobby bar. Hotel Atlantic is your perfect base to explore Aarhus.iHotelier/iStay

name: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel, Aarhus
address: Thomas Jensens Alle 1, Aarhus, Central Jutland
description: Conveniently situated, Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Aarhus offers easy access to Aarhus's popular hot spots. The numerous facilities this modern hotel has to offer include a coffee bar, an executive floor and a 24-hour reception. Rooms at Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel provide a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. Each have an in-room safe, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Aarhus's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and is a convenient place for those who want to stay close to everything the property has to offer. A selection of cafés and restaurants can also be found in close proximity to the property. Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel is close to Arhus Central Station, making it easy for guests to explore Aarhus and its surrounding areas. Aarhus Cathedral and Aarhus City Hall are within walking a distance.Revato

name: Comwell Aarhus
description: Set in Aarhus city centre, Comwell Aarhus Dolce by Wyndham has its own restaurant and 2 fitness centres. Wi-Fi is free. Bruuns Galleri Shopping Centre is 100 metres away, while Aarhus Train Station is 600 metres away. Rooms will provide you with a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and desk. Each has a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. At Comwell Aarhus Dolce by Wyndham, you will find a bar and 24-hour front desk. There is also a large outdoor terrace. Other services include a lounge and dry cleaning. Aarhus Airport is 45 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Villa Provence
description: Situated by Aarhus’ canal area, 5 minutes’ walk from Aarhus Train Station, this elegant yet intimate boutique hotel offers a popular breakfast with French delicacies. Wi-Fi is free throughout the premises. All the individually designed rooms at Villa Procence have a flat-screen TV and luxury toiletries by Molton Brown. Some also include a seating area. Guests can relax with a drink in Villa Provence’s café or in the cosy cobblestone courtyard with tall lime trees and fountains. A French-inspired breakfast is served each morning. Hotel Villa Provence’s central location provides easy access to shopping, dining and culture. Aarhus Cathedral, dating back to the 12th-century, is just 300 metres away.

name: Hotel Royal
description: This luxury hotel is set in an elegant, Neoclassical building built in 1838. It offers a casino. ARoS Art Museum is 15 minutes’ walk away. Hotel Royal’s impressive interior features stained glass windows, 300 art pieces and glass chandeliers. All rooms have antique furniture, a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee facilities. Breakfast is available every day. Royal Hotel is 300 metres from Skolebakken Train Station and Aarhus Harbour.

name: Book1 By Brøchner Hotels
description: BOOK1 Design Hostel features a restaurant, bar and a shared lounge located at Mølleparken in Aarhus. Around 700 metres from Aarhus City Hall, the property is also 1 km from Aarhus Central Train Station and offers free WiFi. The accommodation occasionally provides evening entertainment. An organic buffet breakfast is available daily at the hostel. Popular points of interest near BOOK1 Design Hostel include ARoS Aarhus Art Museum, Den Gamle By, the Botanical Garden, Aarhus Cathedral and The Latin Quarter. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Scandic The Mayor
description: Conveniently situated, Scandic The Mayor allows for easy access to Aarhus's best hot spots. It has a gym, as well as free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a sauna. Scandic The Mayor features rooms equipped with a shower, a hair dryer and a flat-screen TV. They feature an in-room closet, a desk and a private bathroom. Scandic The Mayor's in-house restaurant, GÄST, is a popular spot to enjoy a meal. A selection of dining options are also found in the surrounding area. Aarhus's attractions, including the ARoS Aarhus Art Museum, the Viking Museum and Danske Commodities, are within easy walking distance of Scandic The Mayor. Arhus Central Station is just a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Scandic Aarhus City
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Aarhus. It is close to Aarhus City Hall, eateries and shops. Scandic Aarhus City has sweeping city views, plus free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a 24-hour reception. Guests can exercise in the fitness centre, or rent a bicycle and discover the surroundings. The luxurious feel of each room at Scandic Aarhus City is complemented by facilities such as flat-screen TVs. They each offer a private bathroom, an in-room safe and a desk. Those staying at Scandic City Aarhus can indulge in a drink at Lobby Bar, before savouring a meal at Restaurant L'ost. A generous buffet breakfast is on offer every morning. The hotel is ideally located for discovering Aarhus with Aarhus Cathedral within walking distance. Guests can also visit Danske Commodities and the ARoS Aarhus Art Museum.Revato

name: Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby
description: Set in Aarhus, 32 km from Memphis Mansion, Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 5 km from Steno Museum. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Buffet and continental breakfast options are available every morning at Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby. Aarhus Natural History Museum is 5 km from the accommodation, while Aarhus University is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 36 km from Zleep Hotel Aarhus Skejby.

name: Sofs Boutique Hotel
description: This intimate boutique hotel is ideally situated in central Aarhus's Latin Quarter. University Park and Skolebakken Train Station are both about 10 minutes' walk away. It offers free WiFi, a charming garden and uniquely decorated rooms. Each has a TV as well as organic soaps, creams and shampoos. Some rooms have a work desk. Guests can start their day with a satisfying organic breakfast, which can be ordered in advance or upon arrival. Bicycles can then be rented on site to explore the surroundings. Den Gamle By, The Old Town, an open air museum of Denmark’s historic buildings, is 1 km away. Aarhus Hospital is a 10-minute walk away. Hotel staff will gladly recommend other area attractions, restaurants and designer shops.

name: Milling Hotel Ritz Aarhus City
description: Set in a 1930s building, this boutique hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Aarhus Train Station and airport shuttle buses. Hotel Ritz Aarhus City offers free WiFi and a steakhouse restaurant with a wine cellar. Parking is available. Flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and writing desks are standard features at Hotel Ritz. Each room is decorated in a art decor style and has a modern bathroom. The in-house MASH restaurant serves chunky steaks as well as grilled lobster, fish and chicken. Hotel Ritz is 5 minutes’ walk from the Scandinavian Congress Center.

name: Radisson Red Aarhus
description: Radisson RED Aarhus has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Aarhus. This property is set a short distance from attractions such as Aarhus Art Building, Aarhus Cathedral, and Steno Museum. The property is non-smoking and is situated 36 km from Memphis Mansion. All rooms are fitted with a TV with cable channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms have a private bathroom, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while selected rooms also boast a terrace and some have city views. At the hotel each room has bed linen and towels. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Radisson RED Aarhus. Guests can enjoy playing billiards and table tennis, or take advantage of the business centre. Speaking Danish, German, English and Norwegian at the reception, staff are always at hand to help. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include ARoS Aarhus Art Museum, Aarhus City Hall and Train Station Arhus. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 38 km from Radisson RED Aarhus.

name: Scandic Aarhus Vest
description: Ideally located in Aarhus, the hotel provides modern accommodation an easy drive from Aarhus University. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. This 4-star hotel provides a 24-hour reception, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. It is pet-friendly and has free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. All the rooms at Scandic Aarhus Vest provide an in-room closet and blackout curtains. There are also a number of rooms specially designed for families. Providing Mediterranean and local cuisine, Scandic Aarhus Vest's relaxed restaurant is an ideal dining option for guests who wish to to enjoy a meal close to their accommodation. In the evening, guests are able to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Scandic Aarhus Vest is within walking distance of Bazar Vest. Aarhus Cathedral and Aarhus City Hall are within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Cabinn Aarhus
description: This hotel is located in central Aarhus and just a 3-minute walk from Aarhus Harbour. It offers free WiFi and in-room tea/coffee facilities. Aarhus Central Station is 900 metres away. The compact rooms at Cabinn Aarhus have cable TV channels and private bathrooms with showers. During warmer weather, guests can enjoy city views while having breakfast. Fruit, snacks and sandwiches are available at the 24-hour reception. Staff can help with travel directions or offer tips on local restaurants, bars and attractions. The 13th-century Aarhus Cathedral is Denmark’s tallest and is found directly opposite Cabinn Aarhus Hotel.

name: Helnan Marselis Hotel
description: Overlooking Aarhus Bay and the Kattegat Sea, this hotel has a fitness area, sauna, small indoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Helnan Marselis Hotels rooms are located in the main building or in an annex. Each has a TV and private bathroom. Tivoli Friheden amusement park is 2.2 km away. Helnan Marselis Hotel is 15 minutes walk from Marselisborg Castle and 10 minutes drive from Aarhus city centre.

name: Hotel Oasia Aarhus City
description: At Hotel Oasia, BW Signature Collection in Aarhus, the main priority is quality and service. Here you can sit back and enjoy the elegant and discreet luxury that forms the framework of everything in the hotel. Everything is carefully selected to give you the best experience possible. The hotel's interior design is characterized by clean lines and Nordic design - with a focus on aesthetics and functionality. The hotel is furnished with designer furniture from some of the largest designers in the Nordic region. In the rooms you will find custom-made Montana furniture, Hastens beds, Bang & Olufsen TVs and telephones as well as lounge chairs from Theselius and Kjaeholm. If you come to explore Aarhus - the city of smiles, then Hotel Oasia, BW Signature Collection is the ideal starting point. The hotel is located just a few hundred meters from ARoS Aarhus Art Museum, Musikhuset and Scandinavian Center. Within walking distance are the market town museum Den Gamle By, The Cathedral, Vor Frue Church and The Women Museum. If you bring a car, you can in a few minutes go on a trip to the Memorial Park with the Queen's summer residence Marselisborg Castle. In both the north and south of the city are forests and beaches, and in the Marselisborg forests south of Aarhus you will find the Moesgaard Museum with the 2000-year-old Grauballe Man.bestwestern.com

name: Den Gamle Kro Hornslet
description: Located in Hornslet, 30 km from Memphis Mansion, Den Gamle Kro Hornslet provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Providing a bar, the property is located within 23 km of Djurs Sommerland. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a free shuttle service. At the hotel, each room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with a garden view. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. Den Gamle Kro Hornslet offers a buffet or gluten-free breakfast. Steno Museum is 23 km from the accommodation, while Aarhus Natural History Museum is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Aarhus Airport, 18 km from Den Gamle Kro Hornslet.

name: Scandic Roskilde Park
description: Located a short stroll from Roskilde Railway Station, the hotel offers guests an ideal base when visiting Roskilde. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a sauna and a playground. This 4-star hotel provides meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and luggage storage. There is also free public parking on site for guests travelling with a car. Rooms have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. They all feature a desk, ironing facilities and heating. Scandic Roskilde Park houses a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind of an evening. For those preferring to dine out, the surrounding area features a number of bars and restaurants with a range of different cuisines. Scandic Roskilde Park is close to the area's well-known tourist attractions, nightlife and shops, and FC Roskilde is within walking distance. Roskilde Cathedral is in close proximity to the property.Revato

name: Comwell Roskilde
description: Boasting views of the Roskilde Fjord, Comwell Roskilde offers free parking and rooms with cable TV and WiFi access. Roskilde city centre is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Seasonal dishes based on fresh produce accompanied by selected wines are served at Comwell Roskilde’s restaurant. Drinks are available in the hotel bar, featuring a terrace with fjord views. Leisure facilities include table football, billiards and a fitness room. The area offers great opportunities for jogging and bicycling. The property has several cosy terraces, pavilions and patios. A bus stop with connections to Roskilde city centre is situated 500 metres away. The Viking Ship Museum is 2 km from the hotel.

name: Taastrup Park Hotel
description: Taastrup Park Hotel, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western is situated centrally between Roskilde and Copenhagen, not far from the motorway. The hotel has its own free car park and is located just a two-minute walk from Taastrup Station, restaurants and shops. The comfortable rooms and delicious breakfast buffet keep our guests coming back again and again.bestwestern.com

name: Quality Hotel Hoje Taastrup
address: Carl Gustavs Gade 1, 2630 Hoje Taastrup, Capital Region
description: This hotel, 300 metres away from Høje Taastrup Station, is within 10 minutes’ walk of City 2 Shopping Centre and a 20-minute train ride from Copenhagen Central Station. Guest rooms at Thon Partner Hotel Høje Taastrup feature modern décor and a TV with satellite channels. Each also has a private bathroom with bathtub and shower. Free in-room WiFi is included. Guests can relax and mingle in the hotel bar. Other facilities include a garden, a games room and a small library. Ishøj Golf Center is about 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: Milling Hotel Plaza
description: This historic Odense hotel is opposite the Kongens Have Park and 300 metres from the Central Station. It offers a gym and solarium and free WiFi, films and hot beverages. Hotel Plaza was built in 1919. Each guest room includes a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a free weekday newspaper. Guests are served free fruit and afternoon cookies. The 24-hour reception sells snacks and other items. Nearby attractions include the Brandts Klaedefabrik Museum, which is 800 metres from Hotel Plaza. The H.C. Andersen Museum is less than 15 minutes’ stroll away.

name: First Hotel Grand Odense
description: First Hotel Grand is perfectly located in central Odense. Established in 1897, the hotels rich history and classical atmosphere blend wonderfully with the modern facilities. With 135 classic rooms and conference facilities for 160 people, the hotel is a great choice for conferences, events, business travellers, active weekends and romantic getaways.Start your day with a grand breakfast before exploring Hans Christian Andersens fairy-tale city. Come back to the hotel and indulge in Danish Smrrebrd or tickle your taste buds at Restaurant Grand. Unwind in the bar with an extravagant drink.At First Hotel Grand in Odense, we have an eye for detail and strive to give you a personal experience beyond your expectations.Welcome to Odense!iHotelier/iStay

name: Milling Hotel Windsor
description: This hotel is in the heart of Odense, 100 metres from Kongens Have Park and 5 minutes’ walk from Odense Central Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, films and hot beverages. Each guest room at Hotel Windsor has a work desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Free fruit and afternoon cookies are offered, while Windsor’s 24-hour reception sells snacks and other items. A free communal internet computer is available in the lobby. Guests enjoy free access to the gym and solarium at Hotel Plaza, which is located within 5 minutes’ walk of Windsor Hotel. The Hans Christian Andersen Museum is less than 15 minutes’ stroll from Hotel Windsor. Brandts Klaedefabrik Museum is 800 metres away.

name: Milling Hotel Ansgar
description: Hotel Ansgar is within 5 minutes’ walk of Odense Central Station and the Kongensgade shopping street. It offers free WiFi, films and hot beverages. All guest rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some also include a seating area. The 24-hour reception sells drinks, snacks and other items, and free fruit is available at all times. Each afternoon, guests are served free afternoon coffee, cookies and snacks. Other facilities include a summer playroom for children and a free internet terminal. In addition, Ansgar’s guests enjoy free access to the gym and solarium at Hotel Plaza, less than 100 metres away. Guests can relax with a walk in the nearby Rosenborg Castle Gardens. Hans Christian Andersen Museum is less than 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: City Hotel Nattergalen
address: Hans Mules Gade 5, 5000 Odense, South Denmark
description: Ideally located in a central yet quiet Odense district, this hotel offers a nice breakfast, has free fiber Wi-Fi and a roof terrace with panoramic city views. Odense Station is 8 minutes’ walk and the ODEON conference- and culture centre just a 3-minute walk away. City Hotel Nattergalen's modern guest rooms have simple yet comfortable furnishings. All include a TV, a work desk and a private bathroom with shower. Just a couple of minutes' walk from the main building is the hotel’s cosy restaurant, Den Gamle Kro. It is located in a half-timbered house from 1683 and has traditional décor with wooden paneling. After playing pool or dart in City Hotel’s games room, guests can relax by the fireplace in the lounge, where free hot drinks are available. Dining, culture, shopping and recreation are all within walking distance.

name: Hotel Odeon
description: Hotel Odeon is situated in Odense, 200 metres from Odense train station. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The accommodation offers a business centre and free WiFi. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a private bathroom with a hair dryer. The units at Hotel Odeon include climate control, a desk and a chair. The daily breakfast offers continental and buffet options. Odense Concert Hall is 400 metres from the accommodation, while Hans Christian Andersens Hus is 400 metres from the property.

name: Hotel Knudsens Gaard
description: Located in Odense, Hotel Knudsens Gaard is in the business district, within a 5-minute drive of Hans Christian Andersen's Childhood Home and Odense Zoo. Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Odense? This hotel has facilities measuring 377 square feet (35 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Comwell H.C. Andersen Odense
address: Claus Bergs Gade 7, 5000 Odense, South Denmark
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Odense C, Radisson Blu H.C. Anderson Hotel Odense promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Radisson Blu H.C. Anderson Hotel Odense. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, closet, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary). The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, sauna, solarium, billiards. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Radisson Blu H.C. Anderson Hotel Odense.Agoda

name: Hotel Odense
description: Situated in Odense Congress Center, this hotel offers free in-room WiFi. Leisure facilities include a gym, sauna and terrace. Guests can enjoy Danish-French cuisine made from fresh, seasonal ingredients. Hotel Odense’s rooms feature modern décor. All have private bathrooms, a TV and a desk. Hotel Odense serves breakfast and lunch buffets each day. An à la carte menu is available for lunch and dinner. The well-stocked wine cellar offers plenty of choice. Gangbroen-Ørbækvej Bus Stop is right next to the hotel and is 15-minute ride from Odense city centre. Rosengårdcentret Shopping Centre is 2 km away.

name: Scandic Odense
description: Scandic Odense offers 4-star accommodation in Odense. It provides complimentary Wi-Fi, a sauna and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests can make the most of the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. It is pet-friendly and has free private parking on site for those with a car. The rooms at Scandic Odense offer a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. All provide a radio, a telephone and ironing facilities. The cosy in-house restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner each day, providing an enjoyable dining experience not far from the rooms and everything the hotel has on offer. Scandic Odense provides an ideal place to explore the Montergarden, University of Southern Denmark and Odense Cathedral, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Guests are able to discover the district using the hotel's hire bikes.Revato

name: Milling Hotel Mini 19
address: Hans Tausens Gade 19, 5000 Odense, South Denmark
description: Situated 5 minutes’ walk from Odense Central Station and the main square, Milling Hotel Mini 19 offers free WiFi and rooms with a flat-screen TV. The brightly decorated rooms at Milling Hotel Mini 19 have private bathrooms with a shower. Light meals and drinks are available in the café-bar. Free tea, coffee and lemonade are available at all times. Breakfast is available at the associated Milling Hotel Ansgar next door. Kongens Have Park is 150 metres away. The H.C. Andersen House is 1 km away. The 13th century St. Canute’s Cathedral is a 7-minute walk away.

name: Milling Hotel Mini 11
address: Hans Tausens Gade 11, Odense, South Denmark
description: This good-value hotel is within 5 minutes' walk of Odense Station and the main square, Flakhaven. It offers free WiFi, free 24-hour tea/coffee and modern en-suite rooms with a flat-screen TV. There is free on-street parking in front of the hotel from Monday to Friday between 18:00 and 09:00. Milling Hotel Mini 11 is situated on a quiet side street in central Odense. Cable TV and a work desk are standard room features. Guests can relax in the inner courtyard, and prepare own meals in the hotel's shared kitchen. Breakfast is available at the associated Milling Hotel Windsor next door and guests can also use the Hotel Windsor's lounge where they can relax with a coffee or cold beer. The staff is always available to help guests with their needs. Hans Christian Andersen Museum is 600 m from the Milling Hotel Mini 11. The green spaces of Kongens Have are just around the corner.

name: Zleep Hotel Aalborg
description: Zleep Hotel Aalborg is a 3-star property located in Aalborg. The property is around 800 metres from Vor Frue Church and 1 km from Aalborg Congress & Culture Centre and Budolfi Cathedral. Self check-in is possible 24 hours a day. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and each room has a private bathroom with a hair dryer. All guest rooms include a desk. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Aalborghus is 1.3 km from Zleep Hotel Aalborg, while Monastry of the Holy Ghost is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Aalborg Airport, 15 km from the property. The main street with shops is about 800 metres away.

name: Milling Hotel Gestus
description: Situated a 5-minute walk from both Aalborg Train Station and Kildeparken, this central hotel is 500 metres from Algade shopping street. It offers free WiFi and a furnished courtyard. Aalborg Zoo is a 5-minute drive away. All guest rooms at Hotel Gestus feature a flat-screen TV and work desk. The private bathrooms include a shower. Some rooms also have a bathtub and tea/coffee facilities. Guests can enjoy a drink in the lobby bar or relax with a cup of coffee in the lounge area. During summer, drinks can be enjoyed in the courtyard. Attractions such as the Aalborg Castle and the picturesque houses along the main street of Jomfru Ane Gade are within 10 minutes' walk of Hotel Gestus. Restaurants and cafés are found in the surrounding area. Aalborg Congress and Cultural Center is 500 metres away.

name: Scandic Aalborg City
description: This charming hotel in Aalborg offers free wireless internet, as well as a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. It is ideally located for guests wishing to discover the area's attractions. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Scandic Aalborg City offer a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom. They all feature ironing facilities, a telephone and heating. Those looking for a meal and wanting to stay nearby needn't look any further than Scandic Aalborg City's in-house restaurant, which is ideally available each day for breakfast. For guests on the move, the hotel provides packed lunches if needed. The hotel is close to Aalborg Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Aalborg and its surrounding areas. It is also perfectly situated close to a range of dining options.Revato

name: Prinsen Hotel
description: Conveniently situated in the heart of Aalborg, Prinsen Hotel provides pleasant, functional rooms with free WiFi and tea/coffee. Aalborg Central Station is 150 metres away. All the Danish-style rooms at Prinsen Hotel include a TV and a private bathroom with shower. A rich buffet breakfast is served every morning. The hotel café and bar is open throughout the day, serving drinks. Guests can unwind in the TV room, which also has a small library. Guests enjoy free access to a computer in the lobby. Algade shopping street is 500 metres away. The Aalborg Zoo is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. A limited amount of parking spaces are available on site for an extra fee.

name: Kompas Hotel Aalborg
description: Brand new rooms in the heart of Aalborg You could hardly wish for a better location in Aalborg - whether you are on an extended weekend, city break, business trip or something else entirely. Kompas Hotel, BW Signature Collection is a charming hotel, centrally located in relation to Aalborg's new and exciting waterfront with Musikkens Hus, and the cozy pedestrian streets and vibrant life of the North Jutland capital are just around the corner. You must experience the newly renovated waterfront with world-class architecture, cozy parks, gourmet restaurants in former warehouses while enjoying the view of the Limfjord. Shopping opportunities are plentiful in Aalborg, where one of the pedestrian streets is only 5 minutes away from the hotel on foot. So, explore Aalborg, where you'll always find new places, different experiences, exciting stories and true city vibes. The capital of North Jutland is a gem that never disappoints and an ideal destination for a mini-break or a weekend break.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Søparken
description: Overlooking Lake Åbybro, this hotel is just off the main road. It offers free WiFi and on-site parking. Blokhus Beach is a 20-minute drive away. All rooms of Hotel Søparken include a TV and a private bathroom with shower. Many rooms offer garden or lake views. Søparken’s restaurant offers a variety of dishes, all based on fresh ingredients. In summer, drinks can be enjoyed out on the terrace. The popular Fårup Sommerland Amusement Park is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Scandic Aalborg Øst
description: This comfortable hotel in Aalborg offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as free bicycle rental and a sauna. It also features meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage, a concierge and room service. It is pet-friendly and has free private parking on site for guests with a car. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and has an in-room safe, a desk and blackout curtains. There are also several rooms geared towards families. Scandic Aalborg Ost offers a variety of in-house dining options, including a cosy restaurant and a bar. Scandic Aalborg Ost is within walking distance of Aalborg University. Aalborgtarnet, Aalborghus Castle and Budolfi Church are only an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Vraa Slotshotel
description: This former manor house is located in the town of Tylstrup, a 20-minute drive north of Aalborg, just off the E39 Motorway. It offers a large garden, free Wi-Fi internet access and free private parking. All guest rooms at Vraa Slotshotel have a TV and a private bathroom. Some guest rooms have four poster beds. The Fårup Summerland Adventure Park and the beaches along Blokhus are only a 20-minute drive from Vraa Slotshotel, while the town of Hirtshals is 40 km away.

name: Pier 5 Hotel
description: Pier 5 Hotel features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and bar in Aalborg. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located 400 metres from Aalborghus. Some rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Pier 5 Hotel include Monastry of the holy ghost, Aalborg Historical Museum and Vor Frue Church. The nearest airport is Aalborg Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Jomfru Ane
address: Jomfru Ane Gade 3, 9000 Aalborg, North Jutland
description: This hotel is located on Jomfru Ane Gade pedestrian street in central Aalborg. It offers brightly decorated rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. All rooms at Hotel Jomfru Ane have a work desk and a private bathroom with shower. Breakfast is served each morning in the brightly decorated dining room. Free tea and coffee are available in the reception area where guests can also buy snacks and beverages during weekends. Guests will receive discount vouchers to different restaurants and cafes nearby. The 16th-century Aalborghus Castle is 250 metres away. Aalborg Train Station is a 13-minute walk from Jomfru Ane Hotel.

name: Hotel Scheelsminde
description: This quiet, family-owned property, set in a country house from the early 1800s, is 5 minutes’ drive from Aalborg Train Station. It offers a gourmet restaurant, wellness centre and rooms with flat-screen TVs. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Tea/coffee facilities, cable TV channels and desks are standard at Hotel Scheelsminde. Blackout curtains and a private bathroom with shower are also included. Restaurant Scheelsminde’s seasonal menu offers classic Danish and international dishes from Monday until Saturday. Guests can relax on the terrace or play boules in the garden. The wellness centre features a swimming pool, hot tub and sauna. Kunsten Museum of Modern Art is a 10-minute drive from Hotel Scheelsminde. Mariendals Mølle Bus Stop is just around the corner from the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Limfjord Hotel, Aalborg
description: Just 6 km from Aalborg Airport in North Jutland, this modern hotel offers free sauna access, free Wi-Fi and an in-house casino. Aalborg Train Station is 10 minutes’ walk away. Radisson Blu Limfjord Hotel’s modern rooms have cable and satellite TV, tea/coffee facilities and a seating area. Some offer views of Aalborg city centre and the Limfjord. Restaurant Brasserie Pascal uses local quality ingredients to create classic French dishes. The hotel lounge offers a selection of drinks and a relaxed setting with piano melodies. The main pedestrian street, Jomfru Ane Gade, is just around the corner. It has charming cafés, bars and cultural attractions.

name: Color Hotel Skagen
description: Color Hotel Skagen is 5 minutes’ walk from Frederikshavnsvej Train Station. It offers fine dining and free private parking. Leisure options include a sauna and outdoor pool and spa. Skagen town centre is 2 km away. Color Hotel Skagen’s rooms and apartments features cable TV and modern bathrooms. Some options include kitchen facilities and a dining area. The in-house restaurant uses fresh, seasonal ingredients in its dishes. Other facilities include a billiards table, a petanque court, table tennis, darts and a small playroom for younger kids. The 14th-century, sand-engulfed Buried Church is a 3-minute drive from Color Skagen Hotel.

name: Skagen Hotel
address: Sct. Laurentii Vej 35, 9990 Skagen, North Jutland
description: Situated by Skagen Station, Skagen Hotel is a few minutes' walk from the town centre. It provides a restaurant, terrace and free WiFi. Sønderstrand Beach is within 10 minutes’ walk. The guest rooms feature décor inspired by Skagen's sights and attractions. All rooms have a seating area and a private bathroom. Skagen Hotel Brasserie serves a 5-course menu and a selection of fine wines. Classic dishes with a Nordic twist are offered for lunch. In summer, guests can enjoy their meals out on the terrace. Skagen Museum is 350 metres from the hotel. The 14th-century Den Tilsandede Kirke, a church partly buried in sand, is just a 5-minute drive away.

name: Brøndums Hotel
description: This grand hotel, located directly across from the Skagen Museum, is 400 metres from Skagen Train Station. It offers fine dining, charming guest rooms and free on-site private parking. Free WiFi is available. The bright, tastefully decorated guest rooms are located in the main Brøndums Hotel building or its annex, Admiralgaarden. Bathroom facilities are private or shared. An in-room washbasin is included for those with shared facilities. Fine wines and classic dishes, such as plaice and oysters, are served in Brøndums’s restaurant. The kitchen uses seasonal, quality ingredients. During pleasant weather, guests can dine in the garden. Housed in a building dating back to 1874, all common rooms and lounges are decorated in a classical and historical manner. One includes a fireplace, ideal for unwinding after dinner. Sønderstrand Beach is just 200 metres away, while the town’s main shopping and dining street is less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Marie
description: Hotel Marie is set in Skagen and features a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and free WiFi. The accommodation provides luggage storage space, and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, certain rooms have a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven. Some rooms also have a balcony. An English breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near Hotel Marie. Frederikshavn is 40 km from the accommodation. Aalborg Airport is 83 km away.

name: Foldens Bed & Breakfast
address: Sankt Laurentii Vej 41, 9990 Skagen, North Jutland
description: Rooms Stay in one of 15 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities This smoke-free bed & breakfast offers complimentary parking nearby. Business}, Other Amenities Planning an event in Skagen? This bed & breakfast has 861 square feet (80 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Foldens Bed & Breakfast places you in the heart of Skagen, within a 5-minute walk of Havnetur I Skagen and Kulturhus Kappelborg. This bed & breakfast is 0.3 mi (0.6 km) from 'They Were Out There' and 0.4 mi (0.6 km) from Skagens Museum. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the bed & breakfast's coffee shop/cafe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 11 AM. Renovations The property is closed during January, February, and December. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 8:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. There is no front desk at this property. The check-in location differs from the property location. To check in, go to Sct. Laurentii Vej 41 (Foldens Hotel) The host will greet guests on arrival. name: Skagen Harbour Hotel
description: Situated by Skagen Harbour, this property provides free WiFi and parking. It offers rooms just 5 minutes’ walk from sandy beaches. Skagen Train Station is 1 km away. Skagen Harbour Hotel’s light, airy accommodation features a minibar, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Guests can sit in the cosy dining room or enjoy Skagen’s famous bright summer nights on the main terrace. There is also a daytime bar. Sct. Laurentii Vej, the main shopping street, is 300 metres from Skagen Harbour Hotel. The 14th-century Buried Church is an 8-minute drive away. The Swedish Seaman's Church is next to the hotel.

name: Skagen Strand Hotel Og Feriecenter
description: Right by Hulsig Station and 800 metres from Skagen Beach, this resort offers an indoor water park and free sports centre. Each apartment has a well-equipped kitchen with dishwasher and a private south-facing terrace with garden furniture. Skagen Strand Holiday Center’s apartments have a seating area and a private bathroom. All are equipped with a TV and a CD player. Some houses has a washing machine if not there are public washing facilities. Skagen Strand Holiday Center’s water park includes a 48-metre water slide and sauna facilities. The sports centre features a gym and tennis, mini golf and badminton courts. Children can enjoy access to several playgrounds and play areas on site. Guests have free access to all facilities. The resort’s restaurant serves international and Danish cuisine. Free public parking spaces are found nearby.

name: Skagen Apartments
description: No description found

name: Foldens Hotel
address: Sct. Laurentii Vej 41, 9990 Skagen, North Jutland
description: This hotel lies in central Skagen, 80 metres from Skagen Train Station. It features an on-site restaurant and cosy café. All rooms have a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The restaurant at Foldens Hotel serves typically Danish dishes and offers a discount for guests. The popular music venue, Viseværtshuset, is located on site. It offers live music every weekend between May and September. During the busiest summer months, music events run long into the night. Guests can explore beautiful natural surroundings or visit the nearby beach. Skagen’s famous Buried Church is found in the sand dunes. Free private parking is available at Hotel Foldens from September until May.

name: Fredensborg Badehotel
description: This seafront Rønne hotel is 5 minutes' drive from Bornholm Airport. It offers accommodation with a balcony or terrace, free WiFi and free parking. The hotel features a sea-view French-inspired restaurant. All rooms at Fredensborg Badehotel come with a desk. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower and hairdryer. Additional services at the hotel include a bar and lounge and a hot tub. A spacious garden surroundings the building and views can also be enjoyed from the common terrace. Fredensborg Hotel is within 10 minutes’ drive of Rønne Ferry Terminal. Boats depart for Denmark, Sweden and Germany. Please note that you have to be min 16 years old in order to stay at Fredensborg Badehotel.

name: Hotel Skovly
description: Set in a protected forest 5 km from Rønne, this hotel is just 150 metres from a sandy beach and the Baltic Sea. It provides fresh, modern rooms with a sofa and satellite TV. WiFi is free. Hotel Skovly’s en-suite guest rooms are spread out across 5 wings. The hotel serves a daily breakfast buffet. In summer, the spacious furnished terrace is a nice place to enjoy the sun. The quiet, scenic surroundings provide ideal opportunities for hiking and fishing. Guests can rent bikes on site and explore the area at their own convenience. Biking trails begins just outside of the hotel and lead into the surrounding forest area.

name: Griffen Spa Hotel
description: Featuring rooms with views of the Baltic Sea or the old town, this central Rønne hotel also offers free WiFi and free private parking. Free spa access is offered to guests over 16 years of age. Each guest room at Griffen Spa Hotel includes a seating area and a work desk. Some rooms have balconies with sea views. Free entry into the hotel's 1,000 m² spa and wellness centre is available to all guests. Spa facilities include a hot tub, sauna and a heated indoor pool. Treatments are bookable for an additional fee. Other facilities include a bar and restaurant with a summertime terrace. Spa Hotel Griffen is within 1 km of Rønne Bus Terminal. The ferry terminal is 15 minutes’ walk away. Bornholm Airport is the closest airport, located 6.9 km away.

name: Hotel Sniva
description: Set in Rønne, 17 km from Natur Bornholm and 18 km from The Echo Valley, Hotel Sniva offers a restaurant, sea views and free WiFi. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Hotel Sniva has a garden and sun terrace. Østerlars Church is 20 km from the accommodation, while The Sanctuary Cliffs is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bornholm Airport, 5 km from Hotel Sniva.

name: Nordskoven Strand Camping
description: Within a 15-minute car trip of Bornholm Airport, Nordskoven Strand Camping & Cottages provides a swimming pool and free wireless internet. It also offers a ticket service, a BBQ/picnic area and a playground. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the property, including laundry facilities, a terrace and a table tennis table. There are also a range of outdoor activities to enjoy, such as hiking and fishing. Nordskoven Strand Camping & Cottages has 28 lodgings, all of which are equipped with a variety of facilities to ensure an enjoyable stay.HotelsCombined

name: Hotel Siemsens Gaard
description: Set in a charming 17th-century building on Bornholm island, this hotel offers great views of the Baltic Sea. All rooms have a flat-screen TV. Hotel Siemsens Gaard’s bright rooms are decorated in marine blue and creamy white. Some feature garden or sea views. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Swimming is possible by Svaneke Harbour, 100 metres away. The in-house seasonal restaurant serves Danish and French dishes based on local ingredients. Guests can eat on the terrace and enjoy sea and harbour views.

name: Stammershalle Badehotel
address: Sdr. Strandvej 128, Stammershalle, 3760 Gudhjem, Capital Region
description: Peacefully located on Bornholm Island’s rocky shores, this charming hotel offers stunning views of the Baltic Sea and Christiansø Island. It houses a gourmet restaurant serving fresh, local specialities. The bright and airy guest rooms at Stammershalle Badehotel feature a TV and a bathroom. Guests can enjoy free WiFi access. All rooms have sea views. Leisure options include free access to a seasonal sauna. Tennis courts, bicycle rentals and free private parking are also on site. Helligdom Cliffs and the Døndal Waterfall are both about 2 km away from Stammershalle. The town of Gudhjem is 8 minutes’ drive away.

name: Pension Klostergaarden Hotel
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a garden, as well as daily housekeeping and towels. Other amenities include hypo-allergenic bedding, a Select Comfort bed, tour/ticket assistance, and luggage storage.Expedia

name: Pension Sandbogaard
description: Featuring a garden, bar and views of garden, Pension Sandbogaard is set in Sandvig, 200 metres from Sandvig Beach. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The guest house offers city views, a sun terrace, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. At the guest house, the rooms are equipped with a patio. Some rooms also feature a kitchenette with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. All guest rooms at Pension Sandbogaard come with a seating area. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Sandvig, like hiking. Hammerhavnens Beach is 1.9 km from Pension Sandbogaard, while Næs Beach is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bornholm Airport, 29 km from the guest house.

name: Sandkaas Badehotel
description: Sandkaas Badehotel is a family-run, garni hotel that lies on the coastline between Tejn and Allinge and offers free parking and free WiFi access. A sandy beach is located 50 metres from this 20th century hotel. A seating area and a private bathroom with shower are featured in all rooms at Badehotel Sandkaas. Most rooms have views of the Baltic Sea. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the dining room which overlooks the sea. Restaurants are found within 100 metres of the hotel. In the summer, guests can relax on the terraces and lounges and enjoy a cup of coffee, cakes and snacks from the hotel's honesty bar. Bicycles can be rented on site. A mini golf course is 100 metres away. Allinge is 1.5 km from the hotel. The 36-hole Rø Golf Club is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Pension Holmegaard
description: Facing the beachfront in Sandvig, Pension Holmegaard has a bar and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are barbecue facilities and a terrace. The accommodation features a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. At Pension Holmegaard, the rooms include a private bathroom with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Rønne is 24 km from Pension Holmegaard. The nearest airport is Bornholm Airport, 28 km from the guest house.

name: Nexø Hostel
description: Nexø Modern Hostel is in the coastal town of Nexø, on picturesque Bornholm. WiFi and parking are free. Dueodde Beach, the island’s largest and most popular, is within 10 minutes’ drive. Communal kitchenettes and shared bathrooms are found on each floor of Nexø Hostel. Kitchen facilities include an oven, kettle and microwave. A laundry room is also available. The guest lounge or furnished garden are ideal for relaxation. You can purchase coffee on site. Sommerfuglepark & Tropeland is directly across the road from Hostel Nexø. It features a tropical garden and butterfly park. Restaurants, small shops and the popular waterfront are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Grønbechs Hotel
description: Facing the beachfront, Grønbechs Hotel offers 3-star accommodation in Allinge and features a garden, terrace and restaurant. Providing a bar, the property is located within 700 metres of Næs Beach. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also offer free WiFi, while certain rooms include a balcony. At Grønbechs Hotel each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at Grønbechs Hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Allinge, like hiking. Sandvig Beach is 2.2 km from the hotel, while Hammershus Besøgscenter is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Bornholm Airport, 28 km from Grønbechs Hotel.

name: Strandhotel Balka Søbad
address: Vestre Strandvej 25, Balka, Nexø, Capital Region
description: This seaside hotel is 100 metres from Balka Strand’s beach. It offers a heated outdoor pool, a children's pool and free private parking. All rooms have a kitchenette and a balcony or terrace. Strandhotel Balka Søbad’s TV lounge has a bar and a fireplace. The communal terrace faces the garden, which has a large heated pool and a paddling pool. Computers can be used for free in the hotel's internet café. Guests can hire bicycles at Strandhotel Balka Søbad and explore some of Bornholm’s 250 km of bicycle routes. The old port town of Nexø is about 2.5 km away, while the fishing village of Snogebæk is less than 5 minutes' drive away. Restaurants can also be found in the surroundings.

name: Rosengaarden
description: No description found

name: Nordly Vandrerhjem
description: No description found

name: Hotel Pepita
description: This hotel is set in a 16th-century half-timbered building in picturesque Sandvig village, on Bornholm island. The medieval-era Hammershus Fortress is 2 km away. Parking and Wi-Fi access are free. Hotel Pepita’s rooms include a private bathroom, TV and radio. Some offer Baltic Sea views, while others have a small private terrace. The in-house restaurant serves traditional Danish meals based on seasonal ingredients. A white beach at Sandvig Bay is just 250 metres away. Close by are Hammersø lake and Hammeren, a unique, protected area of heather-clad hills and woodland. Denmark's longest zipline hangs over Opalsø, another nearby lake.

name: Allinge Badehotel
description: Allinge Badehotel has free bikes, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Allinge. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 100 metres of Næs Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.7 km from Sandvig Beach. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, some rooms at Allinge Badehotel also feature a sea view. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Allinge Badehotel. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Allinge, like hiking and cycling. Hammershus Besøgscenter is 4.7 km from Allinge Badehotel, while The Sanctuary Cliffs is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bornholm Airport, 28 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Allinge
description: Family-owned hotel on the sunny island Bornholm. Hotel Allinge is a family-run hotel with focus on personal presence and service. The hotel offers a beautiful view of the sea and you are close to everything from the harbor, beaches and beach-friendly cliffs to shopping, cafes and the many different restaurants. There is a cozy garden at the hotel, where you have the opportunity to have a refreshing glass of wine in the quiet and relaxing surroundings. Allinge is located on a rocky coast. A short distance from the hotel is the cozy beach Naes with a sandy beach and cliffs, which many locals use for a morning dip. In the extension of Allinge town is Sandvig town. If you love hiking, it is just over 3 kilometers to Sandkas along the coastal path. This path continues around Bornholm. Hotel Allinge, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western is also within walking distance of the harbor. There are good conditions for a walk towards Sandvig and Hammeren, which leads past the petroglyphs at Madsebakke.bestwestern.com

name: Gudhjem Vandrerhjem / Gudhjem Hostel
description: Boasting a terrace, bar and views of city, Gudhjem Vandrerhjem / Gudhjem Hostel is situated in Gudhjem, 6.2 km from The Sanctuary Cliffs. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The accommodation features evening entertainment and a shared kitchen. With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower, rooms at the hostel also boast free WiFi, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony. The daily breakfast offers vegetarian, vegan or gluten-free options. Østerlars Church is 7 km from Gudhjem Vandrerhjem / Gudhjem Hostel, while The Echo Valley is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bornholm Airport, 27 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Blomme's Place
description: Set in Snogebæk, 1.6 km from Balka Beach, Hotel Blomme's Place offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Offering a bar, the property is located within 2.2 km of Dueodde Beach. The property is allergy-free and is situated 6.4 km from Bornholm Butterfly Park. At the hotel, all rooms have a patio with a garden view. At Hotel Blomme's Place every room includes a private bathroom and bed linen. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or vegan options. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at the accommodation. Brændegårdshaven is 15 km from Hotel Blomme's Place, while Natur Bornholm is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Bornholm Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Sonderborg Strand, Sure Hotel Collection by BW
description: Hotel Sonderborg Strand is located directly next to the beach in nature and historic surroundings only 250 meters from the center of Sonderborg. From the hotel you can enjoy the view of Alssund. Opposite the hotel is the beautiful Sonderborg Castle, and close by you will find the marina, forest and the lovely nature on Als. At Hotel Sønderborg Strand we have 95 well-appointed rooms divided into five categories and many of them with a magnificent view of the water. So whatever your errand is, we have a room that fits. With our professional serving staff and our really good kitchen, we have a clear strategy of using only the best ingredients and we naturally prepare our menus from the 'bottom' so we can guarantee 100% that you get a nice and well-cooked meal. We work according to the 'season' and the new trends, but we also do not forget the traditional. We work with our wine supplier on the composition of our wine list, so you can be sure of a perfect match, and at the same time have the opportunity to taste several different really good wines at a reasonable price.bestwestern.com

name: Alsik
description: Located in Sønderborg, Alsik – Hotel & Spa features free WiFi. The property has a fitness centre, as well as a terrace. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. Alsik – Hotel & Spa provides most guest rooms with sea views, and all are equipped with a private bathroom. The rooms at the hotel include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Guests at Alsik – Hotel & Spa can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking Danish and German at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Hamburg is 206 km from the hotel, while Aarhus is a 2-hour drive. The nearest airport is Sønderborg Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Hotel Bella Italia
description: Located in Sønderborg, 2.5 km away from Dybbøl Mølle, Hotel Bella Italia features a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site. Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a coffee machine in the room. All rooms include a private bathroom. You will find a business centre at the property. The beach is only 100 metres away from Hotel Bella Italia, while Sønderborg Slot is 150 metres away. The nearest airport, Sønderborg Airport, is 6 km from the property.

name: Scandic Sønderborg
description: Situated in Sonderborg, the hotel is within a 10-minute drive of Sonderborg Airport and provides a swimming pool and a sauna. It also offers free public parking on site and is a 10-minute drive from Augustenborg Palace. This modern hotel provides a range of amenities, such as free bicycle rental, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. The rooms at Scandic Sonderborg have an in-room closet, a desk and blackout curtains. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Scandic Sonderborg features a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of the day with a meal and a drink.Revato

name: Hotel Kolding
description: Hotel Kolding is located in the heart of Kolding just across the train and bus station. Close to the hotel, youll find Koldinghus Castle, Trapholt Museum, the Geographical Garden and the wellness and spa facility, Dronning Dorotheas Badstue, as well as good shopping areas and restaurants. LEGOLAND is only 35 minutes away by car.Whether youre in town for business or pleasure, youll feel at home in one of our 132 stylish and comfortable rooms. Wake up to our delicious breakfast and get ready for a day on the go. Break a sweat in our well-equipped gym or relax in the lobby.At Hotel Kolding, we take great pride in providing professional and welcoming personal service.iHotelier/iStay

name: Park Hotel
description: This family-run hotel is 3 minutes’ walk from Frederikshavn Train Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and parking. Facilities include a charming library bar and a rose garden with a terrace. Park Hotel’s individually designed rooms feature traditional décor, mahogany furnishings and private bathrooms. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and a seating area. For added luxury, an in-room breakfast can be ordered. During summer, guests can dine on Hotel Park’s terrace. Staff will gladly recommend local attractions such as Bangsbo Museum. Gothenburg and Oslo ferries depart from the harbour, just 500 metres away. Shops, restaurants and cafés are easily accessed on foot.

name: Hotel Hamlet
description: Located in Helsingør’s city centre, Hotel Hamlet is 15 minutes’ walk from the UNESCO-listed Kronborg Castle. It offers an international restaurant and free Wi-Fi in the lobby. Hamlet Hotel’s rooms have decorative curtains and oil paintings on the walls. Each room has a writing desk and cable TV. The elegant restaurant Francisco offers homemade and fresh à la carté dishes based on local ingredients. On weekends, a popular brunch is served here. Less than 1 minutes’ walk away is Helsingør Train Station and the ferry terminals, providing easy access to both Copenhagen and Sweden.

name: Sauntehus Castle Hotel
description: This 1914 castle is only 3.5 km from central Hornbæk and the Øresund Strait. Sauna and pool access is free. Rooms feature canopy beds, antique furniture and rich fabrics. Some of Sauntehus Castle Hotel’s charming rooms have a balcony. Many include free Wi-Fi internet. The in-house restaurant’s à la carte menu is based on fresh, seasonal ingredients. Wine-tasting sessions are arranged in the cellar on Saturdays. Free Wi-Fi is available in Sauntehus Castle’s business centre. The surrounding park dates back to 1793 and has rare trees and bushes. Free parking is found on site. Central Copenhagen is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Palads Hotel
address: Sct. Mathias Gade 5, 1. Floor, Viborg, Central Jutland
description: A charming city hotel in the middle of Viborg. Hotel Palads, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western is located in the center of Viborg, right by the city's pedestrian street. Here you can experience one of Denmark's oldest cities, which offers exciting museums, cozy medieval streets and good opportunities for shopping in the city's cozy shops. Also visit Viborg Cathedral when you are in town. It is the world's largest granite church. In the hotel's restaurant you will find good quality and traditional Danish food, served with love in a traditional setting. On the terrace outside the hotel, it is possible to relax and enjoy a good glass of wine, a cold beer or a good meal in the sun. The rooms at Hotel Palads, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western are located in five buildings, surrounded by our parking spaces, which are free for hotel guests.bestwestern.com

name: Hostrups Hotel
description: Hostrups Hotel has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Tønder. Located around 47 km from Train Station Flensburg, the hotel with free WiFi is also 47 km away from Maritime Museum Flensburg. The property is non-smoking and is situated 47 km from Pedestrian Area Flensburg. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Hostrups Hotel features some rooms with city views, and the rooms are equipped with a kettle. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Guests at Hostrups Hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Tønder, like hiking. Flensburg Harbour is 48 km from the hotel, while Industriemuseum Kupfermühle is 43 km from the property. The nearest airport is Sønderborg Airport, 69 km from Hostrups Hotel.

name: Skovshoved Hotel
description: Set in a quiet, seaside location besides forests and parks, this hotel is located in an old fishing village, 5 minutes’ walk from Bellevue Beach in Charlottenlund. It offers free WiFi and an on-site restaurant. Dating back to 1660, all rooms at Skovshoved Hotel have a TV, minibar and private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and toiletries. Some feature a private balcony and sea view. A Hereford Beefstouw, the restaurant at the hotel, is known for their quality steaks and wine list, as well as classic dishes. Guests have access to Skovshoved Hotel's private jetty. Bicycles can also be rented from March until October to explore the scenic surroundings. Free parking is also possible on site. Nearby activities include an amusement park, beaches, shops and golf courses. Copenhagen’s city centre, 7 km away, can be reached by car in just 15 minutes. A bus that stops right next to the hotel will take guests directly to the city centre in about 40 minutes.

name: Radisson Blu Papirfabrikken Hotel, Silkeborg
description: This hotel is housed in a former paper mill by the Gudenå River, 10 minutes’ walk from Silkeborg Museum. Guests can enjoy free internet access and free parking. A tea/coffee maker, minibar and cable TV are featured in all rooms at Radisson Blu Hotel i Papirfabrikken Silkeborg. Bathrobes and slippers, are found in some rooms. Facilities at Hotel i Papirfabrikken include a restaurant, bar and terrace with river views. Guests receive a discount to the gym housed in the same building. The area's surrounding lakes offer activities such as hiking, fishing and sailing. Silkeborg Golf Course is only a 10-minute drive away.

name: Dolphin Hotel Herning
description: Located just off the Midtjyske Motorway, this hotel is 200 metres from Herning Centret shopping centre and Herning Golf Club. It offers free Wi-Fi. Central Herning is 1.8 km away. A flat-screen TV and seating area are found in all Dolphin Hotel Herning's rooms. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning. Dolphin Hotel Herning's cosy garden provides a nice spot for relaxation. The Jyske Bank Boxen and Messe Centre Herning are 7 km away, while the Herning Museum of Art is 1 km from the hotel. Free parking is available on site.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Kronjylland
description: Best Western Plus Hotel Kronjylland is centrally located in Randers only a few hundred meters from the main train station. The hotel is a modern city hotel with a relaxing and informal atmosphere set in historical surroundings with more than 100 years of unique history. The hotel has recently been redecorated in an intriguing international boutique style with an emphasis on quality, atmosphere and the beautiful architecture of the building. All rooms are well furnished with all modern facilities. When staying in Best Western Plus Hotel Kronjylland you are only a few minutes’ walk from the busy pedestrian street with many great specialty shops and cozy cafes. Randers is an ideal base for exciting and varied experiences in Crown Jutland. Find inspiration for an eventful day in the hotel reception.
