Best Western Plus Hotel Kronjylland offers four meeting rooms with all modern and necessary equipment making it the perfect place for your special event. Our well-trained staff is always available to assist you. When you choose to stay in a Best Western hotel you can always call our toll-free number 8001 0988 (within Denmark) and make your reservation. A big Scandinavian breakfast buffet is included in the room rate. Environmental fees will not be charged and there is free Wi-Fi. Join our loyalty program, Best Western Rewards, for FREE and you can reserve your room with your Best Western Rewards card, no credit card needed. Guests who book through either bestwestern.com or bestwestern.dk do not pay debit card fees either. Best Western Plus Hotel Kronjylland offers a sumptuous Scandinavian breakfast buffet with a wide variety of cold and warm breakfast items. From Monday to Thursday the restaurant is open for a home cooked meal made according to Danish cooking traditions. A delicious homemade soup is served on the days when the restaurant is closed. In addition, the hotel offers free Wi-Fi in all guest rooms and public areas.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic The Reef
description: Located in Frederikshavn, Scandic The Reef offers complimentary Wi-Fi and a gym. It is set in the area's vibrant nightlife district, which is only a few minutes walk from Krudttarnet. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. For sporty types away from home the hotel offers a swimming pool. The rooms are well-equipped and offer a flat-screen TV, a closet and a safe. They feature a private bathroom, blackout curtains and tea and coffee making facilities. Those staying at Scandic The Reef can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. The hotel enjoys an ideal location, allowing guests easy access to a range of tourist attractions. For guests travelling with a car, there is private parking nearby.Revato

name: Vejlsøhus Hotel & Konferencecenter
description: This hotel has a peaceful, green location, next to Guden Lake and Aqua Fresh Water Center. It offers free WiFi and en-suite rooms with a flat-screen TV. Central Silkeborg is 2.5 km away. Cable TV, a work desk and an electric kettle are standard in all guest rooms at Vejlsøhus Hotel and Conference Center. Vejlsøhus Hotel serves a daily breakfast buffet. In summer, the garden is a nice place to relax in the sun. Almindsø Lake, 2 km from the hotel, is popular for swimming as well as fishing. Other nearby leisure options include hiking and cycling. Silkeborg Art Museum is 20 minutes' walk away.

name: Fladbro Kro
description: Dating back to 18th century, this inn is situated next to Fladbro Forest. It offers a gourmet inn restaurant and apartments with a fully equipped kitchen and free Wi-Fi access. Randers city centre is an 11-minute drive away. A seating area, dining area and flat-screen TV feature in all apartments at Fladbro Kro. Each apartment has a bathroom with shower and a furnished terrace. Some apartments feature a kitchen. The in-house restaurant serves slow food dishes based on local ingredients. Meals can be enjoyed at the outdoor serving during summer. Bicycles can be borrowed for free on site. Randers Golf Club is a 2-minute drive away. Silkeborg city centre is 50 km from the inn.

name: Hotel Marina
description: This hotel is next to Grenå Beach and 5 minutes’ walk from Kattegatcentret Oceanarium. It offers free sauna and indoor pool access, plus free Wi-Fi. Satellite TV and minibars are standard at Hotel Marina. Some rooms have a seating area and work desk. Facilities include a children's playground and activity centre with billiards and table tennis options. Staff can recommend walking trails and jogging tracks in the nearby forest. Parking is free at Hotel Marina. Guests can drive to Djurs Sommerland Theme Park, 25 minutes away.

name: Hindsgavl Slot
description: This charming waterfront castle overlooks the picturesque Fænø Sound and Little Belt Strait, in Middelfart. It offers a peaceful, setting surrounded by greenery. Free WiFi is available. A TV and tea/coffee facilities are standard at Hindsgavl Slot. Many rooms feature elegant, classical décor. Others are set in the converted neighbouring stables and have exposed brick walls and stylish, modern furnishings. The in-house, café is Slotscaféen, or The Castle Café. The dishes are made from fresh, seasonal ingredients picked in the hotel's own herb garden. Fredericia town centre is within 10 km, while Odense city centre is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Teaterhotellet
description: Situated on the main pedestrian street, Søndergade, within 10 minutes’ walk of Horsens Station, Teaterhotellet provides free Wi-Fi and free private parking. All rooms have flat-screen TVs and tea/coffee making facilities. The bright and modern guest rooms feature a work desk and a private bathroom with shower. Teaterhotellet’s breakfast is served in the bright dining room. In summer, guests can sit out on the terrace. The cosy lounge bar has a wide-screen TV and offers a wide variety of drinks, The Horsens New Theatre is just 75 metres from Teaterhotellet, and Horsens Museum and the Caroline Amalie Park are 10 minutes’ walk. The hotel’s central location provides easy access to shopping, dining and entertainment.

name: Harbour Living by Jutlandia
address: Hotel Jutlandia, Havnepladsen 1, 9900 Frederikshavn, North Jutland
description: With a 24-hour reception, this hotel is located 300 metres from the Frederikshavn Ferry Terminal and offers accommodation in central Frederikshavn. There is a fitness centre on site as well as free WiFi throughout the hotel. At Harbour Living by Jutlandia, guests can enjoy food and refreshments at the in-house restaurant and bar. Guests can also use a shared kitchen for an additional surcharge, and there is a 24-hour front reception and tour desk on site. Billiards and darts are also offered for leisure. Skagen is 40 km from Outlet Hotel Frederikshavn, while Hirtshals is 49 km from the property. The Frederikshavn Train Station is within a 10-minute walk.

name: Hotel Skivehus
description: Located 29 km from Jesperhus Resort, Hotel Skivehus offers 3-star accommodation in Skive and features a fitness centre, a garden and a shared lounge. The hotel also features free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. All units in the hotel are equipped with a TV with satellite channels. Hotel Skivehus provides certain rooms that include city views, and each room includes a private bathroom with a shower. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Hotel Skivehus can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Skive, like hiking and cycling. The nearest airport is Midtjyllands Airport, 36 km from Hotel Skivehus.

name: Filskov Kro
description: This 1850s inn is a 15-minute drive from Legoland, Lalandia and Billund Airport. It offers free access to a fitness centre and traditional Danish cuisine with a modern twist. Parking is free. The modern rooms at Filskov Kro all include a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Filskov Kro Hotel’s restaurant uses fresh, locally sourced ingredients in its dishes. A large garden and forest are found right behind the restaurant. Other facilities include a children’s playground, plus table tennis and billiards tables. Give Golf Club and Gyttegård Golf Club are both within 20 minutes’ drive.

name: Hotel Phønix
description: Hotel Phønix is located in Holstebro, just 100 metres from the Music Theater Holstebro. It offers free Wi-Fi and outdoor terrace with garden furniture. The rooms at Hotel Phønix all have a private bathroom and feature free WiFi. A desk and TV is available in all rooms. Breakfast and dinner is served at the restaurant on-site. Dining and shopping options are found around Store Torv and the Nørregade pedestrian street, 5 minutes’ walk away. Storådalen Golf Club is less than 4 km from the property.

name: Hotel Gammel Havn
description: Overlooking Fredericia Harbour, this hotel is less than 300 metres from Fredericia's historic town centre. It offers a café and a TV lounge. Wi-Fi and on-site parking are free. All rooms at Hotel Gammel Havn have seating areas, TVs and a private bathroom with shower. Irons and hairdryers can be borrowed at reception. During warmer weather, guests can enjoy garden and marina views from Gammel Havn's patio. Staff can recommend local restaurants for lunch and dinner. The nearby Fredericia Vold historical park features 17th-century walls, moats and bastions. Fredericia Station is a 6-minute bus ride away. Fredericia Sports Centre is within 3 km.

name: Hotel Koldingfjord
description: Surrounded by forest, Hotel Koldingfjord is set in an impressive 1911 building, just a 12-minute drive from central Kolding. It offers rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs and free WiFi. All rooms at Koldingfjord Hotel have a work desk and minibar. Some rooms offer views of the Kolding Fjord, while others are located in an annex building. Guests can stay active in the fitness area or relax in the sauna or indoor swimming pool. Hiking is available on the trails around the hotel. A terrace is also available, featuring views of the surrounding nature. The à la carte Koldingfjord Restaurant serves international dishes. Café Louise has a summer terrace, and offers light snacks and drinks. Drinks are also available at Frederik VIII Bar. Hotel Koldingfjord is 1.5 km from the Trapholt Museum of Modern Art. Slottssøbadet Water Park is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Europa
address: H P Hanssens Gade 10, Aabenraa, South Denmark
description: The Aabenraa Fjord and Sønder Beach are just 15 minutes’ walk from this central Aabenraa hotel. Free WiFi is available. Each room at Europa features fresh, Scandinavian design, modern bathrooms and air conditioning. All rooms have a minibar, Nespresso machine and work desk. A free internet computer is available for guests’ use. Free tea/coffee and cookies are provided in the lobby. Restaurant No.10 and the Scottish-style Fox and Hounds pub serve Danish and international dishes. Free parking is offered on site. Hotel Europa is 20 km from the Danish-German border.

name: Hotel Præstekilde
description: Overlooking the Møn Golf Course, this hotel lies 4.5 km from central Stege and the White Cliffs of Møn. It offers free Wi-Fi, parking and a terrace with lake views. All guest rooms at Møn Golf Resort - Hotel Præstekilde have seating areas and cable TV. Many guest rooms offer views of Lake Stege Nor and the green surroundings. Guests can also enjoy a game of pétanque in the large garden. A children's playground is also found on site. The in-house Præstekilde Restaurant offers both Danish and international à la carte dishes. The surrounding area offers activities such as fishing, horse riding and canoeing. The vast Oddemose Beach is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Phønix Brønderslev
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Brønderslev, just 25 km north of Aalborg, is Hotel Phønix. This hotel is 20 km from Fårup Sommerland Amusement Park and 35 km away from the Aalborg Zoo. Rooms come with a TV and private bathroom. The restaurant offers a selection of traditional Danish dishes and the bar is a cosy retreat for some wine and other refreshments. Restaurants, cafes and shopping are found in the immediate surroundings of Hotel Phønix Brønderslev. There is a golf course located 3.4 km from the hotel. Brønderslev Train Station is a few minutes' walk away.

name: Hotel Sleep2Night
description: This hotel is 3 km from central Helsingør, the ferry terminals and Kronborg Castle. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi, a popular breakfast and a parking place directly outside their room. Hotel Sleep2Night’s rooms have a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Other facilities at Sleep2Night include a large terrace and bicycle rental. Guests seeking nature will find forests and a beach within 5 minutes’ drive of Hotel Sleep2Night. Hotel staff can recommend nearby restaurants and attractions.

name: Hotel Britannia
description: Stop at Hotel Britannia to discover the wonders of Esbjerg. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hotel Britannia. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find flat screen television, slippers, towels, closet, smoke detector. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as garden. Hotel Britannia is an excellent choice from which to explore Esbjerg or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Benniksgaard Hotel
description: Situated at the highest point in Rinkenæs by Flensburg Firth – with Benniksgaard Golf Course as its closest neighbour – the four star Benniksgaard Hotel, BW Signature Collection boasts views of unparalleled beauty. Benniksgaard takes its name from a family farm dating all the way back to 1393. Today, Benniksgaard is privately owned and run as a hotel. All the buildings have undergone a comprehensive and painstaking renovation. The rustic style, exposed beams and bright colours create an airy, inviting atmosphere. The old chicken house has been transformed into Restaurant Pejsestuen, the longest wing into a hotel wing with 31 rooms – and the old farmhouse from 1782 into fourteen stunning spacious rooms and suites. With its squinting walls, sash windows and creaking floors, the listed farmhouse is a constant reminder of bygone times. The first floor staircase is a particularly interesting relic, and indeed, its narrow steps have been a constant feature of the farmhouse. The old grain stores and a recently added wing are home to several function and conference rooms, while the wing formerly occupied by agricultural machinery now houses BenniksgaardButik shop, offering a wide range of items to suit all tastes.bestwestern.com

name: Herning City Hotel
description: A hotel has stood on the corner of Bredgade and Skolegade in Herning since 1896. Back then it was called the Herning Missionshotel or Herning Temperance Hotel – and it was on two stories with an adjoining stable for traveler’s. Subsequently, the Herning City Hotel, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western grew considerably with two additional stories added, while the stable building became redundant and demolished. By the 1990s, the temperance hotels had had their day, and the hotel was therefore transformed into a ‘garni’ hotel, a hotel that only serves breakfast, with rooms and a breakfast room, where the focus is on providing a very high standard of personal service.bestwestern.com

name: Jerlev Kro
description: Rooms Stay in one of 5 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Vejle, Jerlev kro is within a 10-minute drive of Vejle Windmill and Munkenes Teglovn. This inn is 4.8 mi (7.8 km) from Vejle Art Museum and 5 mi (8 km) from Den Smidtske Gaard. Dining At Jerlev kro, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Optional Charges Rollaway bed fee: DKK 100 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 5:00 PM Checkin end at 8:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property ahead of time using the information on the booking confirmation. If you are planning to arrive after 8 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property for check-in instructions. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests who wish to book breakfast or breakfast bags are encouraged to contact the property before arrival to pre-book it. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No cribs (infant beds) availableViajes Exito Hotels

name: A Hotels
description: Featuring free WiFi and a restaurant, A Hotels offers accommodation in Glostrup, 10 km from Copenhagen. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free private parking is available on site. Brøndby Stadium is 4 km away. The rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units have a seating area for your convenience. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the hotel. Copenhagen Zoo is 7 km away from A Hotels. Glostrup Train Station is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Kastrup Airport, 21 km from A Hotels.

name: Det Gamle Rådhus
description: Set in Gråsten, within 24 km of Maritime Museum Flensburg and 25 km of Flensburg Harbour, Det Gamle Rådhus offers accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 4-star hotel offers an ATM. The property is non-smoking and is situated 25 km from Pedestrian Area Flensburg. At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests at Det Gamle Rådhus will be able to enjoy activities in and around Gråsten, like hiking and cycling. Train Station Flensburg is 28 km from the accommodation, while University of Flensburg is 31 km away. The nearest airport is Sønderborg Airport, 20 km from Det Gamle Rådhus.

name: Hotel Dania
description: Hotel Dania, BW Signature Collection is located in the middle of Torvet in the center of Silkeborg, with the vibrant life of the pedestrian streets, cultural attractions, café life, lakes and forests as the nearest neighbor. The hotel's restaurant, Brasserie Underhuset, serves top-class gastronomy, classic Danish lunch or an exquisite evening menu of high quality. The kitchen is inspired by the seasonal supply of ingredients, always with an optimal taste and enjoyment. Brasserie Underhuset is a member and knight of the Chaine des Rotisseurs, the international gourmet order for high-quality gastronomy. Hotel Dania, BW Signature Collection is a modern hotel with everything for the discerning guest. While you're there, you might want to try a trip on the "Hjejlen", which started sailing on the Silkeborg Lakes in 1861 - and it's still sailing. It is the world's oldest coal-fired paddle steamer still in operation.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Hotel Herman Bang
description: This hotel is 350 metres from Frederikshavn Train Station and Ferry Terminal. It features free Wi-Fi. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, desk and private bathroom. American and Mexican cuisine can be enjoyed at Hotel Herman Bang's own Restaurant Empire. Other options include Restaurant Herman serving classic Danish dishes, as well as Café Empire that offers Italian coffee, paninis and desserts. Best Western Herman Bang's central location provides easy access to Frederikshavn's many shops and restaurants. Private parking spaces are found behind the hotel.

name: Hotel Kirstine
description: This hotel is 500 metres from Næstved Train Station. Free wired internet, tea/coffee facilities and cable TV are standard room features. Facilities include a sun terrace and a restaurant. Hotel Kirstine’s à la carte restaurant focuses on traditional Danish cuisine. Vegetarian dishes and children's meals are also available. It has a cosy, open fireplace during winter. Staff can help arrange canoeing trips on the Suså River. Free parking is offered at the hotel as well as two charging stations for electric cars (plug 16A CEE). BonBon Land Amusement Park is a 15-minute drive from Kirstine Hotel. Other area activities include golfing, as well as swimming at Karrebæksminde Beach, 10 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Eyde
description: This privately-owned hotel is located in central Herning, 200 metres from MCH Herning Congress Centre. It offers a gym and sauna, along with free WiFi and parking. Guest rooms at Best Western Plus Hotel Eyde are modern and classically decorated. Each features a flat-screen TV, work desk, iron and coffee/tea facilities. The hotel’s restaurant, Sankt Jørgen, serves traditional Danish cuisine. It provides nice views over the city, especially from Hotel Eyde's terrace that is open during warm months. The hotel's central location provides easy access to Herning’s shopping, dining and entertainment. Herning Train Station is only a 5-minute walk away. Jyske Bank Boxen is less than 4 km away.

name: Hotel Frederikshavn
description: Located only 50 metres from Danmarksgade pedestrian street in central Frederikshavn, this property offers free Wi-Fi and free parking. All rooms include a cable TV and work desk. A popular buffet breakfast is served every morning in the dining room. Packed lunches are available in request. Freshly made coffee is available at all times. Frederikshavn Ferry Terminal with connections to Norway, Sweden and Læsø Island, is situated 300 metres from the hotel. Palmestranden Beach is 3 km away.

name: Munkebjerg Hotel
description: This stylish hotel is surrounded by forest, 300 metres from the Vejle Fjord. It features a casino, spa and pool area, and terrace and restaurant with views of the water. Munkebjerg Hotel’s modern rooms have a flat-screen TV, designer furniture and a free Wi-Fi access. All overlook either the forest or fjord. Spa facilities include an indoor pool, saunas, hot tubs and massage chairs. More active guests can use the gym or tennis courts. Hotel Munkebjerg also has 3 restaurants and a lobby bar. Dining options range from traditional Danish dishes to gourmet cuisine. The cellar has 600 wines to choose from. Free parking is available on site. Vejle Golf Club is 2 km away, and packages can be arranged at Munkebjerg's reception.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Fredericia
description: This Best Western Plus hotel overlooks a small lake in the green, recreational area of Madsby Park. It offers bright, modern rooms with free WiFi. Frederica Sports Centre is next door, while Messe C Conference Centre is 300 metres away. Digital TV, work desks and private bathrooms with showers are standard at Best Western Plus Hotel Fredericia. All rooms feature historical photography of Fredericia town centre, which is within 5 minutes’ drive. The on-site restaurant serves Danish cuisine. A buffet breakfast is served every morning, while drinks are available all day at the hotel bar. The hotel can arrange green fees at Fredericia Golf Club, 200 metres away. Free entrance (1 ticket per stay) to Fredericia Sports Centre with subtropical waterpark and Fitness only 50 metres from the hotel. Subtropical waterpark will be closed from 15.th of August 2023 and on wards due to renovation. Indoor swimming pool will still be open for guests. Please visit Fredericia Sports Centres homepage for more information. (Tickets will be issued from the hotels reception - only 1 ticket per stay)

name: Zleep Hotel Køge
description: This harbour-side hotel is located 5 minutes’ walk from Køge’s town centre and 700 metres from Køge Train Station. It offers free parking. Cable TV and work desk are standard features in each guest room at Zleep Hotel Køge. Several rooms overlook the Køge harbour. About a 10-minute walk away is the Køge Bay beach, while the Køge Golf Course is 10 minutes away by car. The 24-hour reception staff is available to recommend other area activities and attractions.

name: Hotel Schaumburg
description: Next to Rådhustorvet Square, this hotel is 600 metres from Holstebro Train Station. There is free WiFi and afternoon coffee. All rooms at Hotel Schaumburg have a work desk, seating area and cable TV. Hotel Schaumburg’s Restaurant Ekte offers a variety of light dishes. The on-site bar, Fox & Hounds Scottish Pub, has a wide selection of whiskey and beer. Hotel staff can recommend nearby shops and restaurants. Storådalen Golf Club is 8 minutes’ drive away. Free public parking spaces are available next to the hotel.

name: Vejle Center Hotel
address: Willy Sorensens Plads 3, 7100 Vejle, South Denmark
description: Vejle Center Hotel is located in Vejle, 1.3 km from the Central Station and 10 minutes' walk from the shopping district. It offers free parking and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs and free Wi-Fi. Each room at Hotel Vejle Center has a seating area and a private bathroom with shower. Guests enjoy a one-time free access per stay to the neighbouring fitness centre and swimming pool. Pavillonen Restaurant has a terrace with views of the Vejle River, and offers buffet breakfast as well as Danish and international cuisine. Coffee and drinks are available at the lobby bar. Legoland Theme Park is a 30-minute drive away. St. Nicolai Church is a 15-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Lalandia Resort Billund
description: Just 5 minutes’ drive from Legoland Theme Park, this property is one of Denmark’s most popular resorts. It offers a 10,000 m² water park and modern cottages with flat-screen TVs and patios. Lalandia Billund Resort’s spacious cottages feature open-plan kitchen/living rooms with a dining area. All have an electric cooker, microwave and dishwasher. A private parking space is found directly outside each cottage. For relaxation, guests can use Lalandia Billund’s indoor and outdoor pools, saunas and hot tubs. More active types can work out in the gym or book an activity in the sports hall. Children will enjoy indoor minigolf, bowling and the Monky Tonky Land play centre. Catering for all tastes, numerous restaurants and cafés are located on site. Cottages are set between 500 metres and 3 km from Legoland. Billund Airport is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Comwell Kolding
description: Set beside Marielund Forest, just 1 km from Kolding Train Station, this hotel offers free WiFi. Comwell Kolding’s bright rooms have large windows, as well as a desk and a flat-screen TV. The hotel has a sauna and indoor pool. Other leisure options include billiards, table tennis and a summertime children’s playroom. Comwell Kolding’s restaurant offers seasonal menus, while Jes or No Bar provides light meals. The nearby forest provides nice hiking and jogging opportunities. A bus stop with connections to Kolding is 50 metres away.

name: Billund Airport Hotel
description: Situated next to Billund International Airport’s Terminal 4, this budget hotel is 5 minutes’ drive from Legoland. Featuring self check-in machines, a 24-hour front desk and free airport shuttle bus, getting to your soundproofed room can be convenient. Billund Airport Hotel's bright, simple rooms feature clean Scandinavian design, comfortable beds and a writing desk. Free WiFi and a flat-screen TV offer leisure. The 24-hour Billund Airport Hotel offers an early morning organic breakfast buffet and an evening bar where you can enjoy drinks. The lobby features a lounge area with a TV. Lalandia Resort & Water Park is 3 km from Billund Airport Hotel.

name: Scandic Olympic
description: Located amongst a range of popular tourist hot spots, boutiques and dining options, Scandic Olympic is ideal for guests wanting to discover Esbjerg and its surroundings. Guests can also enjoy free internet access. The hotel's professional staff are available to assist around the clock, and an express check-in facility provides extra convenience. It is dog-friendly and provides private parking on site for guests with a car. The rooms at Scandic Olympic are comfortable with facilities including an en suite. They feature a flat-screen TV, an in-room closet and a desk. The hotel features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax of an evening. Esbjerg Airport is around a 20-minute car trip from Scandic Olympic and Esbjerg Station is within walking distance. Fano is within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Skjern
description: Hotel Skjern is located on a quiet pedestrian street in the town of Skjern, just opposite the train station. It offers modern rooms with free WiFi and free parking. All rooms feature a work desk, seating area and cable TV. An electric kettle is provided in each room. General facilities at Skjern Hotel include a children’s playroom and a cosy lounge with newspapers. Golf, fishing and hiking are popular activities in the area around Hotel Skjern. River Skjern is only 600 metres away.

name: Milling Hotel Saxildhus
description: Set in a refurbished 19th-century building, this hotel is opposite Kolding Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and a popular breakfast. The Helligkorsgade pedestrian shopping street is 5 minutes’ walk away. All rooms at Hotel Saxildhus Kolding feature a flat-screen TV with satellite TV access. Most rooms have exposed wooden beams and traditional décor. A free afternoon snack is available every day, as well as free hot drinks and fruit in the lobby all day long. Hotel Saxildhus’s facilities include a free internet computer by the reception. Saxildhus is only 500 metres from Koldingshus Museum and the walking path surrounding Slotsø Lake. Staff can provide tourist information and other services.

name: Glostrup Park Hotel
description: This eco-friendly hotel is within 20 minutes’ drive of Copenhagen Airport, the city and the Bella Center. It offers an award-winning restaurant, free parking and free access to the wellness facilities. Flat-screen TVs, tea/coffee facilities and minibars are standard at Glostrup Park. Free Wi-Fi internet is offered throughout the hotel. The wellness centre has a sauna, solarium and gym. Steam rooms and massage showers are also available. Other relaxation options include Glostrup Park Hotel’s lobby fireplace and a TV lounge. The La Cocotte restaurant and wine cellar specialises in Danish-French cuisine made from fresh, seasonal ingredients.

name: Hotel Hirtshals
description: This harbour side hotel is just 300 metres from Hirtshals Train Station, the Norwegian ferry terminal and a sandy beach. It offers marina and sea views, plus free Wi-Fi and private parking. The simple rooms at Hotel Hirtshals have a TV and a private bathroom. All offer views of Tannis Bay or the Skagerrak Strait. Dating back to 1769, Hirtshals Kro is the hotel’s traditional restaurant and pub. During summer, guests can eat on the terrace and enjoy views of the busy marina. Hirtshals Hotel is 3 minutes’ drive from the Bunker Museum, a collection of excavated World War II-era defences.

name: Hotel Villa Brinkly
description: Located by Snekkersten Beach, this hotel offers parking and guest rooms with a flat-screen TV with Chrome card access but no Tv Channels, and free WiFi access. Helsingør city centre is an 8-minute drive from the hotel. All the individually decorated guest rooms at Hotel Villa Brinkly have garden views and a private bathroom with shower. Free tea and coffee is available at Villa Brinkly Hotel. Guests can relax in the garden and on the hotel’s terrace. Snekkersten Train Station is a 15-minute walk away. Copenhagen city centre is 46 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Strandtangen
description: This hotel is located by the scenic Skive Fjord. It offers an à la carte restaurant and spacious accommodation with free Wi-Fi and views of Skive Marina or the Krabbeholm Forest. All rooms and apartments of Hotel Strandtangen feature modern bathroom and the apartments have furnished balconies with views of the water. Apartments include floor heating and fully equipped kitchenettes. Strandtangen Hotel’s restaurant has modern décor and serves both Danish cuisine and international dishes. Its waterfront terrace is a popular meeting place in summer. Guests can relax in Strandtangen’s cosy lounge, which has a flat-screen TV and an open fireplace. Staff can help arrange a variety of activities, including canoeing and kayaking. Central Skive is 2.5 km from Hotel Strandtangen. Local buses stop just outside the door, and private parking is free for guests.

name: Golf Hotel Viborg
address: Hans Tausens Allé 2, 8800 Viborg, Central Jutland
description: Golf Hotel Viborg enjoys a tranquil setting by Søndersø Lake, a 10-minute walk from Viborg Cathedral. It offers free on-site parking and rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Golf Hotel Viborg include an electric kettle, work desk and a private bathroom with shower. Many rooms offer lake views and are furnished with classic Chesterfield furniture. Danish cuisine is available at Restaurant Brænderigaarden and Restaurant Golf Salonen. A buffet breakfast is served every day. Drinks are available in the bar. The hotel have all facilities to both relax and do execierces, with outdoor and indoor swimming pool. The Spa offers Sauna, Steambath, outdoor spa for up to 10 people and cold shock pool. And a new Fitness Center is also available. The staff can help arrange green fees on local golf courses. The 27-hole Viborg Golf Course is a 7-minute drive away. The Skovgaard Museum is located 650 metres away.

name: Comwell Borupgaard
description: Set in a North Zealand manor house, this hotel is within 10 minutes’ drive of Helsingør. It offers a large spa, gourmet cuisine and a gym. Comwell Borupgaard’s bright rooms include cable TV channels. All have a modern bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi access is available in the lobby. The in-house restaurant serves Danish and international cuisine based on fresh, locally sourced ingredients. Drinks, snacks and light dishes are available in the bar. Entrance to the spa and treatments can be booked and paid at the front desk. Featuring 14 treatment rooms, Comwell’s spa offers a variety of bookable treatments and massages. Guests can also take a stroll in the park surrounding the hotel, and Snekkersten Beach is only a 15-minute walk away. Snekkersten Train Station is 2 minutes’ walk from Comwell Borupgaard.

name: Nyborg Strand
description: Overlooking the Great Belt strait, Nyborg Strand is a beachfront property just 2 km from Nyborg’s Old Town. Odense city centre is within 30 minutes' drive. The on-site spa offers a sauna, hot tubs and a rain shower area. A cold water basin, relax lounge and foot baths are also featured. All rooms at Nyborg Strand include a TV, a work desk and a private bathroom. Tea/coffee facilities are also available in the rooms. Restaurant Stranden serves seasonal Danish and French cuisine. Grilled dishes are available at Bistroen, which features an outdoor terrace. Stjernebaren serves chilled beers and drinks in a relaxing atmosphere. Guests can exercise in the well-equipped gym, and play billiards or boules on site. The garden features a putting green, and a play area is available for children during summer months. Parking and WiFi are free. St Knud's Golf Club is 3 km from the hotel. Nyborg Fortress is a 5-minute drive away. Tennis and squash facilities are found nearby.

name: Scandic Regina
description: This pet-friendly hotel is located in Herning and features free Wi-Fi. It also offers a coffee bar, a sauna and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. All the rooms at Scandic Regina feature a seating area, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. They all offer a desk, an in-room closet and ironing facilities. Guests can dine at Scandic Regina's modern restaurant, which serves international and local cuisine. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. A wide choice of dining options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The hotel is ideally situated for sightseeing in Herning, with MCH Herning Kongrescenter only a short stroll away. Messecenter Herning is a short drive away.Revato

name: Hjerting Badehotel
description: Situated directly on the beach, this hotel is 9 km away from Esbjerg’s town centre. It offers free Wi-Fi, impressive North Sea views, along with a small sauna and fitness room. The light and airy guest rooms at Hjerting Badehotel all include a flat-screen TV and minibar. Several have scenic views over Skallingen and the islands of Fanø and Langli. Guests can enjoy gourmet cuisine and panoramic views of Ho Bay at the on-site Restaurant Strandpavillonen. Ship-Inn, the hotel’s English pub and café, serves light dishes and drinks in a relaxed setting. Bicycles can be rented at Badehotel Hjerting to explore the surroundings. Hotel staff can recommend several golf courses located nearby. Free parking is available on site.

name: Scandic Hvidovre
description: Situated in Hvidovre, Scandic Hvidovre is an easy drive from Brondby and provides a sauna, free Wi-Fi and an indoor pool. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel features comfortable 4-star rooms and a bar. The rooms at Scandic Hvidovre feature a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. They provide heating, an in-room closet and a desk. Those staying at Scandic Hotel Hvidovre can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally situated for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. Scandic Hvidovre is within a 20-minute car ride of Copenhagen Airport and Tivoli Gardens. Bella Center, University of Copenhagen and Nyhavn are within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Ringsted
description: This comfortable hotel in Ringsted provides complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as meeting rooms and a sauna. It also offers a 24-hour reception, a concierge and bicycle rental. Scandic Ringsted provides a garden to relax in, as well as free public parking on site. A gym is available to guests wanting to keep active while away. The rooms at Scandic Ringsted have blackout curtains and all the essentials for a comfortable stay. There are also a number of rooms geared towards families. Scandic Ringsted features a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax of an evening. For those preferring to eat out, the surrounding area offers several bars and restaurants with a choice of varied cuisines. A generous buffet breakfast is served daily. Roskilde Airport is a 35-minute drive from the hotel. The surrounding countryside ensures plenty of opportunity for relaxing walks.Revato

name: Scandic Opus Horsens
description: This modern hotel features a 12-metre high, Kim Utzon-designed lobby atrium. Its bright rooms include a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee facilities. Horsens Train Station is 5 minutes’ drive away. Relaxation options at Scandic Opus Horsens include a sauna and a steam bath. Massages and reflexology sessions can also be booked. More active guests can use the hotel gym. The 4th-floor Restaurant Opus offers panoramic views over Nørrestrand Nature Reserve. It serves internationally inspired cuisine with a Danish influence. Most of the seasonal ingredients used are sourced locally. Green fees for several nearby golf clubs can be arranged at reception.

name: Hotel Klitbakken
description: Situated next to Løkken’s main square, Torvet, Hotel Klitbakken is 200 metres from a beach on the Skagerak Sea. All rooms have a balcony. The on-site café bar has local art exhibitions. Each guest room has a private bathroom and town views. During summer, the hotel terrace is a nice place to sit and relax. Free private parking spaces are available. Frederikshavn is a 1-hour from Klitbakken Hotel, while Skagen is 82 km away. Løkken Golf Club is within a few minutes’ drive.

name: Køge Bed & Kitchen - Rooms
description: No description found

name: Best Western Hotel Hillerod
description: We live in the heart of North Sealand. Our trails take you from the baroque history and through to today’s modern activities. Magnificent forests, lakes and sports routes surround us. The city and the nature has inspired us. We have created our own little village with twisted avenues, green plants and sunshine ray. Our rooms have the opportunity for families, business or couples on vacation. At the Best Western Hotel Hillerod we greet you and you can recognize us for our desire and passion for creating the best setting for you and your stay. We take great pride in helping you to find everything you want to explore. At Restaurant Krydderiet, we take pride in presenting you for the best ingredients. During the summer, we collect strawberries from local farmer’s fields, in the autumn we collect plants and mushrooms in the forest and outside our windows, we grow our own herbs. The passion for food and our professional commitment makes a visit at us an experience for all senses.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Silkeborg
description: Situated in Silkeborg, Scandic Silkeborg offers 3-star accommodation, as well as a sauna and an indoor pool. Those staying at the property also have access to free wireless internet and on-site parking. Every room at Scandic Silkeborg features a private bathroom and all the necessities for a comfortable stay. All provide an in-room safe, a desk and a flat-screen TV. Scandic Silkeborg houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax of an evening. Guests are able to start the morning with a sumptuous buffet breakfast each day. Scandic Silkeborg offers disabled parking for guests with a car. Karup Airport is within a 40-minute drive.Revato

name: Bed and Breakfast Phønix
description: No description found

name: Best Western Torvehallerne
description: Nice hotel in a gastronomic multi-store building The Best Western ToRVEhallerne is an exciting modern multi-store building in the heart of Vejle, just two minutes' walk from Vejle Station. The house contains a large exclusive lounge area with a gin bar, three different restaurants, as well as a meeting and conference department. Best Western ToRVEhallerne offers 74 rooms in a total of 6 different room categories. The style is modern and international, and in all rooms there are very comfortable beds, as the hotel believes that a good day starts with a good night's sleep. Fitness As a guest at the Best Western Hotel ToRVEhallerne in Vejle, you can enjoy a work-out completely free of charge at Lido Fitness, which is just 300 meters from the hotel. Lido Fitness offers a huge fitness department of more than 900 m2. 3 restaurants In Best Western ToRVEhallerne guests can choose between many different gastronomic experiences at 3 different restaurants. At Oasia, luxury sushi, japas, sashimi and wok are served, while Jacobsen tempts with solid Danish classics. Finally, there is the southern European feature Bistecca, where Italian cuisine seduces with a multitude of specialties and steaks. Mega lounge In the heart of Best Western ToRVEhallerne you will find the mega lounge – 600 sq m. large lounge with glass roof for the stars and a ceiling 14 meters high! The GINBAR in the mega lounge offers fantastic cocktails, cold draft beer and a good glass of wine. Conference The hotel has 14 meeting and conference rooms, the largest of which can accommodate up to 450 people.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Korning Kro
description: Situated in the village of Korning, this property offers free Wi-Fi, an in-house restaurant, as well as rooms with cable TV and a private bathroom. Central Horsens is 15 minutes' drive away. Hotel Korning Kro's restaurant offers quality Danish and international cuisine made from fresh, seasonal ingredients. Guests can try traditional stews or roasts as well as French-flavoured dishes. Relaxation options include a furnished courtyard garden. Children will enjoy the on-site playground. Free parking is possible on site. Givskud Zoo is 30 km away, while Legoland Theme Park is 40 minutes' drive from the property.

name: Refborg Hotel
description: Cozy hotel with many possibilities near LEGOLAND®. The cozy Refborg Hotel Billund is located in the middle of Billund city and welcomes LEGOLAND® guests and everyone else who will benefit from the fine location in relation to attractions, activities and Billund Airport. There are good opportunities to play golf or use the fishing rod, you can visit Billund Trotting Track and LEGO® House (only 50 meters from the hotel) or you can embark upon some good walks in the beautiful surroundings. With its central location, Refborg Hotel, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western is the ideal base for exploring Central Jutland. Within 45 minutes, it is possible to drive to several large Jutland cities, such as Vejle, Horsens, Esbjerg, Kolding, and a lot of other places worth visiting. All characterized by marvelous sights, great experiences, and a unique culture. After an active day, you can return to Refborg's restaurant Spiseriet, whose menu is inspired by Nordic cuisine and the city's best-reviewed eatery. We place great emphasis on the use of sustainable ingredients, ecology and quality in every meal served. The ingredients match the season, and we go to great lengths to find the best items and dishes, so you can be pleasantly surprised.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Legoland
description: This family-friendly hotel features free gym access. It has a private entrance to the popular Legoland® Billund Theme Park, open between the end of March until October. Rooms include free WiFi, flat-screen TVs and Lego gifts for all children. The colourful rooms of Hotel Legoland® include a tea/coffee maker and a child-friendly bathroom. Many rooms offer great views of the theme park, while some also include themed décor with play tables and Lego bricks. On-site children’s facilities include a playroom, playground as well as numerous activities. There is also a shop with the most recent Lego products. The hotel is only 800 metres from Lalandia Water Park, and Billund Airport is less than 10 minutes’ drive away. Free parking is possible at Hotel Legoland®.

name: Enjoy Resorts Marina Fiskenæs
description: This South Jutland property is on the Fiskenæs peninsula, 1 km from central Gråsten. It offers accommodation with a fully-equipped kitchen and free WiFi. Leisure options include a water park and a free gym and spa. All apartments and holiday homes at Enjoy Resort Marina Fiskenæs feature a living room with digital TV and a DVD player. Guests can also enjoy a dishwasher and washing machine. Communal facilities include a restaurant, a private beach area and a climbing wall. A sauna, steam room and cold bath are among the spa facilities offered, and guests can book beauty treatments on site. A playground and playroom are available for younger guests. Enjoy Resort Marina is within 20 minutes’ drive of Dybbøl Banke Museum, while Gråsten Castle, royal summer residence, is just a 5-minute drive away. On-site parking is free.

name: Hotel Troense
description: Located on the idyllic island of Tåsinge, this waterfront hotel overlooks Troense’s harbour and the Great Belt strait. It offers a sea-view restaurant and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Troense’s guest rooms are housed in 3 charming buildings with either sea or garden views. Each has a TV, work desk, along with a seating area. Some feature a private patio. Troense Hotel’s restaurant offers a varied à la carte menu. In summer, guests can enjoy their meals out on the terrace. Valdemars Castle and Egeskov Palace are both within 20 minutes’ drive of Hotel Troense. Svendborg and the island of Funen are only 6 km away. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Vilcon Hotel & Konferencegaard
description: Vilcon Hotel & Konferencegaard is conveniently situated amid beautiful rural surroundings and offers tranquil views of the surrounding woodlands and fields. Vilcon Hotel & Konferencegaard is located on a typically Danish old farm, now transformed into a charming hotel and conference centre. A seasonal menu can be enjoyed in the hotel restaurant. All the external buildings have been reconstructed to modern standards while maintaining the historic charm of the original farm. The on-site sports hall has extensive recreational facilities and invites guests to play tennis, badminton, table tennis, volleyball, petanque, hockey and access to a putting green. The 3 closest golf courses are within 7 to 15 km. Canoeing tours on the Tystrup Bavelse lakes and the river Suså and trips to the Great Belt Bridge can be arranged.

name: Hotel Hedegaarden
description: Modern family-owned hotel in Vejle - close to LEGOLAND Hotel Hedegaarden, BW Signature Collection is a genuine family hotel. It was built in 1968, but in 1984 Britt and Poul Jørgensen took over, and today they own it together with their two daughters Rikke and Marianne. Rikke is educated in administration and economics, whereas Marianne is a cook and married to the chef of the hotel Tom Thomsen. Over the years the family has made several large renovations, so that today nobody can tell that the oldest parts of the hotel are more than 40 years old. The hotel is situated in the northern part of Vejle and right beside the motorway exit Vejle Nord. Both on the north and the south side of Vejle Fjord the forest-clad hills invite to recreation and nature experiences and along the fjord there are lots of fine walks and the possibility of a swim in the waves. Only ten minutes from the hotel you will find a large deer park with fallow and sika deer and right beside it Skyttehushaven, a large park with a playground for the kids. In Vejle there are cozy pedestrian streets, department stores and a large indoor shopping centre.bestwestern.com

name: Løkken Badehotel Apartments
description: This hotel is only 300 metres from Løkken Beach and 20 minutes’ drive from Fårup Sommerland Amusement Park. It offers traditional Danish food and a hot tub, sauna and indoor pool. Løkken Badehotel’s apartments feature kitchens with refrigerators, dishwashers and tea/coffee facilities. Living rooms with cable TV are standard features, while a communal laundry room is also available on site. Løkken Badehotel Apartments' central location offers easy access to shops, cafés and bars. Løkken Golf Club is 2 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Lisboa
description: Hotel Lisboa is a cozy and bright family-run hotel located at the southern end of Frederikshavn close to forest and beach. The hotel's 32 double rooms are bright and homey with their own bathroom, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The rooms are in a separate building, thus ensuring a peaceful stay where it is possible to completely relax. From Hotel Lisboa, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western you have the perfect starting point for a holiday in North Jutland, where a variety of opportunities are in the area. Everything from shopping facilities, exciting cultural experiences, and plenty of opportunities to have an active holiday, e.g; fishing, horseback riding, golf and surfing. It is also just a five-minute walk to the beach and scenic Bangsbo. In Frederikshavn many exciting things happen and not least there is the ferry that sails to Gothenburg, Oslo and Laeso. The hotel's restaurant serves well prepared and delicious a la carte dishes as well as traditional home cooking.bestwestern.com

name: Krebshuset / Kelz0rdk
description: Set in Sorø, 49 km from The Viking Ship Museum, Krebshuset / Kelz0rdk offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 3-star hotel features free WiFi and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 31 km from BonBon-Land. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. At Krebshuset / Kelz0rdk all rooms have bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. At Krebshuset / Kelz0rdk you will find a restaurant serving American, Steakhouse and Thai cuisine. A vegetarian option can also be requested. The hotel offers a business centre for guest use. Museum of Contemporary Art is 49 km from Krebshuset / Kelz0rdk, while Roskilde Museum is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 86 km from the accommodation.

name: Sdr. Omme Kro & Hotel
description: When you stay at Sdr. Omme Kro & Hotel in Sonder Omme, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Skovsnogen Artspace and Grindsted Kirke. Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Strandhotel Klitrosen
description: Strandhotel Klitrosen are located in a small and old fishing village called Slettestrand. The beach are only 600 meters away. The nearest town is Fjerritslev about 12 km away. Strandhotel Klitrosen provides free wi-fi and parking. there are 4 charging stations, where you can charge your electric car against a fee. All rooms have either a terrace or a balcony, own TV and bathroom with a shower. The superior rooms have a sofa, which can be made into two extra beds. The standard rooms have 2 chairs and a small table. In high season the restaurant is open and if the weather allows, you can enjoy your lunch or dinner on the terrace. Every morning you can enjoy your breakfast in the restaurant. Right next to Strandhotel Klitrosen you will find Svinkløv Klitplantage both for nice walks and mountain bikes. 2 km in the opposite direction you will find the beautiful Fosdalen, which is a 1 km long ravine who cuts into the moraine hills, who is about 60 meters above sea level. Aalborg is 45 km away, and Thisted 45 km in the other direction.

name: Hotel Løkken Strand
description: Located in Løkken, Hotel Løkken Strand features a garden, terrace, bar, and free WiFi throughout the property. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The property is non-smoking and is set 400 metres from Lokken Beach. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. Guests at Hotel Løkken Strand can enjoy a continental breakfast. Lyngby Beach is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Hvorup Klit Beach is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Aalborg Airport, 34 km from Hotel Løkken Strand.

name: Hotel Medio
description: This hotel is 1.5 km off the E20, a 1-hour drive from Legoland. It offers free parking and WiFi. The terrace provides a chance to relax after a long drive. Cable TV, private bathrooms and simple décor are standard features in Hotel Medio Fredericia's rooms Drinks can be enjoyed in the bar. Daily specials are served in the hotel restaurant each evening. A children’s playground offers swings and a trampoline. Popular area activities include hiking, fishing and cycling. The old truss bridge that crosses Denmark's Little Belt strait is 4 km from Medio Hotel.

name: Hotel Phønix Hjørring
description: Hotel Phoenix Hjoerring, BW Signature Collection is a really good starting point for experiencing the atmosphere and the sights of the Top of Denmark right from the North Sea to Skagen. Moreover, Hjoerring has a lively shopping milieu with among other things the new and large shopping centre Metropol. The hotel is situated right in the centre of Vendsyssel’s main town Hjoerring, and this has been the case right since the first of May 1887. At that time, it was named W. Kyppers Hotel and with its three stories and fine ornaments of the façade, it was absolutely the most beautiful building of the town. Later on, it was named Hotel Bristol, for a period it was a temperance hotel, and during World War II the Germans occupied the hotel. After the war the hotel got new owners, and they gave the hotel its present name: Hotel Phoenix. According to the mythology the firebird Phoenix lives for many years before it burns up and resurrects. This is precisely what happened to the hotel: at first it was renovated from top to bottom and later it was extended with a new story. The target of the owner and the skilled staff is to combine the proud historical traditions with the demands and wishes of the present time and of the future and to create a hotel, which gives the guests the optimal experience.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Cabinn Vejle
description: Overlooking Vejle River, this modern hotel is 200 metres from Vejle Train Station and opposite the town's pedestrian street. It offers free WiFi and en-suite rooms featuring a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Simple design, tea and coffee facilities, as well as a work desk are standard to each guest room at Cabinn Vejle. Some have a city view. Restaurants and shops are within walking distance, as well as golf courses within 20 minutes' drive. Both Legoland and Givskud Zoo’s lion park are 30 minutes’ drive away from Cabinn Vejle. The highway E45 can be reached in 5-minutes by car, while Billund Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Fredensborg Store Kro
description: Located in the charming countryside of North Zealand, neighbouring Fredensborg Royal Castle, is Hotel Fredensborg Store Kro. In its elegant, traditional atmosphere guests can experience history at first hand. All Fredensborg Store Kro’s guest rooms and suites are beautifully and individually decorated. Seasonal ingredients are featured at the castle restaurant. Guests can choose from a selection of Danish and international cuisine. The restaurant is open daily for lunch, while dinner service is available from Wednesday to Saturday. Parties, receptions and other events can be arranged both in the restaurant and the reception rooms. These are suitable for groups of 10-120 people, from the Gallery to the Queen Margrethe Hall. Meeting rooms are practical, convenient and contain all modern AV and conference equipment.

name: Trinity Hotel & Konference Center
address: Gl. Faergevej 30, Snoghoj, 7000 Fredericia, South Denmark
description: Trinity is located 10 minutes' drive from Fredericia and has a view of green areas by the Old Little Belt Bridge, and direct access to wonderful trails and nature experiences. All rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with a shower and tea and coffee making facilities. Restaurant Lillebælt is known for its high gastronomic level. The hotel's chefs work from modern Nordic cuisine, delicious, energizing and nutritious food prepared from fresh seasonal ingredients and according to the best traditions of the profession. The entire area around Fredericia and Lillebælt offers a myriad of exciting experiences and activities. Visit Visit Fredericia's website, where there is plenty of inspiration and practical information.

name: Pension Elmehoj
description: Located in Stege Town Center, Pension Elmehøj is a perfect starting point from which to explore Stege. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Pension Elmehøj. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature carpeting, clothes rack, linens, towels, heating. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Pension Elmehøj.Agoda

name: Milling Hotel Park
description: Situated 100 metres from Middelfart Train Station, this hotel is about 1.5 km from Middelfart’s harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and an on-site restaurant serving traditional Danish cuisine. A flat-screen TV with cable channels and classical décor are standard to each Hotel Park guest room. Some also have a spacious seating area. Free hot beverages and fruit are available all day, along with free cake and popcorn in the afternoon. During nice weather, guests can take their meals onto Park Hotel’s terrace. Communal facilities include a games room with billiards, darts and table tennis. An internet computer in the lobby is also available. The 12th-century St. Nicholas Church and Lillebælt Golf Club are both within 20 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Legoland Theme Park is 1-hour drive away.

name: Danninghus
description: No description found

name: Comwell Kongebrogaarden
description: Comwell Kongebrogaarden Hotel overlooks the Lillebælt Strait, 5 minutes’ drive from Middelfart and Snoghøj. It offers an indoor swimming pool, hot tub and sauna. All rooms have a private balcony or shared terrace. Flat-screen TVs, tea/coffee making facilities and seating areas are found in each room. Relaxation options include a lounge with a fireplace and a large, sea-view terrace. The in-house restaurant serves Danish and international dishes. Comwell Kongebrogaarden is situated next to a large marina. The green surroundings of Kongebroskoven Deer Park are ideal for walks. There are 16 golf courses within a 1-hour drive of the hotel.

name: Hotel Udsigten Marstal
description: Featuring garden and sea views, Udsigten Marstal is an accommodation located in Marstal. The property offers free WiFi. Extra beds are available at this property, please contact the accommodation if desired. Continental breakfast is served daily at the property. The hotel offers a sun terrace. Guests can also relax in the garden or on the shared lounge area.

name: Comwell Sorø
description: Set amongst central Zealand’s scenic and peaceful countryside is this hotel. It offers views of the surrounding greenery and Lake Pedersborg, a 5-minute walk away. Guest rooms at Comwell Sorø are classically decorated in a cosy style with carpeting. Each has a work desk and a TV. The in-house Restaurant Solaris with its panoramic views serves a varied, seasonal menu. Guests at Sorø Comwell can enjoy billiards, darts and other games. Bicycles can also be rented on site. Sorø’s town centre is about 2 km away. Sorø Golf Club is 15 minutes’ drive away. On-site parking spaces are available at the hotel.

name: Hotel Randers
description: Enjoy a stay in the elegant surroundings of this charming 1850s hotel, which is found close to all major transport links in Randers. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Fitness and sauna are also free of charge. Originally built in 1856, the atmosphere at Hotel Randers is further enhanced by its original artwork and interior detail. In addition, the antique rooms feature classic antique furniture and have fresh bathrooms with bathtubs. The other neatly presented guest rooms at Hotel Randers have a flat-screen TV, a work desk and a bathroom with a shower. The on-site restaurant offers fresh dishes, accompanied by selected wines, in a chic atmosphere. Light meals, beer and wine are offered in the fashionable Brasserie Mathisen, which was developed on site with renowned Danish design company, Bønnelycke. The Hornsleth Lounge is the hotel bar, where you will find a wide range of wines and drinks.

name: Montra Skaga Hotel
description: Skaga Hotel is conveniently located just 100 metres from Nordsøen Oceanarium. It offers free on-site parking and rooms with free WiFi. Color Line Ferry Terminal is just 500 metres away, while Fjord Line and Smyril Line Ferry Terminals are 1.5 km away. All rooms at Hotel Skaga have a TV, a seating area and a work desk. The rooms come with a bathroom and shower. Guests can enjoy a game of table tennis or pool in the games room or relax in the sauna. The Panorama Restaurant offers a buffet breakfast, à la carte dishes, daily specials and a children's menu. Drinks are available in the cosy lounge area. Lilleheden Train Station is a 3-minute walk away. Hirtshals Golf Club is 4 km from the hotel.

name: Legoland Castle Hotel Denmark
description: LEGOLAND Castle Hotel, themed as a castle in LEGO style, is situated outside of the main entrance of LEGOLAND® Billund Resort, and 800 metres from Lalandia Water Park. The hotel offers a fitness centre, free parking and WiFi, a children’s playground and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can play and sleep in either Princess rooms, Wizard rooms or Dragon Knight’s rooms. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. The units at LEGOLAND Castle Hotel feature air conditioning and a desk. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the property. The hotel restaurant Knight’s Tavern is open daily, and features an indoor play area. LEGO House Billund is 1.2 km from the property, while Billund Airport is 2.9 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Ilulissat
description: Hotel Ilulissat is located in the heart of Ilulissat, which means that everything you will ever need is just around the corner. At the top of the hotel you will find our eatery, Rooftop. From here you can enjoy the panoramic view of the Ice fiord as well as the town of Ilulissat, while enjoying your breakfast, lunch, dinner or maybe just a cup of coffee and a small cake. You could also lounge in our lobby to calming music, whilst drinking a beer with friend and family.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Sisimiut
description: Situated between the Præstefjeldet and Kællingehætten Mountains, this hotel is 5 km from Sisimiut Airport. It offers a tour desk, a French-inspired à la carte restaurant and rooms with flat-screen TVs. The rooms of Hotel Sisimiut overlook the mountains or the colourful houses in Sisimiut town centre. Each room includes a writing desk and armchairs to relax in. Sisimiut Hotel’s restaurant offers a varied menu featuring fresh seafood and an extensive wine list. All dishes are based on local ingredients. Staff at Sisimut can help arrange dog-sledding tours, fishing excursions and hiking tours. Skiing and diving are other popular activities in and around Sisimiut.

name: Hotel Angmagssalik
description: Set in the rugged landscape above the picturesque village of Tasiillaq in Greenland, Hotel Angmagssalik offers comfortable rooms and a buffet breakfast. The village can be reached by helicopter from Kulusuk Airport. All the heated rooms at Angmagssalik Hotel have a small work desk. Many rooms feature a satellite TV and private bathroom with shower. Others have an in-room sink and shared bathroom facilities. Dishes like meatballs and fish are served at the on-site restaurant. Refreshing drinks are offered in the bar. The surrounding area is ideal for hiking. The hotel offers free transfers to the village heliport. The village centre is located down a steep hill, and has a bar, pizzeria and a supermarket. A football pitch and a museum can also be found.

name: Hotel Hans Egede
description: Set in Nuuk, Hotel Hans Egede offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness centre, a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. Hotel Hans Egede offers a continental or Full English/Irish breakfast. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Nuuk, like skiing. The nearest airport is Nuuk Airport, 5 km from Hotel Hans Egede.

name: Hhe Express
description: HHE Express features accommodation in Nuuk. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel has a restaurant and a bar. At the hotel, rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Speaking Danish, English and Greenlandic, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. The nearest airport is Nuuk Airport, 5 km from HHE Express.

name: Hotel Disko Island
description: Facing the beachfront in Qeqertarsuaq, Hotel Disko Island has a shared lounge and a bar. Guests can enjoy city views. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. At Hotel Disko Island the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel Disko Island. The nearest airport is Aasiaat Airport, 76 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Kulusuk
description: This hotel, 5 minutes’ drive from Kulusuk Airport, is located amongst eastern Greenland’s scenic beauty. It offers a quiet setting with fantastic fjord views, as well as an on-site restaurant and bar. The homey Hotel Kulusuk offers comfortable accommodation in standard rooms. Each guest room features satellite TV, a work desk and a private bathroom with a shower. Mountain views can be enjoyed from all rooms. Kulusuk Hotel staff will gladly assist in planning glacier and dog sledding tours, as well as suggest hiking routes. Free airport transfer services can also be arranged.

name: Inuk Hostels
description: Inuk Hostels has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Nuuk. Among the various facilities are a bar and a private beach area. The hostel also features free WiFi and free private parking. At the hostel the rooms are fitted with a shared bathroom and bed linen. Guests at Inuk Hostels can enjoy a continental breakfast. The nearest airport is Nuuk Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Faroe Islands
description: Rest well at our new hotel in Torshavn, just five minutes from the beautiful Svartafoss Waterfall, Nordic House, and the National Museum of the Faroe Islands. There’s plenty of shopping, natural areas, and restaurants within a few minutes, and you can get around easily with a bus stop outside our doors. Our on-site restaurant features local produce and is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.Hilton

name: Hotel Tórshavn
description: Located by Tórshavn Harbour, this hotel is 300 metres from the Old Town and government buildings at Tinganes. Flat-screen TVs, tea/coffee makers and private bathrooms are found in all rooms. Some rooms at Hotel Tórshavn provide views of the harbour and the Nólsoy Fjord. Each has a writing desk and premium movie channels on demand. Hvonn Brasserie serves Italian, Mexican and Asian dishes. Coffee, light meals and late-night cocktails are offered at Hvonn Café and Bar. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Tórshavn Hotel. A shuttle service to Vágar Airport is possible on request.

name: Havgrim Seaside Hotel 1948
description: Located in Tórshavn, 2.2 km from Sandagerð Beach, Havgrim Seaside Hotel 1948 provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The hotel features family rooms. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Havgrim Seaside Hotel 1948 also provide guests with free WiFi, while selected rooms include a city view. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available daily at Havgrim Seaside Hotel 1948. The nearest airport is Vágar, 47 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Føroyar
description: The natural grass roof of this peaceful, design hotel matches the surrounding green countryside. All rooms overlook Nólsoy Fjord and central Tórshavn, which is 2 km away. Wi-Fi is free. Hotel Føroyar was designed by well-known Danish architects, Friis & Moltke. Guest rooms feature calm colours and bright, modern design by Philippe Starck and Montana. All have cable and satellite TV channels. The rugged local landscape is popular amongst hikers. Føroyar Hotel is 3 minutes’ drive from the Nordic House cultural centre. The old town, Tinganes, is 3 km away.

name: Hotel Hafnia
description: Hotel Hafnia is in Torshavn’s Old Town, right on the main street, Áarvegur. It offers free in-room Wi-Fi. Guest rooms feature a minibar, tea/coffee facilities and a private bathroom with shower. All are equipped with satellite TV, and some include a seating area and free sauna access. Hafnia Restaurant serves international cuisine as well as seafood and other specialities from the Faroe Islands. The popular breakfast buffet includes locally sourced ingredients. Bagels, salads and home-baked items are available at Kafe Kaspar. The airport shuttle stops right outside Hafnia Hotel, and the surrounding streets have shops and restaurants. Staff is happy to provide information on nearby sights and activities.

name: Heima í Stovu
description: Heima í Stovu has a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Hvalba. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. With a shared bathroom, rooms at the hotel also boast a mountain view. At Heima í Stovu, rooms include a seating area. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Speaking Danish, English, Spanish and Faroese, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception. The nearest airport is Vágar Airport, 122 km from Heima í Stovu.

name: Mølin Guesthouse
description: Mølin Guesthouse features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Skálavík. Guests can enjoy sea views. At the hotel, rooms come with a wardrobe. All rooms come with a coffee machine and a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms will provide you with a kitchen equipped with a fridge. At Mølin Guesthouse rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests at Mølin Guesthouse will be able to enjoy activities in and around Skálavík, like hiking. The nearest airport is Vágar Airport, 82 km from the hotel.

name: Clarion Hotel Stockholm
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Stockholm in Stockholm, SE near the Royal Opera, Casino Cosmopol and the Stockholm Globe Arena. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, free Internet access, a spa, a restaurant and an indoor pool. All guest rooms have free wireless high-speed Internet and flat-screen TVs with free movie and sports channels. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Stockholm hotels like our Clarion Hotel Stockholm. There is 24-hour room service and valet parking available. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 SEK/stay per pet.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Birger Jarl
description: The stylish Hotel Birger Jarl is 300 metres from Rådmansgatan Metro Station and the Stockholm Observatory. It offers traditional Swedish cuisine and free Wi-Fi. Each individually designed room features the best in modern lighting and décor. All have a TV, minibar and comfortable armchairs. Guests have access to tea/coffee making facilities. Birger Jarl's restaurant offers a menu with a variety of Swedish dishes, while the stylish lobby bar provides lighter meals in a casual setting. Stureplan, Stockholm’s nightclub and shopping district, is a 10-minute walk away. Staff will gladly help guests with directions or recommend local attractions such as the Strindberg Museum.

name: Scandic Klara
description: Situated less than a 10-minute stroll from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, Scandic Klara provides guests with an ideal base when visiting Stockholm. It has a gym, as well as free Wi-Fi, a sauna and an express check-in and check-out feature. This modern hotel offers a range of amenities, including a safe, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. There is public parking nearby for guests with a car. Just minutes from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore what the local nightlife has to offer. After a day of discovering the local region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each provide a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Scandic Klara has a convenient café where guests can unwind with a drink before discovering the property's surrounds. Lunch and dinner are available daily at Grand Cafe Klara. A variety of dining options can also be found in the surrounding area. Scandic Klara is close to Stockholm Central Station, making it easy for guests to discover Stockholm and its surrounding areas. The local area is also famous for its shopping.Revato

name: Clarion Hotel Amaranten
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Amaranten in Stockholm, SE near the Stockholm city center, Waterfront Congress, Ralambshovsparken, Vastermalmsgallerian, Stockholm Castle and the ABBA Museum. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a spa and wellness center, an indoor pool and a business center, to name a few. All guest rooms have irons and ironing boards, while select rooms come with refrigerators, balconies and hair dryers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza
description: This hotel is housed in an impressive 1880s building opposite Humlegården Park and the National Library of Sweden. It offers a quality gourmet restaurant and free Wi-Fi. Elite Hotel Stockholm Plaza’s rooms feature colourful modern décor, cable TV and fresh bathrooms with free toiletries. Some rooms include a seating area. The award-winning Vassa Eggen Steak House uses top-class Swedish beef, lamb and pork. The minimalist interior design creates a Manhattan-style fine dining setting. A free internet computer is found in the lobby. Guests can also book the hotel sauna. Elite Stockholm Plaza’s central location provides easy access to shopping and clubbing at trendy Stureplan. Östermalmstorg Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Best Western Plus Time Hotel
description: Best Western Plus Time Hotel is a wonderful four-star hotel, centrally located in Stockholm. At Time Hotel we welcome you with a warm atmosphere in a vibrant part of central Stockholm. Our hotel located minutes from Odenplan has a modern, Asian-inspired design that will make your stay extra enjoyable. All our guests are welcomed into a large, airy lobby with bright colors which will make you feel at home. Feel at home in our 144 bright and tasteful furnished guest rooms which all have amenities as flat screen televisions, heated bathroom floors and wood parquet flooring. The rooms are immaculately styled, accentuated with color and most of our rooms have a French balcony. For your convenience we also provide complementary wireless high-speed internet in all parts of the building as well as a computer equipped business office. We also recommend a visit in our elegant lobby bar with a modern decor, and why not combine it with a pleasant stay in our relax room with sauna. These features make the Best Western Plus Time Hotel the number one choice in this part of Stockholm. Because the hotel is strategically located both near downtown and near walking paths by the water, you're close to mostly everything in our beautiful capital, which is appreciated by all kinds of travelers. From here you can explore on foot the city with its many interesting buildings and sights as well as many pubs, restaurants and cafes with a wide range of tastes. Stockholm's nightlife is all that you would expect with theatres, nightclubs and cinemas. At the Hotel you will find comfortable friendly surroundings to relax in.
