Our attentive, multilingual staff takes pride in providing professionalized service to all our guests. So whether you are here on business or on vacation for a few days or a few weeks we strive to do the utmost to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Hotel Sign
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Sign in Stockholm, SE near the Stockholm Central Station and the Arlanda Express train to Arlanda Airport. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, an outdoor heated pool and more. All guest rooms have air cooling units and come equipped with hair dryers and TVs. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Stockholm hotels like our Clarion Hotel Sign. Pet charge: 200 KR/stay per pet. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Radisson Blu Royal Viking Hotel, Stockholm
description: This hotel is situated beside Central Station, 8 minutes’ walk from Stockholm Town Hall. Guests enjoy free entrance to the gym. The entrance fee for pool and saunas is 200 SEK. Breakfast is free for children under 7 years, while children up to 12 years have a discount. All the air-conditioned guest rooms at Radisson Blu Royal Viking have luxury beds and a bathtub or shower. Each room features a satellite TV and minibar. The in-house restaurant Stockholm Fisk serves internationally inspired cuisine, while HIGH - Cocktail Bar on the 9th floor offers city views. Archipelago boat trips depart from 2 nearby harbours and the Arlanda Express airport train departs from beside the Royal Viking. Drottninggatan shopping street is just a 5-minute walk away and the Old Town is a 15-minute walk away.

name: At Six
description: Located right in the City Centre, steps away from shopping, nightlife, sights and transport, At Six, Ascend Hotel Collection is a perfect base to focus on your Stockholm destination in a whole new way. Elegance with a twist permeates our non-smoking Stockholm hotel, a new kind of exclusive urban lifestyle hotel guests can experience with all senses. We offer modern art and contemporary design by award-winning London-based Universal Design Studio, a vibrant restaurant and bar scene with an outstanding rooftop restaurant and additional amenities like free WiFi, a business center, 12 meeting rooms, gym and spa. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Brommavik Hotel
description: Situated in Stockholm's Bromma district, 5 minutes drive from Stockholm-Bromma Airport, this quiet hotel offers free Wi-Fi and parking. The modern, stylish rooms have a fridge and a flat-screen TV. The rooms of Brommavik Hotel feature a seating area, a tea/coffee maker and cable TV. Some include a private spa bath. Sundbyberg Station is a 5 minute walk from Hotel Brommavik, and the train ride to Stockholm Central Station takes just 10 minutes. In addition, the Solvalla Horse Racing Track is about 1 km away. The Hotel has a cozy sauna and relaxation room that can be booked for private sessions, and is included in the stay when booking the Superior, Luxury or Deluxe Family rooms. The Hotel offers access to a real fitness center with proper gym equipment.

name: Best Western Hotel Bentleys
description: Best Western Hotel Bentleys is housed in an 18th century building on Drottninggatan shopping street in central Stockholm. It offers 119 guest rooms with a 24-hour reception and rooms with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Hotel Bentleys feature Gustavian-era décor and a private bathroom with shower, underfloor heating, and hairdryer. Each room has a comfortable bed from Viking. A breakfast buffet with cold and hot options is served every morning in the glassed-in inner courtyard. Light snacks and drinks are available in the lobby bar from 11:00. The Old Town and Stureplan are each about a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Hötorget Metro Station is 450 m from the property and Stockholm Central Station is 1 km away. Management reserves the right to refuse to provide accommodation to persons less than 18 years of age, unless accompanied by a parent. Proof of legal age will be required at check-in or reservation will be cancelled.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Hellsten
description: This stylish hotel is located in Stockholm and is a few minutes on foot from Radmansgatan Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, a sauna and 24-hour room service. This 4-star hotel provides a currency exchange, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Sauna and Fitness centre. The luxurious feel of each room at Hotel Hellsten is complemented by amenities such as flat-screen TVs. They boast an en suite bathroom where a bathroom telephone can be found. Hotel Hellsten is located in the heart of Stockholm’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Guests can also visit the National Library of Sweden, Royal Institute of Technology and Stureplan.Revato

name: Scandic Grand Central
description: A 10-minute walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, Scandic Grand Central has an accessible location, making it an ideal place to stay while in Stockholm. It is close to Central Post Office Building, dining options and shops. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi, a sauna and a bicycle rental service. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the best of the local nightlife. Scandic Grand Central provides rooms equipped with heating, a flat-screen TV and a hair dryer, plus all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. They all have a private bathroom, a desk and an in-room safe. Scandic Grand Central provides a variety of dining options, including Teaterbrasseriet and Acoustic Bar. A buffet breakfast is served each morning and room service is available for those travelling at a more leisurely pace. The hotel is ideally situated for sightseeing in Stockholm with Sergels Torg within walking distance. Stockholm City Hall, the Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden are also found within 20 minutes' walk.Revato

name: Haymarket by Scandic
description: Located a short walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, Haymarket by Scandic is an ideal base while in Stockholm. It is close to Sergels Torg, dining options and shops. This 4-star hotel offers a coffee bar, an express check-in and check-out feature and free Wi-Fi. Welcoming and professional team members are available 24 hours a day. The rooms offer an in-room closet, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. They each provide a telephone, a desk and ironing facilities. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to have a meal. In the evening, guests are able to relax in the lounge bar. Haymarket by Scandic is close to Stockholm Central Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Stockholm and its surrounding areas. The hotel is also located near the area's well-known clubs and pubs, and Kungstradgarden, Stockholm City Hall and the National Library of Sweden are a 20-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Best Western Royal Star
description: Best Western Royal Star in Älvsjo is located a 10 minutes drive by car or train from Stockholm City Center. The bright and airy hotel have 103 spacious and tastefully decorated rooms, well suited for both conference guests as well as families with children. Our conference facilities are modern and can accommodate up to 90 participants in the biggest room. We also offer sauna, solarium and one of the biggest hotel fitness center in Stockholm. We offer free parking outside the hotel for our guests.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Ruth, WorldHotels Crafted
description: Ruth's insatiable appetite for everything that makes life exciting has resulted in Hotel Ruth, Premier Collection in the classic area of Siberia, Stockholm. With equal parts curiosity, warmth and love, Ruth has given Stockholm a new boutique hotel on the corner of Surbrunnsgatan/Dobelnsgatan. Like Ruth herself, the building and rooms are inspiring and elegant. At Ruth's we share each other's experiences over a drink in the bar or enjoy good food in the dining room. Locals or out-of-towners do not matter, the more the merrier is what Ruth would have said. We are a family owned hotel with 62 rooms, bar & restaurant.bestwestern.com

name: Nobis Hotel Stockholm, a Member of Design Hotels
description: Nobis Hotel is housed in two stylish 19th-century buildings on Norrmalmstorg Square, in the middle of Stockholm’s main shopping district. It offers luxurious rooms with free WiFi access. All rooms at Nobis feature modern décor, climate control, a flat-screen cable TV and marble bathrooms. Restaurant Noi serves modern dishes with influences from all over Europe in an elegant setting designed by Wingårdhs architects. Traditional, rustic Italian dishes are served in Bistro Bino. The Gold Bar is decorated entirely with golden mirrors and serves a variety of classic as well as new and innovative cocktails. Guests can work out in the fitness centre with state-of-the-art equipment, or relax in the sauna and steam room. The popular Stureplan nightclub area is a 3-minute walk away, while the Royal Dramatic Theatre is located 200 metres from Nobis.

name: Hotel Frantz, WorldHotels Crafted
address: Peter Myndes Backe 5, 116 46 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Welcome to the Hotel Frantz. The house that Master Tailor Frantz Bock built in 1647. This personal boutique hotel is located between Karatinahissen and Gotgatsbacken on Sodermalm, in the middle of the classic silhouette of Slussen. Frantz was inspired by his muse’s and tailored his clients’ garments differently to express who they were, in the same way every guest will be met with care to create a magical and wonderful experience. Judging by the size of the house, Frantz enjoyed surrounding himself with many and different people, of which some real characters that he was both inspired by and dressed as well. This meant that he himself was not only a fashionable man, but also an open-minded person with a sense of touch for the latest. Here you can feel at home, whoever you are and where ever you come from. Frantz’s spirit lives on as we constantly search influences from both the outside world and the local environment in the vision of managing Frantz home. With inspiration from Berlin, New York, the Old Town and Sodermalm, the hotel interior gives a historic yet contemporary feel. Towards Peter Myndes Backe, the doors are open to the new bar and restaurant. Here you can have breakfast, lunch and dinner and don’t forget that you are also always welcome to have a glass of wine at our magic courtyard when you need a break from the rest of Stockholm.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Talk Hotel
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Talk is an easy drive from Stockholm Palace and provides private parking on site. It has a fitness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, a sauna and meeting rooms. This modern hotel features a range of amenities, including luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and bicycle rental. Additional services include a laundry service and 24-hour security. The rooms at Scandic Talk are air-conditioned and offer an in-room safe, blackout curtains and an in-room closet. Each have ironing facilities, a desk and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. In-house dining options include Bistro Talk, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests are able to relax in the cosy lounge bar. Scandic Talk is close to Alvsjo Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Stockholm and its surrounding areas. Kungstradgarden and Stortorget Stockholm are just an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Xpress Stockholm Central
description: Our non-smoking hotel is located next to Central Station. We offer easy access to attractions like the Stockholm Royal Dramatic Theater, Royal Opera Hall Stockholm, Stockholm University, Skansen museum and the Vasa Museum, the most visited museum in Scandinavia. We offer a lobby shop where breakfast can be purchased, as well as amenities like free WiFi, self-check in and guest laundry facilities. All guest rooms feature chairs, desks, hair dryers and TVs.Choice Hotels

name: Profilhotels Nacka
description: ProfilHotels Nacka has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Stockholm. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Sickla Beach. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. Guests at ProfilHotels Nacka will be able to enjoy activities in and around Stockholm, like hiking and skiing. Fotografiska - Museum of Photography is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Tele2 Arena is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 16 km from ProfilHotels Nacka.

name: Thon Partner Hotel Kungsbron
description: This good-value, design hotel is just across the street from Stockholm Central Station, the Arlanda Airport Express Train and Stockholm Casino. Rooms include a flat-screen TV, and WiFi is free. Thon Partner Hotel Kungsbron's soundproofed rooms also feature designer oak furniture from GAD, bright interiors and quality Jensen beds. The private bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. Thon Partner Hotel Kungsbron’s staff will happily give directions or tips on local attractions. The Old Town and the Royal Palace are only 1 metro stop away. Shopping, restaurants and museums are also easily accessed.

name: Villa Dagmar
description: Set in Stockholm, 200 metres from Army Museum, Villa Dagmar offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Villa Dagmar features some units that feature a balcony, and each room has a coffee machine. All guest rooms include a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Villa Dagmar include Stureplan, Sergels Torg Square and Vasa Museum. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Tapto
description: The Clarion Collection Hotel Tapto is ideally located close to the Museum of National Antiquities, Junibacken storybook house and theme park, Nordic Museum, Strindberg Museum, Aquaria Water Museum and Skansen, the oldest open-air museum in the world and also a zoological park. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant, guest laundry facilities, a cocktail lounge, free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, free weekday newspapers, free coffee, meeting space and coffee, tea and fruit available 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms have cable TVs. Some rooms have trouser presses. Book a room today.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel Globe
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Globe in Stockholm, SE near the Globe Arena, Toy Museum, Aquaria Water Museum, Stockholm Palace, Museum of Modern Art and the Nordic Museum. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless Internet, meeting space and copy, print and fax services. Guest rooms come with standard room amenities and more. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Globe. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Expo Stockholm
address: Johan Skyttes Väg 190, 125 21 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: This hotel is 100 metres from Älvsjö Train Station, which takes guests to central Stockholm in 10 minutes. Stockholm International Fairs is a 5-minute walk away. Rooms are spread over 2 floors, the main floor and a pet-friendly annex. Free WiFi is available. The standard yet functional guest rooms at Hotel Expo all feature a work desk and TV with satellite channels. Some have a private bathroom, while annex rooms have shared bathroom facilities. Hotel Expo has a small bar where guests can enjoy a drink or small snack. Free facilities include a bookable sauna and access to a small kitchen. Staff can recommend nearby restaurants and shops, several within walking distance.

name: Best Western and hotel
description: The Best Western and hotel and restaurant is situated right in the heart of Stockholm. The location, with convenient access to the central station, restaurants, and shopping, makes the Best Western and hotel the perfect base when exploring Stockholm. The rooms at the hotel are a little bit smaller than what you are used to, but with the highest quality, comfort, and function. You may also select a one of the rooms without windows, which some guests prefer, at slightly lower price. The hotel offers a bar and lounge, sure to delight guests with its refreshing beverages. This is also the place where a light bar menu filled with Swedish classics is served. The bar is an ideal location for a drink before a satisfying meal in the restaurant. In the hotel restaurant you find a relaxed atmosphere. The restaurant is perfect for business luncheons or for a satisfying meal after a long day of work and travel. The social areas feature a living room where people can meet, relax, and socialize. A fitness center with sauna is free of charge for all hotel guests.bestwestern.com

name: Profilhotels Riddargatan
description: Located on a quiet street in Stockholm’s fashionable Östermalm district, this modern hotel is 300 metres from Stureplan Square. Its stylish rooms feature a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and luxury beds. All rooms of ProfilHotels Riddargatan have wooden floors and a writing desk and tea/coffee facilities, while bathrobes and slippers are provided in some rooms. A rich breakfast buffet is served daily at Riddargatan Hotel. Drinks can be enjoyed in the lobby bar. For evening cocktails or a nice dinner, guests can visit one of the many restaurants and bars in the surrounding area. Stockholm’s Old Town and the National Gallery are both reached in about 10 minutes on foot. In addition, the popular Kungsträdgården Park is just 350 metres away.

name: Motel L Hammarby Sjöstad
description: Located in the Hammarby Sjöstad district of Stockholm, this hotel offers free gym access and modern rooms with colourful décor and 40-inch LED-TVs. Mårtensdal Tram Station is right outside the hotel. All rooms at Motel L are equipped with Wi-Fi access, a work desk and Carpe Diem beds. Each room has a private bathroom with a rain shower. Breakfast is served each morning at Motel L. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar. Wi-Fi access is free in public areas. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute tram and metro ride away. The Globe and Tele2 arenas are 2.7 km from the hotel.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Tapetfabriken
description: Welcome to Clarion Collection Hotel Tapetfabriken. The building from 1906 that originally housed the award-winning wallpaper manufacturer Kabergs wallpaper factory. This was taken into consideration when converting the building into a hotel. The wholes areas history is reflected in the carefully renovated industrial properties. The shopping district in Sickla is one of Stockholms largest shopping venues with 150 stores, some 30 restaurants, several gyms and a cinema.Choice Hotels

name: Downtown Camper by Scandic
description: Located less than a 10-minute walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, Downtown Camper by Scandic offers guests an ideal base when in Stockholm. It is close to Kungstradgarden, eateries and shops. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and luggage storage. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. The comfortable rooms at Downtown Camper by Scandic include a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and an in-room safe. All offer an en suite bathroom where a shower and a hair dryer can be found. The hotel houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day. A buffet breakfast is served each morning. Downtown Camper by Scandic is conveniently located for discovering Stockholm with Stockholm Palace within walking distance. Guests can also visit the National Library of Sweden, Stortorget Stockholm and Stockholm City Hall.Revato

name: Bank Hotel, a member of Small Luxury Hotels of The World
description: Bank hotel is set in central Stockholm, a few minutes' walk from Strandvägen and Stureplan in the Östermalm district. This hotel features free WiFi in public areas, a fitness centre and an on-site restaurant proposing smart casual dining. Housed in a former bank building, all rooms are designed with stylish furnishings and feature a flat-screen TV, minibar and coffee machine. Guests can furthermore enjoy slippers and free toiletries. Bank Hotel offers a lobby bar and room service is available, as well as breakfast served in the room. The cocktail and terrace bar Le Hibou is located on the top floor with great views. It offers a large selection of non-alcoholic options as well as specially composed and classic cocktails. Kungsträdgården park is 200 metres from the property and the Royal palace is 500 metres away. Other popular nearby attractions include the island of Djurgården with Gröna Lund Amusement Park, 1.5 km away. Stockholm Arlanda Airport is a 42 km drive from the hotel and Kungsträdgården metro station is about 100 metres away.

name: Motel L Stockholm Älvsjö
description: This hotel is situated in Älvsjö, 500 metres from Stockholmsmassan Exhibition & Congress Centre. It offers free WiFi and a lobby bar. Central Stockholm is 10 minutes away by commuter train. Every room at Motel L Stockholm Älvsjö is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a rain shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Family rooms are available as well. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Ericsson Globe is 10 km away from Motel L Stockholm Älvsjö. The UNESCO-listed Skogskyrkogården is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Airport, 12 km from Motel L Stockholm Älvsjö.

name: Profilhotels Central
description: Situated in Stockholm city centre, this hotel is just 200 metres from Stockholm Central Station. It offers free WiFi and quiet rooms with a flat-screen TV and tiled bathroom with rain shower. The Arlanda Express Train departs 50 metres away. Renovated in 2013, all the soundproofed rooms at ProfilHotels Central face a peaceful courtyard. Carpe Diem beds and wooden floors are included in each room. Dinner and lighter meals can be enjoyed at the in-house Le Relais de la Gare Restaurant, which features panoramic views of the street life at Vasagatan Street. A buffet breakfast with hot and cold options is served each morning. Parking is possible in Hotel Central's garage. Drottninggatan shopping street can be found 300 metres away. Stockholm's Old Town is an 8-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel J
description: This peaceful, yacht-club style hotel is 35 minutes’ boat ride from Stockholm’s Nybroplan. It offers a waterfront restaurant and summer terrace, plus great views of the Baltic Sea. Hotel J’s rooms have oak floors and designer, marine-themed textiles. All bathrooms include a bathtub or a shower. Many rooms have a balcony or terrace, which offer sea or garden views. The brasserie Restaurant J specialises in New England-inspired seafood. Relaxation options include a late-night bar and a lounge with an open fireplace. A variety of spa treatments, such as massages, facials or a private relaxation room with sauna can be booked at the nearby spa Njuta. Guests can use a nearby gym for free. Nyckelviken Nature Reserve is 15 minutes’ walk from Hotel J. Nacka Strand Ferry Terminal is 500 metres away, and here the shuttle boats depart for the city centre every 30 minutes from May to August. Nacka Strand Bus Stop is only 400 metres away.

name: Elite Hotel Carolina Tower
description: Elite Hotel Carolina Tower is situated in Hagastaden next to the Karolinska Institute and Karolinska University Hospital. A gym, sauna and relaxation area are located on the 16th floor, offering great views of the city. Each room has air conditioning, a desk and flat-screen TV with Chromecast streaming. A laptop safe, ironing facilities and free WiFi are also included. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and toiletries. The on-site restaurant Haga Bottega serves Italian dishes which are meant to be shared with friends and family in a relaxed setting. On Sundays, Elite Hotel members guests can check-out until 18:00 upon availability. Elite Hotel Carolina Tower has a 24-hour front desk, and offers a variety of modern meeting facilities. A local bus stop is found just 100 metres away, while the metro station S:t Eriksplan is 1.2 km away. Arlanda Airport can be reached in 30 minutes by taxi, or by public airport shuttle which stops right outside the hotel.

name: Berns, Historical Boutique Hotel & House of Entertainment since 1863
address: Berzelii Park, Näckstroemsgatan 8, Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Berns, a historical boutiques hotel and house of entertainment since 1863, has 82 personally decorated rooms, 2 restaurants, several night clubs/bars and a large selection of meeting and event venues. The hotel offers the full range of on-site amenities and services like 24 hours room service and Concierge Welcome to the world of Berns!iHotelier/iStay

name: Hellstens Glashus
description: Hellstens Glashus is located in the vibrant Södermalm district in Stockholm. Gamla Stan, Stockholm's Old Town, is a 15-minute walk away. The hotel offers a restaurant, bar and free coffee and tea throughout the day for guests. The bright and colourful rooms come with a flat-screen TV, work desk and free WiFi. The tiled bathrooms feature a glass wash basin and a shower. Rooms have either large windows or visible beams. The on-site restaurant serves international cuisine, based on a mix of Nordic cuisine and exotic flavours. In the summer, it is also possible to dine outside on the terrace. Mariatorget metro station is located just across the street. The Royal Palace is a 20-minute walk away from Hellstens Glashus. Arlanda Airport is 43 km away.

name: Best Western Hotel Karlaplan
description: The Best Western Hotel Karlaplan is located in the heart of the exclusive Ostermalm area. We offer old charm with modern design. Our hotel offers 101 beautiful rooms. Designs from Versace and with exclusive beds from Jensen will make your stay extra comfortable. All rooms are equipped with wireless high speed Internet, flatscreen tv and telephone. You will find most of the best things to see in Stockholm within walking distance from our hotel. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Elite Hotel Adlon
description: Situated in a stylish 19th-century building in the heart of Stockholm, Elite Hotel Adlon offers individually decorated rooms with free Wi-Fi. Drottninggatan shopping street is just a 3-minute walk away. Flat-screen TVs with smart-TV function and cable channels, electric kettles and wooden floors are provided in all Elite Hotel Adlon's rooms. A daily breakfast buffet is served. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 12:00 and check-out until 18:00, except during high season. The Old Town with the Royal Palace is a 12-minute walk from the hotel. The Central Station, with the Arlanda Express airport train, is located 400 metres away.

name: Stallmästaregården Hotel, Stockholm, a Member of Design Hotels
address: Norrtull, Stockholm 113 47 Swe, Stockholm, 113 47 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Dating back to the 1660s, this historic inn overlooks the beautiful Brunnsviken Bay in the picturesque Haga Park. It offers atmosphere, tradition and a Michelin Guide-approved restaurant. Stallmästaregården Hotel’s rooms feature bright timeless décor, luxury Hästens beds and satellite TV. Free wired internet is available in all. The in-house restaurant specialises in modern versions of Swedish classics such as char, herring and veal. The old dining hall is a charming setting, while the terrace is open during summer months. Tennis courts are situated nearby, and the park is ideal for quiet strolls. Central Stockholm is a 10-minute drive or bus ride from Stallmästaregården.

name: Hotel Rival
description: Situated in vibrant Södermalm, this hotel is set in a 1930s Art Déco building by Mariatorget Square. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with Blu-ray player and luxury beds. Wi-Fi access is free. An iPhone docking station, pillow menus and Egyptian cotton sheets are standard at Hotel Rival. All rooms are decorated with a scene from a classic Swedish film. Some include bathrobes and slippers, plus views over the tree-lined Mariatorget Square. Free tea/coffee and biscuits are available 24/7. Free DVD rentals are possible from the reception. Gamla Stan, Stockholm’s Old Town is only 10 minutes’ walk from Rival Hotel. Mariatorget Metro Station is 150 metres away. Bistro Restaurant offers Swedish cuisine and an extensive wine list. Chilled beers and cocktails are served in Rival’s elegant bar.

name: Hotel Kungsträdgården
description: Opened in January 2015, Hotel Kungsträdgården is housed in a fully-renovated 18th century building in central Stockholm. Situated next to the King’s garden, the financial and shopping districts are also within walking distance. The Stockholm Central Station is 1 km away. Dressed in Gustavian style, each individually decorated room offers old-world charm in the midst of a modern city. Free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar come standard in the rooms. Extras include a desk and a laptop safe. At Hotel Kungsträdgården you will find a restaurant, 24-hour front desk and luggage storage. Many city attractions are easily accessible by public transportation. The hotel is 1.1 km from Stockholm City Hall, while the Royal Palace and the Old Town are only a 10-minutes’ walk away. Stockholm Arlanda Airport is 42 km away.

name: The Sparrow Hotel
description: In the heart of Stockholm, just a few steps from Stureplan, The Sparrow Hotel is located. A warm and welcoming place for guests from near and far. An intimate hotel, close to the pulse of the city and tranquil city parks; perfect for business meetings and nights on the town. The Sparrow features the most genuine of bistros, an inviting bar and colorful hotel rooms with a personal touch. Were sure youll feel right at home.iHotelier/iStay

name: Scandic Anglais
description: Around the corner from the Stureplan entertainment district, this hotel is located in Stockholm’s fashionable Östermalm neighbourhood. Enjoy the pulse of the city and all sorts of conversations at the popular hotel lounge, Bar Anglais. During warmer month, the crowd expands to the 7th-floor rooftop bar to take in pleasing city views with a drink in hand. All rooms at Scandic Anglais have a flat-screen TV with a variety of cable channels and modern décor. Free WiFi is available throughout the building. Guests can keep up fitness routines in the well-equipped gym and two saunas provide relaxation options. The hotel Bar Anglais, offers guests music every day of the week and a classic hotel bar menu with carefully selected dishes and beverage. Guests can enjoy energising breakfast options, 24-hour Fairtrade coffee and classic Scandinavian dishes made from fresh and organic-sourced ingredients. The staff will gladly help cater to any diet restrictions requested. Östermalmstorg Metro Station is 300 metres away, just 2 stops from Stockholm’s Old Town. Guests are welcome to borrow the hotel bicycles to explore the city.

name: Best Western Hotel at 108
description: Whether you're looking for business or pleasure, the Best Western Hotel at 108's unique location in Stockholm provides effortless convenience to everything this amazing city has to offer. This newly built hotel is located in two, nice, 19th century buildings on one of Stockholm's most famous streets 'sveavagen'. The Stockholm Odenplan metro station is about a 5 minutes walking distance from the hotel and has direct connection to Arlanda Airport. Metro station Radmansgatan is located about 50 meters from the hotel and offers easy connections to several of Stockholm attractions. All rooms are modern style, have free high speed internet, flat screen TV, air conditioning and underfloor heating in the bathrooms. They also have desks with space for a laptop and a safe. Please note that a large part of the rooms have no windows. The restaurant has two dining rooms and serves buffet breakfast and dinner. In the summer, you can dine out on the terrace located in the fantastic courtyard.bestwestern.com

name: Elite Eden Park Hotel
description: Overlooking Humlegården Park, just a few minutes’ walk from Stureplan Square, this modern design hotel has a gourmet restaurant and a Gastropub named GOMA. Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi, gym and sauna access. Elite Eden Park Hotel’s air-conditioned rooms feature a seating area, a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms include a balcony. Elite Park’s Asian-inspired restaurant is run by Melker Andersson, one of Sweden’s most renowned chefs. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00 and check-out until 18:00, except during high season. The surrounding area offers high-class shopping and trendy night clubs. Östermalmstorg Metro Station is less than a 5-minute walk away.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Wellington
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Wellington in Stockholm, SE near Djurgarden, the Royal Ballet, Royal Opera, Stockholm University and the Royal Palace. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free organic breakfast, a restaurant and copy and fax services. All guest rooms have hair dryers, coffee makers, TVs, desks, irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Stockholm hotels like our Clarion Collection Hotel Wellington. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay. Year Built 1937Choice Hotels

name: Hotel C Stockholm
description: Boasting the world's first permanent ice bar and a lobby aquarium, Hotel C Stockholm offers stylish accommodation close to Stockholm's well-known attractions. It is also conveniently situated within a 10-minute walk of Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel that guests can enjoy, such as valet parking, free Wi-Fi and a gym. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms and a business centre. Just minutes from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. The rooms at Hotel C Stockholm feature a desk, a laptop safe and ironing facilities. They offer heating, an in-room closet and a telephone. Hotel C Stockholm features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind of an evening. Alternatively, there is a large selection of international restaurants close by. The area surrounding Hotel C Stockholm is well-known for its shopping. The Royal Swedish Opera, Kungstradgarden and Stockholm City Hall are a short walk away.Revato

name: Hobo
description: Focus on your destination in a whole new way at the non-smoking Hobo, Ascend Hotel Collection, located right in the Stockholm City Centre, surrounded by shopping, nightlife, sights and attractions like Royal Dramatic Theatre, The Royal Armoury, Grona Lund Amusement Park and Stockholm Concert Hall. Enjoy interiors from acclaimed Berlin designers Studio Aisslinger, as well as two floors of eating, drinking and mingling at our Hobo Bar and Hobo Kitchen interspersed by barber services, tailoring, shopping, exhibitions and work spaces. Amenities include free WiFi, a business center, sundeck and fitness center. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Kung Carl, WorldHotels Crafted
description: The Hotel Kung Carl, is centrally located in the bustling area of Stureplan, famous for its exclusive stores, fine dining and nightclubs. The hotel, housed in an historic building, offers a welcome respite from the thriving hustle and bustle. Here you can relax in our lobby bar or enjoy a meal in our popular restaurant where the focus is on classic dishes with a modern touch. The hotel's themed rooms offer something to everyone's taste, from Gustavian design featuring antiques and fine art, to modern design and fashionable wallpaper. Stockholm's public transport system provides easy access to the hotel from the Central Station and Arlanda Express.bestwestern.com

name: Comfort Hotel Kista
description: Behind every great day is a great night at the Comfort Hotel Kista in Kista, Sweden, conveniently located near Kistamassan Expo Center. We are near Kista Galleria, Kista Science Tower, Friends Arena, and Mall of Scandinavia. Enjoy amenities like a full breakfast, free WiFi, free coffee, copy and fax services and more. Rooms include everything you need for a convenient stay. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Långholmen Hotell
description: Långholmen Hotell is housed in a 19th century prison building on Långholmen Island in Stockholm. It offers free parking and unique prison cell rooms with flat-screen cable TVs and free Wi-Fi access. The modern rooms at Hotell Långholmen retain many authentic features. All have parquet floors and are equipped with a laptop safe and a work desk. An attractive atrium gallery dating from 1866 is situated in the middle of the complex. Stockholm's most captivating prison museum is open daily, and guided tours are given at weekends. The hotel is located in a relaxing park environment with jogging tracks. Långholmen Wärdshus Restaurant offers contemporary Swedish cuisine. The old prison entrance hall now houses a 24 hour cafeteria. Drinks are available at Finkan Bar. Hornstull, with its bars, restaurants and metro station, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. A beach is located 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Scandic Skärholmen
description: This modern Stockholm hotel is located within a 10-minute stroll of Skarholmen Metro Station. It also offers a sauna, meeting rooms and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. There is also free private parking on site for those with a car. It also has a fitness centre with a sauna, a weight machine and free weights. The spacious rooms at Scandic Skarholmen have a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and ironing facilities. They are also equipped with a hair dryer and a telephone. Scandic Skarholmen's restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner, offering guests an easy dining experience near their room. Alternatively, there are a range of eateries within a short stroll. The hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Kungens Kurva. Stockholm Palace and Kungstradgarden are an easy car trip away.Revato

name: NOFO Hotel, WorldHotels Crafted
description: Welcome to the NOFO Hotel! Find yourself in a beautiful and historic building from 1780 on Sodermalm in the central parts of Stockholm. The hotel is within walking distance of Old Town, Slussen and the City. Stay in a vibrant neighborhood where people of Stockholm living. Sodermalm is one of the oldest districts in Stockholm and was a long time working quarters with much feeling. For many years known as the area where we are located 'Sofo', Stockholm's answer to London and New York's trendy SoHo. Amidst this vibrant neighborhood, you will find our oasis. Enter through a portal, out on a cobbled yard and you'll find us. We are housed in a listed building from the 1700s that originally built as a brewery. As the house was built at one time, with a roof and walls according to original drawings, has been completely control the hotel room disposition and layout. This allows the hotel to get a personal and original touch that along with the eclectic decor boutique reinforces the feeling. Upon arrival at the typical courtyard, which can be likened to an oasis in the middle of Sodermalm, enriched it with an inner calm. You feel far from the trendy areas, both north and south of Folkungagatan, where hipsters, taverns and street life plays out like a true 'reality soap'. We look forward to seeing you! Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Kungens Kurva
description: Located in Huddinge, Scandic Kungens Kurva is within a 40-minute drive of Stockholm-Arlanda Airport and offers a swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and a sauna. The various amenities this modern hotel features include meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free bicycle rental. Kungens Kurva has 257 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. There are also a number of rooms available for families. Scandic features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax of an evening. Alternatively, there is a large selection of international restaurants close by. The area surrounding Scandic Kungens Kurva Hotel Huddinge is well-known for its shopping. Stockholm and Solna are located a short drive from the property.Revato

name: Story Hotel Riddargatan, part of JdV by Hyatt
description: This stylish hotel is 100 metres from Stockholm's Östermalmstorg Metro Station. Its designer rooms feature large LCD TVs, complimentary mineral water and free WiFi. Story Hotel’s unique rooms offer the best in modern design and chic décor. Furniture, textiles, artwork and bathroom fittings are individually chosen for each room. Bathrooms include rain showers, heated floors and toiletries. The popular on-site restaurant Ling Long serves Asian specialities in a casual setting. During the summer, guests can enjoy dinner and drinks on the hotel's terrace, the Backyard. Story Hotel lies just around the corner from Stockholm’s Stureplan in the hub of business, shopping and nightclub district.

name: Hotel Diplomat
description: Set in an impressive 1911-era Art Nouveau building on upscale Strandvägen boulevard, Hotel Diplomat offers great views over Nybroviken Bay, spa and fitness room access and a restaurant with summer terrace. WiFi is free. Diplomat’s modern interior was designed by renowned architect Per Öberg and combines classic elegance with contemporary design. Each room features blackout curtains, a generous workspace and quality Dux beds with premium linen. All include luxury toiletries and a smart TV with Chromecast. The in-house restaurant uses fresh, local produce to create classic Swedish dishes with a Mediterranean twist. The waterfront terrace is an ideal spot to take in the waterfront views during summer. Guests can enjoy a glass of champagne or cocktail in the bar after a day exploring Stockholm. For relaxation or fitness needs, the hotel has a spacious, well-equipped gym and a sauna. The Diplomat is just 300 metres from Stockholm’s Royal Theatre. Local buses stops directly outside the hotel. Archipelago-bound boats depart regularly from across the street.

name: Old Town Stay Hotel
description: Old Town Stay Hotel is ideally set in the centre of Stockholm, and features a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Royal Swedish Opera, Sergels Torg Square, and Stockholm Central Station. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Monteliusvägen. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests at Old Town Stay Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Stockholm Cathedral, Museum of Medieval Stockholm and The Royal Palace. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 10 km from Old Town Stay Hotel.

name: Elite Hotel Arcadia
description: Set in a stylish 1950s building in fashionable Östermalm, this hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from Stureplan. It offers free Wi-Fi internet and rooms with LCD TVs and blackout curtains. Elite Hotel Arcadia’s rooms feature fresh design, modern décor and air conditioning. All bathrooms have heated towel racks and free toiletries. Guests are offered both classic international dishes and traditional Swedish cuisine at the in-house restaurant. Elite Arcadia is 5 minutes’ walk from Tekniska Högskolan Metro Station, which is 3 stops from Stockholm Central Station. The picturesque island of Djurgården is a 20-minute bus ride away.

name: Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel, Stockholm
address: Nils Ericsons Plan 4, 111 64 Stockholm, Stockholms Lan
description: Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel is located amongst Stockholm's popular shopping district, just a short walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. It features panoramic city views and 4-star rooms. This modern hotel offers meeting rooms, luggage storage and valet parking. Welcoming and professional staff are available 24 hours a day. Those staying at Radisson Blu Waterfront Hotel Stockholm can enjoy the luxurious rooms that offer converters/voltage adaptors, a private bathroom and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be made with the available tea and coffee supplies, and enjoyed in the comfort of the room's living area. Radisson Blu Waterfront Stockholm is located in the heart of Stockholm’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Guests can also visit the Royal Swedish Opera, Kungstradgarden and Nordiska Kompaniet.Revato

name: Scandic Malmen
description: Scandic Malmen is located in Stockholm and is close to the Photographic Museum. It is close to Medborgarplatsen, shops and nightlife options. Guests can enjoy the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Amenities include free wireless internet and a 24-hour reception. Scandic Malmen Hotel has 332 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Guests in search of a meal and wanting to stay nearby needn't look any further than Scandic Malmen Hotel Stockholm's in-house restaurant, which is available each day for breakfast, lunch and dinner. A wide selection of dining options are also available close by. Scandic Malmen is ideally located for discovering Stockholm with the Sodra Teatern within a 10-minute walk. Grona Lund is within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Continental
description: Situated only a brief stroll from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station, Scandic Continental provides guests with an ideal base while visiting Stockholm. It is set in the area's popular nightlife district, which is only a few minutes walk from Sergels Torg. There are a variety of amenities at Scandic Continental Hotel Stockholm on offer to guests, including a ballroom, free Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. Pets are also welcome. The hotel features contemporary rooms equipped with a hair dryer, a shower and cable/satellite channels. Scandic Continental houses a restaurant and a lounge bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. Eateries at the hotel include Café Caldo and The Market. Guests are also able to unwind with a drink at The Capital. Scandic Continental is ideally located for sightseeing in Stockholm with Stockholm City Hall and the Royal Swedish Opera within walking distance. Stockholm Central Station is only a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Scandic Alvik
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Alvik provides stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Alvik. Guests can also enjoy free internet in all areas. This modern hotel offers a range of amenities, such as a 24-hour reception, a currency exchange and meeting rooms. Corporate facilities include a business centre. The rooms at Scandic Alvik Hotel feature a desk and ironing facilities. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the local area with use of Alvik Metro Station, which is a short walk from the hotel. The on-site restaurant serves local and international cuisine in a cosy setting. Each evening, guests are welcome to relax in the cosy lounge bar. Scandic Alvik Hotel Bromma is under a 35-minute drive from Stockholm-Arlanda Airport. Ericsson Globe, Stockholm Palace and Stortorget Stockholm are within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Hasselbacken
description: With a stay at Hotel Hasselbacken in Stockholm, just steps from Royal Djurgården Circus and ABBA The Museum. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Backstage Hotel Stockholm
description: With a stay at Pop House Hotel in Stockholm, you'll be within a 10-minute walk of Skansen and Vasa Museum. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Mornington Hotel Stockholm City
description: Located in Stockholm’s elegant Östermalm district, this hotel is 5 minutes' walk from the vibrant Stureplan Square. All its stylish rooms have flat-screen TVs and free WiFi access. The individually designed rooms of Mornington Hotel Stockholm feature wooden flooring with an armchair or small sofa. Some rooms include bathrobes and a little kettle. Free gym and sauna access. Mornington Stockholm’s restaurant offers traditional Swedish cuisine as well as international dishes. The hotel’s inner courtyard is a popular meeting place for afternoon coffee and evening cocktails. Other relaxation options include the health club and sauna. Östermalmstorg Metro Station is just 150 metres away. The Royal Dramatic Theatre is 7-minutes walk from the hotel, while the picturesque Djurgården Island is a 20-minute stroll away.

name: Sheraton Stockholm Hotel
description: Plan your trip to the Sheraton Stockholm, situated in the heart of Stockholm. Our hotel is an icon in Sweden’s capital city, providing guests with thoughtful amenities, contemporary accommodation, and the best city center location near the Central Station, main shopping street, City Hall and Old Town. Travelers can relax & unwind in any of our 465 rooms and suites with Sheraton Signature Beds®, ample workspace and complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee. Club-level rooms grant access to the Club and complimentary amenities, while Superior rooms have a beautiful Lake Mälaren view and/or the City Hall. After a long day of exploring savor some French classics with a Swedish twist at the Brasserie or refresh yourself in the Bar with a signature cocktail. Our Meeting & Event spaces provide 900sqm of versatile space. All venues are equipped with complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi access and updated technology, ensuring the success of your business event.Marriott

name: Scandic No 53
description: Ideally situated in Stockholm, Scandic No 53 provides modern accommodation within a short drive of Grona Lund. It is close to Stockholm Concert Hall, eateries and shops. This 3-star hotel provides an express check-in and check-out feature, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Additional services include 24-hour security and luggage storage. Rooms feature flat-screen TVs, and bathrooms come with complimentary amenities and hair dryers. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to have a meal. Each evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the lounge bar. Scandic No 53 is ideally located for exploring Stockholm with Kulturhuset and Sergels Torg within walking distance. The hotel is positioned within a short walk of Cityterminalen Central Bus Station.Revato

name: Hotel Fridhem
description: Located by Fridhemsplan Metro Station in Kungsholmen, Hotel Fridhem is within 20 minutes’ walk of Stockholm Central Station. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV and free wired internet. Each hotel room has a built-in Chromecast. Guests can connect their smart device to the TV. The hotel offers a continental breakfast. Hotel Fridhem’s central location provides easy access to culture, shopping and dining. The large green areas of Rålambshovsparken are about 5 minutes walk away.

name: Radisson Collection, Strand Hotel, Stockholm
description: Modern and cosy, Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm is situated in Stockholm and provides free Wi-Fi. It is ideally positioned for those wanting to sightsee in the area. This 5-star hotel offers a coffee bar, a 24-hour reception and valet parking. Corporate amenities include a business centre. Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm has 170 rooms that are fitted with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Honeymoon suites are also available. Guests staying at Radisson Collection Strand Hotel Stockholm can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. A wide selection of dining options are also found nearby. Stockholm's attractions, such as the Royal Swedish Opera and Kungstradgarden, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. The surrounding neighbourhood is also famous for its shopping.Revato

name: Scandic Park
description: Overlooking Humlegarden, Scandic Park is the ideal place for those looking to discover the shopping area in Stockholm. It is situated a short walk from Stockholm Stadium and Stureplan. Scandic Park Hotel Stockholm provides a sauna, free Wi-Fi and a bike hire service. For a fast and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can take advantage of the express check-in/check-out kiosk. Just moments from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the best of the local nightlife. Scandic Park has 203 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, in addition to a private bathroom. Those staying at Scandic Park Hotel Stockholm can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, suitably based for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. Each evening, guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the breakfast room, or there is a range of popular eateries in the local area to discover. Scandic Park is surrounded by the area's well-known tourist attractions, including Sergels Torg, Nordiska Kompaniet and Stockholm Concert Hall, which are within walking distance. Grona Lund is only a short car ride away.Revato

name: Elite Palace Hotel
description: Centrally situated in Stockholm’s Vasastan neighbourhood, this hotel is 5 minutes’ walk to St. Eriksplan Metro Station. It offers free WiFi and an on-site British restaurant and pub. Elite Palace Hotel’s modern rooms all feature cable TV, a minibar, along with a work desk and seating area. The on-site Bishop’s Arms pub offers an à la carte lunch and dinner menu of international favourites, together with an extensive selection of beer and whiskey. Elite Palace’s popular breakfast buffet is served in a separate dining room. The on-site Vana spa and gym are available for an extra surcharge. It features a hot tub, steam and dry sauna, aroma room, signature treatments and a lounge with a fireplace. The large modern gym offers personal training opportunities. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 12:00 and check-out until 18:00, except during peak periods. Hotel staff can recommend many of the nearby restaurants and attractions. The Arlanda Airport Bus Stop is only 450 metres away from the Elite Palace Hotel.

name: Crystal Plaza Hotel
description: This hotel is housed in a 19th-century Art Nouveau building in Stockholm’s fashionable Östermalm district. It offers charming rooms with crystal chandeliers and tea/coffee making facilities. Crystal Plaza’s rooms also feature a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the building. Crystal Plaza Hotel’s leisure options include a sauna and a small fitness room. A popular breakfast buffet is served each morning. The hotel restaurant, Ming, serves Chinese and Thai cuisine. Staff can also recommend or book local restaurants. The staff at the property speaks Swedish, English and Chinese. Hotel Crystal Plaza is just around the corner from the bars and clubs of Stureplan.

name: Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection
description: Welcome to the Hotel Esplanade, BW Signature Collection, located on the fashionable Standvagen, an extraordinary 4 Star hotel that many call their second home. Within a comfortable walking distance from cultural attractions, shopping, first-class restaurants, the archipelago and round-trip boats, this beautiful boutique hotel stand with pride.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Victoria Tower
address: Arne Beurlings Torg 3 A, 164 40 Kista, Stockholms Lan
description: This modern hotel in Stockholm offers free wireless internet, as well as a sauna and free bicycle rental. It also provides an express check-in and check-out feature, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. This stylish hotel offers a laundry service, shops and luggage storage. There is public parking nearby for guests travelling with a car. The luxurious feel of each room at Scandic Victoria Tower is complemented by amenities such as flat-screen TVs. All provide an in-room safe and ironing facilities. Guests are able to relax with a drink at Scandic Victoria Tower's bar and try international style food in the restaurant. For those preferring to dine out, the local area features a number of bars and restaurants with a range of different cuisines. Scandic Victoria Tower is within walking distance of Kista. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Kista Metro Station, which allows for easy access in and around Stockholm.Revato

name: Best Western Plus Sthlm Bromma
description: Best Western Plus Sthlm Bromma is the first hotel in direct connection with Bromma Stockholm Airport. The proximity to Stockholm city center (8 km) is a perfect match with the easy access from the airport, whether you chose the hotel for accommodation or for your meeting. When you stay here you only have a short walk to the airport which saves you both time and money. In case you come by car there is a free parking in front of the hotel. Next to the hotel you find Bromma Blocks shopping center with more than 80 shops and several cafés. You are also a short walk away from the Solvalla racetrack. At the hotel you find a fully equipped fitness center on the ground floor open 24/7. The restaurant 'Bistro 46', offers good food based on superior quality ingredients available in season. The bar is serving refreshing drinks in a relaxed atmosphere where it is easy to get together. The lounge areas on the floors are popular places for work or to hang out with your friends in.bestwestern.com

name: Hilton Stockholm Slussen
description: Welcome to the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel, enjoying wonderful views over the water and the Old Town. The hotel is located in the hip Södermalm area and conveniently located within walking distance to many of Stockholm's main tourist attractions and the city center. All 289 guest and 16 meeting rooms are filled with natural daylight and featuring stylish Swedish décor. Choose from a range of spacious Hilton Guest, Deluxe, Executive rooms and Suites at the Hilton Stockholm Slussen hotel. When upgrading to an Executive room or Suite you will enjoy the breath-taking city and sea views and exclusive access to the hotel’s contemporary Executive lounge. When you want to keep up your fitness regime we offer a selection of cardiovascular equipment and free weights, or you can take part in an energetic exercise class. You can also make an appointment with a personal trainer. In Panorama Restaurant you can enjoy a sumptuous breakfast to get the day off to a great start. Eken Bar offers Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist, serving both lunch and dinner. We use seasonal ingredients, which are locally produced, wherever we can. In Eken Bar, you can sip on a well-made cocktail, while enjoying the lounge music and panoramic views over the city.Hilton

name: Lydmar Hotel
description: Situated by the National Museum, this chic waterfront hotel offers views of the Old Town and Royal Palace. It offers a popular bistro-style restaurant and art exhibitions. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Lydmar Hotel’s spacious rooms are individually decorated and have wooden floors. Many feature original stucco work, wood beams and high windows. All have a TV, minibar. The hotel restaurant serves European cuisine; everything from escargots to steak tartare to Sicilian fish. In the summer, the outdoor terrace offers a relaxing setting where guests can enjoy fresh cocktails. Archipelago boat tours regularly depart from Strömkajen Harbour, which is 100 metres from Lydmar Hotel. Stureplan Square, with its shops and nightlife, is a 10-minute walk away. Staff will happily recommend other local sights and attractions.

name: Nordic Light Hotel
description: This modern Stockholm hotel is located within a 10-minute walk of Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. It is moments from Central Post Office Building and is close to the area's well-known attractions and dining spots. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Facilities include free wireless internet, an express check-in and check-out feature and valet parking. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. Nordic Light Hotel offers 175 rooms, all of which are equipped with cable/satellite channels, a mini bar and tea and coffee making facilities. After settling in to their room, guests can explore the local area with use of Stockholm Central Station, which is a short walk from the hotel. The hotel's restaurant serves local, international and regional cuisine and overlooks the city. Room service is also available during certain times. The area surrounding Nordic is popular for its shopping. Guests can also easily visit Stockholm City Hall, Kungstradgarden and the Royal Swedish Opera.Revato

name: Best Western Plus Grow Hotel
description: Best Western Plus Grow Hotel opened in November 2018 and is a four-star, modern, and sustainable hotel located on the border between Solna and Sundbyberg. Great emphasis has been placed on design and smart digital solutions, and the hotel is a natural destination for the conscious business traveler as well as the weekend traveler who appreciate comfort with a focus on sustainability. In the nine-story building we offer 176 stylish hotel rooms and a relaxation area with sauna and gym. In the lobby there is an inviting lounge and a restaurant, during the summer months also with a large outdoor terrace connected. With an attractive location close to the trendy small town of Sundbyberg with its’ restaurants, shops and great public transportations, the hotel will meet the need for increased service and accommodation in the area. Public transportations to the hotel are very good. The nearest metro station is Solna Strand only 300 meters away. Airport buses to Stockholm Arlanda Airport stop right outside and for guests travelling by car there is a garage next to the hotel. In Sundbyberg's center there is another metro station, a commuter train, and a tram.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Sjöfartshotellet
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Sjofartshotellet is an easy drive from Ericsson Globe and provides private parking on site. It is situated a brief stroll from the Photographic Museum. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at Hotel Scandic Sjöfartshotellet, such as a sauna, free Wi-Fi and meeting facilities. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest places to visit and provide other tourist information. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to explore the best of the local nightlife. Scandic Sjöfartshotellet has 212 rooms, all of which are equipped with a variety of facilities to ensure a comfortable stay. The private en suite includes complimentary toiletries in addition to a hair dryer. In-house dining options include Lighthouse Bar & Coffee Shop, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. A choice of dining options are also available in the surrounding area. Scandic Sjofartshotellet Stockholm is surrounded by the area's well-known tourist attractions, including Stortorget Stockholm, Mariatorget and Medborgarplatsen, which are within walking distance. It is also within walking distance of Grona Lund.Revato

name: Courtyard by Marriott Stockholm Kungsholmen
description: Courtyard Stockholm Kungsholmen invites you to experience 4-star comfort and award-winning convenience. Located in the city center, our hotel offers the best of both worlds: a sense of urban sophistication, plus the calm and tranquility of nature, thanks to our close proximity to Rålambshov's Park. Settle into exceptionally spacious rooms with large windows that let in natural daylight and offer views of the park or the residential area. Challenge yourself to a workout in the modern fitness center, or enjoy a tasty meal at Björk Bar & Grill, a favorite among Stockholm locals. Host your next event with us and take advantage of our sophisticated venues and exceptional planning services. When you're ready to explore, our hotel places attractions like City Hall and Old Town within your reach - and we offer bike rentals, so you can discover Stockholm on two wheels. Your 4-star escape awaits.Marriott

name: Elite Hotel Marina Tower
description: Situated right by Saltsjö Bay, Elite Hotel Marina Tower offers free WiFi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Stockholm city centre is a 10-minute bus ride away. All rooms at Elite Marina Tower Hotel feature contemporary furnishings and wooden floors. Some rooms include a small seating area and a work desk. The hotel’s outside seating offers magnificent views of the bay and Djurgården island. Both Swedish and international meals are on offer at the in-house restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served every morning 06:30-09:30 weekdays and 07-11:00 on weekends. The vibrant Södermalm district is a 5-minute walk away. The nearest bus stop is within 50 metres. The neighbouring Saltsjökvarn Brygga ferry terminal offers connections to Djurgården, as well as Nybrokajen harbour in Östermalm.

name: Maude's Hotel Enskede Stockholm
description: "Room for dreams" The hotel is located in the area of Enskede not far from Stockholm center, Stockholm International Fairs and Globen/Tele2 Arena. The Svedmyra underground station is just steps away, easy access to all areas of the town, including Stockholm central station T-centralen with both Skavsta Airport and Bromma Airport buses and Arlanda Airport Express trains. Re decorations of all the hotel rooms was completed in Januari 2017. The interiors are both spacious and contemporary, enhanced by a personal ambiance. Our guests have complementary coffee or tea with homemade cookies in our lobby lounge. In the hotel lounge or on the beautiful summer terrace you can enjoy your breakfast or a cup of coffee or a drink during the day or in the evening. You can also take full advantage of free private parking area and wireless Internet are included the room rate. Our main focus is making our guests feel at home and well taken care of. Welcome!iHotelier/iStay

name: Best Western Plus Park City Hammarby Sjostad
description: Located in the Hammarby Sjöstad district, this hotel is 5 km from central Stockholm and 200 metres from the Sickla Kaj train stop. It offers free access to Wi-Fi, a gym All guest rooms at Park Inn by Radisson Stockholm Hammarby Sjöstad have a work desk, flat-screen TV and safe. Some also include a seating area. Just across the street from Park Inn is the Hammarbybacken ski slope. During summer, guests might enjoy a walk along the nearby Sickla Canal and Hammarby Lake. Stockholm Central Station is within 10 minutes' drive of Park Inn Hammarby Sjöstad. Ericsson Globe Arena and Tele2 Arena are both only a 5-minute drive away.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga
description: This budget hotel is a three minute drive from the E18 and 10 minutes from the E4 Motorway. It offers free private parking, a 24-hour reception desk and a late bar. Private bathrooms, cable TV and simple decor are standard features in all rooms at the Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga. The Bromma Airport is seven kilometers from Stockholm-Spanga. Avestagatan Bus Stop is 30 meters away and a five minute ride from Spanga Station. Trains connect to Stockholm Central Station in 12 minutes. The Sure Hotel by Best Western Spanga is a great choice for travelers interested in riverside walks, cafes and convenient public transport.bestwestern.com

name: Victory Hotel
description: Situated in Stockholm’s picturesque Old Town, Collector's Victory Hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Gamla Stan Metro Station. Its uniquely decorated rooms have a flat-screen TV and heated bathroom floors. Inspired by its own maritime antique collection, the rooms at Collector’s Victory Hotel feature a naval theme. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The on-site restaurant, Djuret, serves both meat and seafood dishes, using locally sourced and organic produce. Guest can also unwind with a drink in the cosy lounge bar Tweed, or visit the wine bar The Burgundy. Leisure options at Collector’s Victory include a sauna and a plunge pool.

name: Good Morning+ Hägersten
description: This hotel is set a 15-minute drive from central Stockholm. Free private parking and rooms with a flat-screen TV as well as free WiFi access are offered. The E4 Highway is 500 metres away. All the brightly decorated rooms, an armchair and a work desk. Each room has a tiled bathroom with shower. The on-site restaurant serves a variety of dishes from Monday to Saturday from 17:00 until 22:00. Drinks can be enjoyed in the bar until 23:30. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at Good Morning+ Hägersten. Meals and drinks can be enjoyed on the terrace during summer. Guests can work out at the on-site Actic Gym Bromma Airport and Stockholm International Fairs are both within a 10-minute drive of the hotel. Good Morning+ Hägersten offers a free shuttle service to selected fairs on request. Västertorp Metro Station is 800 metres away.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Stockholm Alvsjo
description: This hotel is about 10 minutes' walk from Stockholm International Fairs and Älvsjö Train Station. Guests enjoy free sauna access and free WiFi. All rooms of Connect Hotel Stockholm have a flat-screen TV. Bathroom facilities are either private or shared. A variety of dishes and refreshments are served in the Living Room, the hotel’s combined restaurants, bar and TV lounge. Connect Hotel Stockholm is an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Mälardrottningen Hotel
description: Mälardrottningen Yacht Hotel & Restaurant provides a unique experience aboard an elegant 73-metre yacht, permanently docked at Riddarholmen Island, next to Stockholm’s charming Old Town. It features wonderful views of Riddarfjärden Bay. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout Mälardrottningen Hotel. Guests stay in cabins, decorated with dark timber finish, carpeting and portholes. Upon arrival, guests enter the reception via a gangplank into a beautifully designed lobby with teak panelling and nautical décor. The TV lounge is found above the engine room, which can be viewed through the glass floors. The glassed-in Mälardrottningen Restaurant is found on the fore deck, facing City Hall, and includes an open dining terrace. The bar is set in the former wheelhouse. Mälardrottningen Yacht Hotel is 500 metres from Gamla Stan Metro Station, and Stockholm Central Station is reached in about 10 minutes’ on foot.

name: Hotel Zinkensdamm
description: Situated in the trendy Södermalm district in Stockholm, by the green oasis of Tantolunden Park, is STF Hotel Zinkensdamm. It offers modern rooms with free WiFi access. All rooms at STF Hotel Zinkensdamm have wooden floors, and are decorated in warm, earthy tones. They include flat-screen TVs and well planned work areas. On-site leisure options include mini golf, a relaxing sauna and a playground for children. Guests can rent bicycles at the hotel. The Zinkadus Bar & Café serves traditional Swedish dishes. Outdoor dining is possible during warm summer evenings. A buffet breakfast is served every day. Hornstull Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. Stockholm city centre and the Old Town are both within an 8-minute metro ride.

name: Hotel Söder
description: Hotel Söder is situated in the trendy Södermalm district of Stockholm, 250 metres from Medborgarplatsen Square. It offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs and private bathrooms with shower. The modern guest rooms at Söder Hotel feature a seating area. All rooms have wooden floors and a work desk. A full breakfast with cereals, bread and hot options is served every morning in the dining room. Free tea and coffee are available at all times. Medborgarplatsen Metro Station is 250 metres from the hotel. Stockholm city centre and the Old Town are both within is a 5-minute metro ride away.

name: Scandic Sodra Kajen
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 283 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided on request. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a 24-hour fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and shopping on site. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Stockholm? This hotel has facilities measuring 7589 square feet (705 square meters), including a conference center. Property Location With a stay at Scandic Ariadne in Stockholm (Central Stockholm), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Värtahamnen Ferry Terminal and Stockholm Olympic Stadium. This hotel is 2.1 mi (3.3 km) from Vasa Museum and 2.6 mi (4.1 km) from Gröna Lund. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Mistral serving guests of Scandic Ariadne. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM and on weekends from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM. Renovations This property is closed from November 1 2022 to June 1 2024 (dates subject to change). Optional Charges Nearby parking fee: SEK 110 per night (33 ft away) Pet fee: SEK 200 per accommodation, per stay Service animals are exempt from fees Early check-in fee: SEK 150 (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Only dogs and cats are allowed Maximum number of pets per room 2 Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is availableViajes Exito Hotels

name: Generator Stockholm
description: Generator Stockholm is set in Stockholm and is a short walk from Cityterminalen Central Bus Station. Those staying at the property can also enjoy free wireless internet. There are a variety of amenities available to guests of the hostel, such as a 24-hour reception, a coffee bar and meeting rooms. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hostel also allows guests to discover the best of the local nightlife. The modern rooms feature views of the city. Bar Hilma is a modern place at Generator Stockholm to relax with a beverage after dinner. A selection of dining options can also be found in the surrounding area. Generator Stockholm is ideally situated for discovering Stockholm with Central Post Office Building, Hotorget and Tegnerlunden within walking distance. Sergels Torg, Drottninggatan and Stockholm City Hall are a short stroll away.Revato

name: City Backpackers Hostel
description: This hostel is set in a 19th-century building, 500 metres from Stockholm Central Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Drottninggatan shopping street. WiFi internet, evening sauna and pasta are free. Ice skates can be borrowed for free during winter. All rooms at City Backpackers Hostel have air conditioning and heating. Lockers are available and padlocks can be bought in the reception. Snacks and drinks are available in the reception throughout the day. For self-caterers, there is a fully equipped kitchen with microwaves and refrigerators. Guests can also enjoy a meal or drink in the restaurant Nomad, located next to the hostel. The lounge offers Mac and PC computers with free internet access, TV with cable channels and Swedish movie nights. There is also a library with magazines and a book exchange. During summer, the beautiful open courtyard is furnished with tables and chairs

name: Scandic Kista
description: Located in Stockholm, Scandic Kista is within a 10-minute drive of Solvalla and offers disabled parking. It provides free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Kista Galleria. There are a variety of facilities at the hotel on offer to guests, such as a sauna, an express check-in and check-out feature and a gym.
