For those travelling with children Scandic Kista offers a games room. Rooms at Scandic Kista are well-appointed and have a private bathroom, a desk and a flat-screen TV. They are also fitted with cable/satellite channels, ironing facilities and a hair dryer. To make sure the day gets off to a good start, a buffet breakfast is provided every morning at the hotel's restaurant. A variety of eating options are also found in the area. Scandic Kista is ideally located for exploring Stockholm with Kista Science City within walking distance. Stockholm's Golf Club is within a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Welcome Hotel Barkarby
description: This good-value hotel is 15 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm city centre. It features free Wi-Fi, in-room flat-screen TVs and gym. For an extra charge, the Welcome SPA offers two outdoor pools, heated to 38 degrees all year, two saunas and a cold bath. Welcome Hotel Barkarby’s popular breakfast buffet includes hot and cold dishes. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves both Swedish and international cuisine. Parking is free on site. Facilities include a free internet computer and pool table. The Barkarby Shopping Area and Stockholm Quality Outlet are 5 minutes’ drive from the hotel, offering 100 shops and outlet stores. Järvafältet Nature Reserve with its walking and jogging trails is 5 minutes’ walk away. Friends Arena is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Stf Långholmen Hostel Beds
description: Boasting a garden, a shared lounge as well as a bar, STF Långholmen Hostel Beds is situated in the centre of Stockholm, 2.4 km from Monteliusvägen. The property is around 4.4 km from Stockholm City Hall, 4.5 km from Stockholm Central Station and 4.6 km from Royal Swedish Opera. The accommodation features a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hostel, the rooms include a wardrobe. At STF Långholmen Hostel Beds the rooms have a shared bathroom with a shower. Museum of Medieval Stockholm is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Stockholm Cathedral is 4.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 8 km from STF Långholmen Hostel Beds.

name: Rygerfjord Hotel & Hostel
description: Rygerfjord Hotel & Hostel is housed in 3 ships anchored at the southern shore of Lake Mälaren in Stockholm. It offers free WiFi and cabin-style rooms with city and lake views. At Rygerfjord Hotel & Hostel, guests can choose rooms with either private or shared bathrooms, that are spread over 3 boats. Guests also have access to shared kitchen facilities. Bed linen and towels are included. The on-board restaurant serves Swedish classics, such as meatballs and mashed potatoes, while drinks can also be enjoyed in the bar. Relaxation options include a guest lounge with a large flat-screen TV and comfortable leather armchairs. A free internet computer is found in the lobby. Both Stockholm’s Old Town and the trendy Södermalm district are within a 10-minute walk from the ship.

name: Stf Af Chapman & Skeppsholmen
description: Located on Skeppsholmen island in Stockholm, this STF hostel is split between a late 1800s ship called Af Chapman and former navy barracks called Hantverkshuset. Moderna Museum and East Asia Museum within walking distance. Guest can choose from guest rooms or ship cabins. The guest rooms located in the main building feature large windows, high ceiling and views of the water or park. Some of the ship cabins have a small sitting area and a small window with a city view. Both options include access to shared bathroom facilities. Guests can enjoy a traditional Swedish breakfast buffet. The on-site café serves light meals. There is also a shared kitchen where guests can prepare own meals. During June to August, guests can relax on the sun deck on Af Chapman. The Östasiatiska Museet Bus Stop is 150 metres from the hostel. Kungsträdgården Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk from STF af Chapman & Skeppsholmen.

name: Lilla Rådmannen
description: Welcome to Freys Hotel Lilla Rdmannen. We have a fantastic reputation for our professional and personal service and for our warm and friendly atmosphere.The hotel is located in a peaceful area in the heart of Stockholm just moments away from the busy shopping street Drottninggatan. This charming part of the city is also known for its antique and vintage shops and many green parks. Stop for a chat, a drink or a snack in the cosy lobby bar or discover the many cafs, restaurants and trendy bar in the neighborhood. The hotel has 62 individually decorated stylish rooms. Hotel Lilla Rdmannen is the perfect base for visiting Stockholm!iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotell Dialog
description: Hotel Dialog offers basic accommodation in Stockholm, 1 km from the world’s largest IKEA store at Kungens Kurva. It offers private parking on site and rooms with free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Dialog Hotel have a TV and private bathroom. A portable DVD player, hairdryer and iron can be borrowed from the convenient 24-hour reception. A buffet breakfast is served every morning, while drinks and snacks are available at the lobby kiosk. Laundry services are also possible. The nearby retail park at Kungens Kurva provides a variety of shopping and entertainment options, including the Nordic region's largest cinema in the Heron City mall. A bus stop is located just across the street and the nearest underground station is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Stockholm city centre is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Freys Hotel
description: Welcome to Freys Hotel a historic hotel right in the heart of Stockholm. Freys Hotel has a fantastic reputation for our professional and personal service and for our warm and friendly atmosphere. The Hotel is one of Stockholms oldest brands with a rich history filled with exciting events and interesting stories. We stem from one of the oldest transportation companies in Sweden, registered as early as 1896. Freys hotel has 127 beautiful rooms, all individually decorated with high comfort and style. The hotel is the perfect starting point for your business or shopping trip. Stockholms shopping district is just around the corner and sightseeing tours and entertainment is just a few minutes away.The express train from the Arlanda stops on the opposite side of the street next to the Central Station.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Red Boat
description: Set over 2 boats, this hostel is anchored at Riddarfjärden Bay of Lake Mälaren in central Stockholm. It provides a restaurant with lunch and dinner options, a bar and two sun terraces with outdoor furniture. Each simply decorated room at Den Röda Båten includes wooden furnishings, bed linen and a wardrobe. Most cabins have shared bathroom facilities, which are located in the hallway. Superior cabins include a private bathroom. Some cabins feature views of the lake. Free WiFi is available on both boats. A daily breakfast buffet is available at Röda Båten. Slussen Metro Station and the city’s historic Old Town are both within 650 metres of the hostel. The trendy Södermalm district, 10 minutes’ walk away, offers a wide selection of shopping, dining and nightlife choices. Stockholm Central Station is a 3-minute Metro ride away.

name: Bo Hotel
description: Located by Tele2 Arena in Stockholm’s Tolv shopping area, this hotel offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi access. Bo Hotel is 500 metres from Globen Metro Station. All the air-conditioned rooms at Bo Hotel feature a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Stockholm Central Station is a 10-minute metro ride away. The surrounding Tolv shopping area offers a bowling alley and a variety of shops, restaurants and bars.

name: Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm
description: As a guest at the Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm, you not only have an ideal location in the city center, but also a welcoming and homely atmosphere. With our 143 rooms and conference facilities the hotel is just as good whether you are here for business or pleasure. The hotel is owned by the YWCA-YMCA Central which is a non-profit organization with over 2,000 members, ranging from basketball, gymnastics, camps for music, choirs, orchestras, youth choir and more. All our profits go to the YWCA-YMCA Central's children and youth. The rooms are spacious and have good workspace and Wi-Fi. All rooms also have shower, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, safe, and free television. Garage is available but must be pre booked as we have limited space. Guests have free access to the gym, so you can stay in shape even when you're on the road. The gym is well equipped and has changing rooms plus a sauna. The dining room serves a large breakfast buffet each morning. The Best Western Kom Hotel Stockholm is certified by Ecolabel, which means that we do our utmost to reduce energy consumption and use of chemicals. Here you can sleep with good conscience. From January 1, 2018, Best Western Kom Hotel is entirely cash free. It will be faster and easier for you as a guest, and you will be contributing to the safety of our staff. You can pay with all major credit cards or prepayment via 3rd party authorization. Thank you for your understanding and for helping us make our working environment safer.bestwestern.com

name: Unique Hotel Jungfrugatan
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Stockholm, Unique Hotel Jungfrugatan offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Private parking is available on site. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at Unique Hotel Jungfrugatan also have a city view. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Unique Hotel Jungfrugatan include Army Museum, Stureplan and Vasa Museum. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

name: Unity Hammarby Sjöstad Stockholm
description: Located in Stockholm, 1.9 km from Sickla Beach and 3.7 km from the centre, UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a fitness centre. Private parking is available on site. The aparthotel offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, free toiletries and walk-in shower. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a kettle. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available daily at the property. At UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad you will find a restaurant serving European cuisine. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy skiing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. Tele2 Arena is 1.7 km from UNITY Hammarby Sjöstad, while Fotografiska - Museum of Photography is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 15 km from the aparthotel.

name: Aiden by Best Western Stockholm City
description: Aiden By Best Western Stockholm City offers a modern design with a peaceful atmosphere, close to city life, and excellent connections to central Stockholm and Arlanda Airport. Nearby, you'll find the Fridhemsplan subway station, only two stops from the central station. The hotel is centrally located at Alstromergatan 39, on Kungsholmen in Stockholm, keeping you close to attractions, restaurants, and entertainment. Shopping enthusiasts will also be pleased, as the hotel is just a stone's throw away from the trendy Vastermalmsgallerian. We offer hotel rooms of various sizes, ranging from small rooms without windows to rooms that can accommodate up to five people. Choose the one that suits your needs best. All overnight guests have free access to the hotel's sauna. You will also have access to wireless internet in all rooms and public areas at no extra cost. Garage parking is available adjacent to the hotel. We offer a daily breakfast buffet in a peaceful environment.bestwestern.com

name: Grand Hôtel Stockholm
description: Grand Hôtel Stockholm is situated on the waterfront opposite the Royal Palace and the Old Town, 1 km from Central Station. It offers fine dining, a spa and free WiFi access. Grand’s air-conditioned rooms have an LCD TV with satellite channels and a minibar. Rooms also offer courtyard, city or waterfront views. Grand Hôtel Nordic Spa & Fitness has exercise equipment and an in-door pool. Spa treatments include facials, foot massages and naprapathy. Grand Stockholm also offers chauffeur-driven limousine transfers and 24-hour room service.

name: Hotel With Urban Deli
description: This trendy hotel is located 1 floor below the popular Urban Deli restaurant and marketplace in central Stockholm. You can reach Sergels Torg Square and the lively Stureplan dining and shopping area within 500 metres. High-speed WiFi is available. The industrial-modern rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, satellite channels and media sound system. The tiled bathroom features a rain shower. Rooms are without windows. The Royal Palace is 1.2 km from Hotel With Urban Deli, while Gamla Stan is 1.4 km from the property. Bromma Airport is 7 km away.

name: Stf Långholmen Hostel
description: This hostel is housed in a refurbished 1800s prison building, on the central Stockholm island of Långholmen. Surrounded by greenery, it offers a restaurant, a shared kitchen and free Wi-Fi and parking. STF Långholmen Hostel’s rooms have a private bathroom or shared facilities. Some rooms include a TV. In summer, guests can unwind in the garden. Other facilities include rental bikes and bookable washing machines and dryers. The sandy Långholmsbadet beach is just 50 metres from STF Långholmen, while Hornstull Metro Station is within 10 minutes’ walk. The scenic surroundings provide opportunities for relaxing walks. The nearby Hornstull district has plenty of restaurants and bars.

name: Good Morning Kista
description: Situated just off European Route E4, Good Morning Kista is 15 minutes’ drive from central Stockholm. Early breakfest from 06:00 and free parking are offered here. Husby Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away. The modern guest rooms at Good Morning Kista have a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. WiFi access is available throughout the entire hotel. Dinner can be enjoyed at the on-site restaurant & bar, that also offers a 24-hour snack menu. Kista Galleria Shopping Centre and Kista Science City are both within a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Stockholm city centre is a 20-minute metro ride away.

name: Hotel Point
description: Located in the trendy SoFo district of Stockholm, Hotel Point is close to restaurants, cafes, theatres and nightlife. This hotel is 1.4 km from Stockholm’s Old Town and 2 km from the Ericsson Globe Arena. Stockholm Central Station is 12-minutes away by metro. Each room here includes free WiFi, an electric kettle and a cable TV. The fresh bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. Hotel Point’s restaurant serves a daily breakfast buffet. Other facilities offered at the hotel include a 24-hour front desk, ticketing service and luggage storage. If you feel like exploring the city, Vasa Museum and the ABBA Museum can be reached in 35-minutes from the hotel via public transportation. Stockholm Arlanda Airport is 43 km away.

name: Hotell & Värdshuset Clas På Hörnet
description: This Stockholm hotel is located within a 10-minute stroll of Tekniska Hogskolan Metro Station. It also offers room service, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. The rooms are air conditioned and include tea and coffee making facilities, an iPod docking station and a private bathroom. There is also a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Serving European, French and regional dishes, Browallshof Hotell & Matsal's sophisticated restaurant provides a convenient dining option for those who wish dine on site. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. A wide selection of cafés and restaurants can also be found close by. Stockholm's attractions, including the Stockholm Public Library, are easily accessible on foot from Browallshof Hotell & Matsal. The surrounding neighbourhood is also well known for its shopping.Revato

name: Reimersholme Hostel
description: Surrounded by water, charming architecture and green areas, this hotel is situated on Reimersholme Island in central Stockholm. Hornstull Metro Station is about 10 minutes’ walk away. Most rooms at Reimersholme Hostel have an armchair or sofa, while some also include a flat-screen TV. Bathroom facilities are either private or shared. Great food and snacks can be enjoyed in our in-house restaurant and wine bar. Breakfast is included for guests in the morning. We regularly play live music or have great DJ's in our Bar, and sometimes we have karaoke nights. Either way you will always have a great evening with us. In the summer we rent out stand-up paddle boards, and have Waydoo-courses. And if you feel like it, why not book our Sauna with friends for the night. Only 5 minutes’ walk away is the scenic island of Långholmen and its beautiful walking trails along the waterfront. Guests can take a swim in the water or rent a kayak here.

name: Aiden by Best Western Stockholm Kista
description: Aiden By Best Western Stockholm Kista is a modern and well-located hotel in the heart of Kista. With just a short walk to the headquarters of many major IT companies, Kista Science City, Science Tower, Kista Center, and Kistamassan (Kista Fair), the location is perfect for business travelers as well as visitors to the fair. The hotel has 117 rooms of various sizes, from single rooms for the budget-conscious to larger rooms with a mini-kitchen and dining table for long-term business travelers. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi, and each hotel room has its own access point as well as wired internet. All rooms at Aiden By Best Western Stockholm Kista feature stylish and modern design. The rooms have wooden floors, continental beds with enhanced sleeping comfort, and a TV with special features. The bathrooms have rain showers and hairdryers. Other facilities offered include indoor parking, luggage storage, and safes. You now also have the opportunity to get on/off the airport buses from Arlanda Airport that stop at Kistamassan. The hotel's bar is located in direct connection to the reception. Here, our guests have the opportunity to relax in a cool lounge environment with both modern and classic elements.bestwestern.com

name: Riddersviks Herrgård
description: Located on the shores of Lake Mälaren, this elegant manor features a large garden and a private boat jetty. Stockholm’s city centre is 25 minutes’ drive away. Dating back to 1762, Riddersviks Herrgård today offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi, a TV and a writing desk. Traditional décor and garden views create a cosy atmosphere. Breakfast is served daily at Ridderviks Manor. A variety of restaurants as well as shops can be found at Hässelby Shopping Mall, a 10-minute walk away. Leisure options at Ridderviks Herrgård include billiards. In addition, the Viksjö Golf Course is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Stf Zinkensdamm Hostel
description: This Stockholm hostel is in a quiet area by Tantolunden Park, in the vibrant district of Södermalm. It offers a restaurant, 2 communal kitchens, as well as free pasta and a free public internet computer. Guest rooms at Zinkensdamm Hostel have either a private bathroom or shared facilities. Rooms with bathrooms have cable TV. Zinkensdamm Hostel’s traditional Swedish breakfast buffet includes freshly baked bread. The in-house restaurant, Zinkadus Bar & Café, serves light dishes during the day and in the evening a dinner menu of Swedish specialities. Cold drinks and sandwiches are available at all times in the kiosk next to the reception. The nearby park has a mini golf course, plenty of open areas and a small sand beach. Shops, bars and restaurants are just around the corner. Hornstull Metro Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Scandic Oceanhamnen
address: Broderna Pihls Grand 2, 252 36 Helsingborg, Skane Lan
description: Boasting a restaurant and a bar, Scandic Oceanhamnen is situated in Helsingborg, 200 metres from Fria Bad Beach and less than 1 km from Pålsjö Beach. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has a sauna and a 24-hour front desk. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. Tropical Beach is 1.5 km from Scandic Oceanhamnen, while Soderasens National Park - Main Entrance is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ängelholm-Helsingborg Airport, 35 km from the accommodation.

name: Clarion Grand Hotel
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Grand in Helsingborg, SE near the Karnan medieval tower, Kronborg Castle, Sofiero Castle, Fredriksdal open-air museum and the Lund University Campus Helsingborg. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, a sauna, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have mini bars, desks, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Helsingborg hotels like our Clarion Hotel Grand. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 SEK per stay. The hotel features a new hotel concept kitchen and table signed by top chef Marcus Samuelsson.Choice Hotels

name: Good Morning+ Helsingborg
address: Gustav Adolfs Gata, 47, 250 02 Helsingborg, Skane Lan
description: Good Morning + Helsingborg is located 2 km from Helsingborg C. Guest can take bus number 4 or 7 from the stop right outside of the station to the hotel. Free WI-FI, gym, relax and sauna. The property offers a lobbybar and restaurant. This hotel is located 2 km from Helsingborg Ferry Terminal and Helsingborg Central Station. Guests can enjoy free access to a gym and sauna. Free WiFi and parking are also available. All classically decorated guest rooms at Good Morning + Helsingborg feature wooden floors, flat-screen TV and a work desk. Local dishes, with a focus on steak, are served at Good Morning’s restaurant. Guests can relax with a drink the lobby bar. The E4 Highway is 1 minutes' drive away. Vallar Beach is 2 km away. The large Väla Shopping Centre is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotell Linnea
description: The Hotell Linnéa, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western is a privately owned breakfast hotel in the heart of Helsingborg, situated in one of the city’s classic houses from 1887. As a business hotel its location is fantastic, just a short walk to plenty of restaurant and Helsingborg Central Station where trains, boats, buses and taxis are ready at your need. The highway is within two minutes from our parking garage. All rooms are of high class, for both the private and business travelers. Our guests often emphasize that our hotel exudes a genuine and family-like feeling, which we are determined to live up to. None of our 38 rooms are the same as another. All the rooms have their own personal decor and modern technical equipment, among other things that is what is unique about Hotell Linnéa, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western. The opening hours at Reception are changing and we are happy to assist you between 06:00 – 20:00 Monday-Saturday. For check in later than 20:00, please contact us. Sunday 06:30-15:00 For check in later than 15:00, please contact us.bestwestern.com

name: The Vault Hotel, WorldHotels Crafted
description: If you look up the word 'vault' in the dictionary, you will see that one of the definitions is 'a secure room in a bank in which valuables are stored'. And you may well have known that already. Whether you did or not, it is not unreasonable to ask what that has to do with a hotel in Helsingborg, Sweden. Quite a lot, actually, as The Vault Hotel is built on an authentic bank vault from the beginning of the last century. From the time the building itself was a bank. But if you hear a tinkling sound today, it probably is not change being counted – it is more likely to be ice cubes landing in a glass to chill it for your Manhattan. Welcome to The Vault – the hotel that is steeped in roots and traditions. We see everyone who visits us as our friend, no matter whether you have just dropped in for an espresso, a few olives and a cold beer in the trattoria, are here for a meal in the restaurant, or intend to spend the night sleeping soundly in one of our sumptuous beds. Save your time for The Vault.bestwestern.com

name: Comfort Hotel Helsingborg
description: The pet-friendlyComfort Hotel Helsingborg is a luxurious establishment minutes from many popular attractions. The city of Helsingborg is known as the Pearl of Oresund and is home to the Karnan Castle. This Helsingborg hotel is minutes from the majestic Town Hall, Maria Church and Dunkers Cultural House, a Scandinavian landmark. Enjoy hotel amenities such as a restaurant, a hotel bar, free full breakfast, free wireless Internet, an indoor pool, a sauna, banquet and meeting rooms, a public computer with Internet, laundry facilities and copy and fax services, to name a few. All guest rooms have desks and TVs. Book today.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Hotel Mollberg
description: Set in a charming 19th-century building in the middle of Helsingborg, Elite Hotel Mollberg offers rooms with unique classical décor and tasteful furnishings. Guests can enjoy free sauna access and WiFi during the stay. The spacious rooms at Elite Mollberg Hotel have comfortable beds with extra large pillows. A minibar, work desk and flat-screen TV with cable channels are also provided. Guests can enjoy fine dining in the Restaurant At Mollberg. The Bishop’s Arms offers a variety of beer, whiskey and snacks in an English-style atmosphere. A breakfast buffet is served every day. The hotel is located a 10-minute drive from Sofiero Palace & Gardens. Helsingborg Castle is only a 1-minute walk from the hotel. Helsingborg Central Station is located 400 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Kärnan
description: Hotel Kärnan is located opposite Helsingborg Central Station and Ferry Terminal. Guests can relax or watch TV in the hotel's library bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Each room has a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a private bathroom. The daily breakfast buffet includes local produce. During summer, guests can eat on the inner courtyard. Guests can also enjoy discounts at a nearby gym. The hotel is named after the medieval tower, Kärnan, which is 3 minutes’ walk away.

name: Radisson Blu Metropol Hotel Helsingborg
address: Carl Krooks Gata 16, 25225 Helsingborg, Skane Lan
description: Centrally located in Helsingborg, this hotel is only 300 metres from the central train station and ferry terminal. Free WiFi and access to the fitness centre are included. Helsingborg Castle is a 10-minute walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Each modern room comes with a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and minibar. A hairdryer and free toiletries are found in the private bathroom. Guests can personally choose pillows from Radisson Blu Metropol Helsingborg's pillow menu. The hotel's restaurant, Nelly's Food Etc, offers a range of international and locally inspired dishes. The bar Cocktails and Champagne by Hans Bihl serves trendy and classic cocktails and drinks. The award-winning buffet breakfast also includes hot dishes made upon order. Olympia Stadium and Norra Hamnen Marina are within 1.5 km of the hotel. The nearest airport is Sturup Airport, 70 km from the property.

name: Clarion Hotel Sea U
description: Clarion Hotel Sea U is the perfect hotel both for your weekend getaway or your company meeting. During your stay you can visit one of our inspiring restaurants, our breathtaking Skybar, or relax on our outdoor terrace with pool and training facilities. You will also find shopping streets, restaurants and the local marina within a 5 minutes walk from the hotel. The hotel is a 3 minute walk away from the central station, where you can access both local and domestic transportation services. In only a 25 minute by car or taxi you will reach Angelholm-Helsingborg Airport for flight connections.Choice Hotels

name: V Hotel Helsingborg, BW Premier Collection
description: Welcome to the V Hotel Helsingborg, BW Premier Collection®, located just a five minutes walk from Helsingborg Central Station, the harbor and the medieval tower, Karnan. The hotel is located in a refurbished 19th-century building. All hotel rooms are individually designed and offer a mix of antique and modern decor. Some come with a balcony!bestwestern.com

name: Elite Hotel Marina Plaza
description: This central Helsingborg hotel is located on the harbour, beside bus, train and ferry terminals. Guests can enjoy sea and city views in addition to a popular breakfast buffet. Elite Hotel Marina Plaza’s stylish guest rooms feature flat-screen TVs, generous workspace, a sofa and free wired internet access. Many also include designer furniture and views of either the inner courtyard or the Öresund strait. Marina Bar & Bistro offers an à la carte menu while the Bishop's Arms Pub boasts a large selection of beers and whiskey.

name: Scandic Helsingborg Nord
description: Located 5 km from Helsingborg’s city centre, this hotel is 15 minutes’ drive away from Helsingborg Ferry Terminal. Guests can enjoy free WiFi, free on-site parking and an indoor pool. Guest rooms at Scandic Helsingborg Nord each offer satellite TV and a work desk. They are classically decorated and feature wooden floors. The hotel’s restaurant Köksbaren offers classic dishes, including soups, pasta and sandwiches. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail in the on-site bar. Other facilities include a cosy library in the bar area and a children’s playground. Guests enjoy free access to the fitness centre, including a sauna and indoor pool. Fredriksdalsteatern, the outdoor theatre, is an 8-minute drive away from Scandic Helsingborg Nord. Hotel staff can recommend other area attractions and activities, such as Vasatorps Golf Club, 4 km away.

name: Sundsgården hotell & konferens
description: Set in a school building 9 km south of Helsingborg, this hotel offers brightly decorated rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Sundsgården Bus Stop is a 5-minute walk away. A seating area, work desk and wardrobe feature in all rooms at Sundsgården hotell & konferens. Each room has a private bathroom with shower. A breakfast buffet is served each morning in the dining room and a á la carte dinner can be booked in advance. Guests can rent a bicycle on site. The hotel also has a tennis court and beach volleyball court. The Sofiero Castle and Park is a 20-minute drive away, while restaurants are within a 20-minute walk of the property. Ängleholm-Helsingborg Airport is 40 km from Sundsgården.

name: Lydinge Resort
description: Situated next to the 18-hole Lydinge Golf Club, this hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Hyllinge’s main square and 15 minutes’ drive from central Helsingborg. It offers free private parking. Each room at Lydinge Golf Club Resort features parquet floors and a flat screen TV. A small putting green is available for a fee. Fishing licences can be bought for the neighbouring pond, where guests can also swim. Other nearby amenities include a lit jogging track and tennis courts. Lydinge has a restaurant with lunch specials and an a la carte menu. Hyllinge Shopping Centre also has a variety of restaurants and stores, about 1 km away.

name: Gothia Towers & Upper House
description: Welcome to Gothia Towers! The perfect choice for both business travellers and leisure guests. Here you can enjoy a wide range of facilities - all under one roof, next door to the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre. In addition to hotel rooms you will find a flower shop, spa, café, restaurants, bars, conference rooms, banquet and exhibition halls. You will find a total of 1184 great rooms in all three of Gothia Towers’ imposing towers – with everything from that little something extra to a real touch of extravagance. Enjoy great comfort and tasteful décor and furnishings in our well-equipped double or family rooms. The majority of our rooms also boast wonderful views of the city. Gothia Towers is located in central Gothenburg, right in the thick of things on Korsvägen, just a couple of blocks from the main boulevard Avenyn. We are close to the city centre with excellent transport links, right next to Scandinavia's largest amusement park, Liseberg, Universeum science centre as well as concert and sport arenas like Scandinavium and Ullevi stadium. We offer several different restaurants and bars with everything from light meals in our café to modern à la carte dining. Come and enjoy breakfast, brunch, lunch or dinner. Or why not drop in for a beer, a glass of wine or other beverages? We have something for all taste buds and every occasion. As a guest at Gothia Towers you have discounted access to Upper House Spa, with a protruding champagne pool, Gothenburg’s highest hammam, saunas, an experience shower and a relaxation suite, where you can enjoy and take in the incredible views. Gothia Towers has been designed for exciting meetings, and for planned meetings we offer both small and really large conference facilities. We have options to meet your requirements and can tailor a conference or meeting to suit your needs.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Hotel Post
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Post in Gothenburg, SE near Liseberg, Ullevi Stadium, Slottskogen and the Swedish Exhibition and Congress Center. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, a fitness center, a business center, outdoor and indoor pools, meeting space and a convention center. All guest rooms have refrigerators, TVs and coffee makers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Plaza Hotel
description: Located in a stylish neo-classical building in central Gothenburg, Elite Plaza Hotel combines old-fashioned comfort with modern amenities. It offers free Wi-Fi and tastefully decorated rooms with LCD TVs. All comfortable rooms at The Elite Plaza are equipped with a minibar, cable TV and safe. The decór is a blend of international style and classic Scandinavian design. The atrium-style Swea Hof restaurant offers elegant gourmet dining based on local ingredients. Drinks can be enjoyed at the Plaza Bar and at the British-style The Bishop’s Arms pub. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00, except during peak periods. Guests can unwind in the relaxation area, complete with a sauna and a fully-equipped gym. The Swedish Exhibition and Congress Centre and the Liseberg Amusement Park is located an 8-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Odin
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Odin in Gothenburg, SE near the Liseberg amusement park, Swedish Exhibition Centre, Goteborg Opera, Universeum and the Swedens national science and discovery center. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a fitness center, free weekday newspaper and a restaurant. All guest rooms have refrigerators, microwaves, desks, hair dryers, coffee makers, irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Gothenburg hotels like our Clarion Collection Hotel Odin.Choice Hotels

name: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel, Gothenburg
description: Located in the centre of Gothenburg, Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Goteborg is a short walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, and provides easy access to nearby bars and eateries. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Hagabadet Spa & Yogastudio and Hotel Gym. This 4-star hotel offers valet parking, an express check-in and check-out feature and a kids club. Welcoming and helpful team members are available 24 hours a day. The luxurious feel of each room at Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Goteborg is complemented by facilities like mini bars. They all offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. Those staying at Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Goteborg can wake up to a satisfying breakfast at Noot Nordik Kitchen, plus dinner at Radisson Blu Restaurant after a day of sightseeing. The hotel is ideally located for discovering Gothenburg with Gothenburg Cathedral within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit Ullevi and Kungsportsavenyn.Revato

name: Hotel Pigalle
description: Offering elegant, individually designed rooms, this hotel is next to Nordstan Shopping Centre and just 5 minutes' walk from Gothenburg Central Station. It provides free Wi-Fi, a lobby bar and top-floor restaurant with terrace. Housed in a building from 1749, Hotel Pigalle offers bright, colourful rooms with a large flat-screen TV, seating area and carpeted floors. Each of the marbled bathrooms includes a shower. Guests can relax with a drink or snack in the well-appointed lobby bar. Hotel Pigalle also serves a daily breakfast. Set in the charming converted attic, Restaurant Atelier serves lunch and dinner made from the best local ingredients. Within a 15-minute walk is Ullevi Arena and Avenyn, Gothenburg’s main street. Brunnsparken Tram Stop, just 100 metres away, is 8 minutes' ride from the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre. Hotel guests enjoy discount prices on off-site parking.

name: Hotel & Ristorante Bellora
description: This stylish, boutique hotel overlooks the main street of Avenyn in central Gothenburg. It offers rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. Valand Tram Stop is 100 metres away. Each modern guest room at Hotel Bellora features cable TV. Several also include a seating area. Attractions such as Liseberg Amusement Park and Ullevi Stadium are both within 15 minutes’ walk of this eco-friendly hotel.

name: Scandic Goteborg Central
description: Located less than a 10-minute stroll from Nils Ericson Bus Terminal, Scandic Goteborg Central provides guests with a convenient base when in Gothenburg. It is conveniently situated in the city centre. There are a range of facilities available to guests of the hotel, including meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. It is pet-friendly and provides private parking on site for those with a car. Rooms feature a desk, ironing facilities and blackout curtains. Those staying at Scandic Goteborg Central can enjoy a beverage at Rooftop Bar, before enjoying a meal at Food Bar. Gothenburg's attractions, such as The Gothenburg Opera and Nordstan, are easily accessible on foot from the hotel. Guests can also visit Gamla Ullevi, the City Museum of Gothenburg and Garden Society of Gothenburg.Revato

name: Liseberg Grand Curiosa Hotel
address: Herman Lindmans Torg 1, 402 22 Gothenburg, Västra Götaland
description: Attractively located in the centre of Gothenburg, Liseberg Grand Curiosa Hotel features buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a fitness centre and to a bar. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Liseberg Grand Curiosa Hotel the rooms include bed linen and towels. With staff speaking English and Swedish, advice is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Liseberg, Scandinavium and Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 25 km from Liseberg Grand Curiosa Hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Riverside Hotel Gothenburg
description: Situated in Lindholmen, this hotel overlooks Gothenburg’s harbour and the Göta River. It features free WiFi, a wellness centre and a rooftop terrace with a spa pool. The rooms at Radisson Blu Riverside Hotel include a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and tea/coffee facilities. Some rooms overlook the river. Guests have free access to Radisson Blu Riverside’s wellness area with gym and sauna. Parking spaces are found in front of the hotel and in a parking garage next to the hotel. International dishes are served at Cuckoo's Nest Restaurant. A wide selection of drinks can be enjoyed in the bar or on the terrace during summer. Lindholmen Bus Stop and Lindholmspiren Ferry Stop are both 200 metres away, while Gothenburg Central Station is 2.5 km from the hotel.

name: Clarion Hotel The Pier
description: Clarion Hotel The Pier strive to create a hotel where the east meets the west in both food, interior design and meetings. The hotel has 254 hotel rooms, two bars, conference areas and a wellness department with the ambition of creating an international meeting place and a new vibrant living room for Gothenburgers, right in the heart of innovative Lindholmen. The hotel will also be an obvious choice for food lovers as the aim is to create Swedens perhaps most authentic Chinese a la carte restaurant.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Riverton
description: Hotel Riverton is a contemporary independent design hotel located centrally in Gothenburg by the waterfront which is fully family-owned and operated since 1991. With personal care and attention to detail in every aspect of our guests experience, we've integrated the feeling of comfort, charm, and style combined with excellent food and drink experiences.Explore our story from our rooftop bar and restaurant to our rejuvenating spa and the comforts of our bedrooms making us the perfect destination for those who love unfussy luxury. Beautifully situated by the harbour entrance in Gothenburg, Hotel Riverton is located in the city centre and within walking distance to the Opera, the Casino and the chic shopping scene of Kungsgatan, Avenyn, NK and Nordstan. The charming old town and the picturesque Haga district is within a short stroll.Lindholmen Science Centre is just a ferry ride over, from Stenpiren which is a hub for trams, ferries and bus services, located 250 m from the Hotel. In summer time we highly reccomend to take one of the summer boats departing from Stenprien which takes you out to the gorgeous archipelago of Gothenburg. Within the hotel, there are two restaurants and one lobby bar, including View Skybar & Restaurant which is home to spectacular panoramic views across the Gothenburg harbour. Enjoy one of our award-winning cocktails in the bar or experience our a la carte menu from the 12th floor. Give yourself a break and unwind in our new Serenity Spa when staying with us in Gothenburg. Enjoy the inviting atmosphere and recover in our indoor pool, aromatherapy, steam or dry sauna or relax at your own pace in our Spa Lounge. We also offer a brand-new gym with the latest cardio machines from Precor, free weights and cardio technology from Preva. Please note, the minimum age requirement to enter the Spa facilities is 18 years old, from 16 years old if accompanied an adult. *CASH FREE from 1st Januari 2017*iHotelier/iStay

name: Quality Hotel Waterfront Goteborg
address: Adolf Edelsvards gata 10, 414 51 Gothenburg, Västra Götaland
description: The waterfront is where the sea meets the city, a charming part of Gothenburg that combines the old with the new. At the heart of this area stands the old Carnegie Porter brewery, now a four-star, full-service hotel with character. Hotel Waterfront Goteborg is your port of call for celebrations with family and friends, relaxation and business meetings. Make sure to take a look at our wide selection of activities and entertainment.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Draken
address: Olof Palmes plats 2, 413 01 Gothenburg, Västra Götaland
description: Clarion Hotel Draken is breathing art, music and design. The hotel is built around Gothenburgs historical cinema, Draken which is restored to its former beauty and is becoming the heart and soul of the hotel. With its 34 floors, 474 hotel rooms, 12 meeting rooms, rooftop restaurant bar, gym and spa - Clarion Hotel Draken will be the cultural amplifier of Gothenburg, and the natural place to meet, eat, relax and just enjoy life.Choice Hotels

name: Profilhotels Opera
description: This hotel is on Drottningtorget Square, 100 metres from Gothenburg Central Station. It offers free gym access, free in-room WiFi, and Italian and American cuisine. Nordstan Shopping Centre is around the corner. ProfilHotels Opera’s rooms have modern bathrooms and include a hairdryer. Some also offer a 32-inch flat-screen TV, climate control and heated bathroom floors. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant that is open every day or have a cocktail at the bar. The indoor pool and two saunas can be used for an additional fee. The Nordstaden Tram Stop is a 2-minute walk away. Opera Hotel’s guests receive discounts at a nearby car park.

name: Elite Park Avenue Hotel
description: This stylish hotel is ideally located on Gothenburg’s main street, Avenyn, and directly across from the Landvetter Airport Bus Stop. It offers a popular restaurant, an English-style pub and free WiFi access. The Bishop’s Arms serves traditional pub fare from Monday to Saturday, and on Friday and Saturday guests can also eat in the onsite atPark Restaurant. All modern rooms at Elite Park Avenue Hotel feature climate control, a satellite TV and comfortable arm chairs. Free leisure options include a gym, 2 saunas and small relaxation pool. Massages and other treatments can be booked separately. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 10:30 and check-out until 18:00, except during peak periods. Elite Park Avenue is just 200 metres from Gothenburg Art Museum and the City Theatre. There are several private and public paid parking options available.

name: Avalon Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Gothenburg, Avalon Hotel Gothenburg is a short walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, and just a few steps from nearby bars and eateries. The hotel also provides a terrace on its roof equipped with a pool. This 4-star hotel offers porters, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Couples will adore the hotel's features like vip rooms and honeymoon suites. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a mini bar and a coffee maker. All offer a flat-screen TV, a seating area and slippers. Guests staying at Avalon Hotel Gothenburg can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay nearby when looking for a bite to eat. Avalon Hotel Gothenburg is ideally situated for discovering Gothenburg with Kungsportsavenyn and Nordstan within a 10-minute walk. Gothenburg Cathedral is also only five minutes away.Revato

name: Hotell Onyxen
description: Hotell Onyxen is a small sustainable boutique and lifestyle hotel situated in a 19th-centry buildning. This hotel is directly across from Scandinavium arena. The Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre is a 5-minute walk away. Our rooms are picturesquely furnished where modern is mixed with a touch of boho and vintage, it feels like coming home when you stay with us. Complimentary tea and coffee are offered all day. Within a 10-minute walk is Liseberg Amusement Park and the city’s main entertainment street, Avenue. The Scandinavium Tram Stop is 100 metres away and takes guests to Gothenburg Central Station in 5 minutes.

name: First Hotel G
description: The stylish First Hotel G is situated above Gothenburg Central Station, across from Nordstaden Shopping Centre. It offers free Wi-Fi, sauna and gym access and an elegant champagne bar. First G is a fashionable design hotel featuring original work by Italian artist Silvia Papas. Its quiet, modern rooms offer grand views of the city or the hotel’s inner courtyard. All rooms include tea/coffee facilities, heated bathroom floors and an LCD TV. The trendy Cristal Champagne Bar is a popular hangout for locals. Situated in the open lobby, G Mat & Vin’s à la carte menu combines quality Swedish produce and internationally inspired cuisine. Dishes include shrimp sandwiches, lobster soup and veal steaks. Gothenburg Opera House and Lilla Bommen Harbour are a 10-minute walk from First Hotel G.

name: Comfort Hotel Goteborg
description: The smoke-free Comfort Hotel Goteborg offers a stunning view of the Gothenburg harbor, located conveniently between two bridges connecting Gothenburg mainland to Hisingen Island. Our hotel offers a great location that is minutes from Central Station within the heart of the city, which offers a splendid array of restaurants, shopping, entertainment and attractions like the Opera house, Casino Cosmopol and the Nordstan Shopping Centre. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, free WiFi, free daily newspapers, free coffee and guest laundry facilities, to name a few. Gothenburg hotels like the Comfort Hotel Goteborg will get you rested and ready for anything. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Rubinen
description: Scandic Rubinen is conveniently located in the city centre and is only a few minutes from the Rohsska Museum. Just a 10 minute walk from Goteborg Brunnsparken, the hotel provides guests with an ideal base while in Gothenburg. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Facilities include complimentary Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore what the local nightlife has to offer. Scandic Rubinen Hotel offers rooms equipped with a hair dryer, plus all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each private bathroom also comes with a bath or shower. During their stay at Scandic Rubinen Hotel Gothenburg, guests can enjoy a meal at Ruby Bar, which offers a menu including Mediterranean cuisine. A wide choice of cafés and restaurants are also available in close proximity to the property. Scandic Rubinen is conveniently situated for sightseeing in Gothenburg with Gothenburg Cathedral and Gotaplatsen within a 10-minute walk. Guests can also visit the Universeum and Ullevi.Revato

name: Dorsia Hotel & Restaurant
description: This modern and exclusive boutique hotel, 6 minutes’ walk from Gothenburg Central Station, is just 200 metres from Kungsportsplatsen Tram Stop. It offers free WiFi and a contemporary restaurant with bar. Bold décor and luxury Carpe Diem beds with Egyptian cotton bedding are featured in all Dorsia Hotel rooms. Each includes a minibar, bathrobes with slippers and an internet-connected Lava Invit TV with free movie channels. International cuisine with French influences is served at Dorsia Hotel & Restaurant. Guests can enjoy a daily breakfast buffet, à la carte lunch and dinner menus, along with room service. On Sundays, guests can enjoy afternoon tea. A variety of shopping, dining and nightlife options are all in the close surroundings. Gamla Ullevi Arena is 850 metres away, while Trädgårdsföreningen Park and Garden is a 3-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Vanilla
description: Set in a 19th-century building, this charming property is a 10-minute walk from Gothenburg Central Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, individually decorated guest rooms. Featuring bright and airy décor, all of Hotel Vanilla’s rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some also have a kitchenette. The property offers a lounge/bistro. During warm weather, guests can enjoy their meal in the cosy courtyard. Brunnsparken Tram Stop is just 3 minutes' walk from Vanilla Hotel. Less than a 5-minute walk away is Nordstan Shopping Centre, as well as the Avenyn and its quality shopping, dining and nightlife. Liseberg Amusement Park is 2 km away.

name: Quality Hotel Winn Goteborg
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Winn, Gotenborg in Gothenburg, SE near the Gothenburg Museum of Art, Goteborgs Konsthall art center, Gothenburg Concert Hall, Liseberg amusement park and Goteborg University. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless Internet, a restaurant, an indoor pool and meeting space. Guest rooms come with hair dryers, desks and TVs. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Winn, Gotenborg. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents/grandparents with no additional bedding. All Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are 100 percent non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Örgryte
description: Hotel Örgryte is a 20-minute walk from Liseberg Amusement Park and Scandinavium Arena. It offers free WiFi internet and a fitness centre. All rooms have a flat-screen TV. Örgryte Hotel’s modern rooms feature individual design and décor, including colourful rugs and wood furnishings. All have cable TV and either a sofa or armchairs. Some rooms also include a refrigerator. The lobby bar and restaurant serves a light menu as well as both hot and cold drinks. A generous breakfast buffet is also served there every morning. The popular swimming area around Lake Delsjön is just 10 minutes’ drive away. A local bus stops by the hotel, bringing guests to the city centre and Gothenburg Central Station within 10 minutes.

name: Scandic Europa
description: Located in the heart of Gothenburg, Scandic Europa is situated near Goteborg Brunnsparken, and just a few steps from nearby dining and nightlife options. It also offers an indoor pool, free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. Welcoming and helpful staff are available 24 hours a day. After a day of sightseeing in the local area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. Scandic Europa's stylish bar is an ideal spot to relax with a drink after dinner. Gothenburg's attractions, such as The Gothenburg Opera, are within a 10-minute walk of Scandic Europa. The surrounding area is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Good Morning+ Göteborg City
description: Featuring a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, Good Morning+ Göteborg City is located in the centre of Gothenburg, 1.1 km from Gothenburg Central Station. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from Ullevi. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near Good Morning+ Göteborg City include Nordstan Shopping Mall, Casino Cosmopol and Skansen Lejonet. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 27 km from the accommodation.

name: Scandic Crown
description: Located in central Gothenburg, this modern hotel is 4 minutes’ walk from Gothenburg Central Station. Nordstan Shopping Centre is 500 metres away. Free WiFi and city views from the top-floor relaxation centre are offered. Scandic Crown’s guest rooms all feature Nordic décor with wooden floors and light wood furnishings. Each room is equipped with a work desk and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The hotel’s in-house restaurant, Kronan Bat & Matsalar, serves Mediterranean-inspired dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink at the contemporary bar while reading a book from its library. Scandic Crown guests have free access to a hot tub, 2 saunas and fitness centre. Bicycles can be rented on site to explore the area. Ullevi Arena is about a 10-minute walk away from Scandic Crown. Trädgårdsföreningen Park is also nearby, only 200 metres away.

name: Dockyard Hotel
address: Skeppet Ärans Väg 23, 426 71 Västra Frölunda, Västra Götaland
description: Since summer 2023 we have new renovated standard superior rooms in the main building, refreshed conference rooms and restaurant area.Overlooking Gothenburgs historical harbour district, Dockyard Hotel features, flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. On-site facilities include a popular restaurant and a conservatory with waterfront views.The individual designed rooms of Dockyard Hotel are set in 3 different buildings, some of which date back to the 1800s. All buildings are within a short walking distance to the reception. Some rooms offer a view of the Gta River.Nya Varvsalln or Vagnhallen Majorna tram stop is a 15-minute walk away, bringing guests to the Gothenburg city centre within 15 minutes. In addition, free private parking is possible on site.iHotelier/iStay

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Mektagonen
description: Welcome to Clarion Collection Hotel Mektagonen, we are a hotel with a perfect location in Gothenburg. Our rooms are large and bright, many of them have a kitchenette and some of them have a sauna. Walking distance to Svenska Massa and Liseberg. Breakfast, afternoon biscuit and dinner buffet is included in the price.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic No.25
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Gothenburg. It also provides free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. All the contemporary rooms at Scandic No 25 feature a private bathroom, plus all the essentials for a comfortable stay. Those staying at Scandic No 25 can dine on international and local cuisines at the on-site restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay close by for a meal. Each evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Gothenburg's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Scandic No 25, with Nordstan and Gamla Ullevi only 10 minutes away. It is also within walking distance of Garden Society of Gothenburg, Ullevi and Gothenburg Cathedral.Revato

name: Scandic Opalen
description: Conveniently located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Gothenburg. It also provides free Wi-Fi, a sauna and free bicycle rental. This modern hotel offers a fitness centre, a 24-hour reception and meeting rooms. It is dog-friendly and has disabled parking for guests travelling with a car. After a day of exploring the nearby area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all offer a desk, ironing facilities and a flat-screen TV. Sample authentic local dishes at Scandic Opalen's in-house restaurant, or relax with a drink at the stylish bar. For those preferring to eat out, the surrounding area provides several bars and restaurants serving a range of different cuisines. Gothenburg's attractions, including Scandinavium, Ullevi and Svenska Massan, are within easy walking distance of Scandic Opalen. It is also within walking distance of University of Gothenburg and Liseberg.Revato

name: Kviberg Park Hotel & Conference
description: Kviberg Park Hotel & Conference is within 15 minutes’ drive of central Gothenburg. Facilities include a year-round indoor ski hall and free WiFi. Gothenburg Landvetter Airport is 17 km away. A seating area and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels are standard room features at Kviberg Park. All include a desk and a bathroom with shower. Further leisure options at Kviberg Park Hotel & Conference include a full-size indoor football pitch and Sweden’s largest beach volleyball hall. Guests can rent ski equipment on site. Guests can enjoy discounts to the adjacent gym. The on-site restaurant serves both lunch and à la carte dishes. A wide variety of meeting facilities are available. Liseberg Amusement Park and Ullevi are within 10 minutes’ drive of the property. Gothenburg Central Station is 4.9 km away, while there is a tram stop located 550 metres from the hotel.

name: Quality Hotel Panorama, Gothenburg
description: This hotel is 7 minutes’ walk from the Swedish Exhibition Centre and Liseberg Amusement Park. The main shopping street, Avenyn is 1 km away. It offers free WiFi and free access to the relax area. All rooms at Comfort Hotel Panorama are decorated in modern Scandinavian style and some have city views. The hotel's Barception sells food & drinks. Comfort Hotel Panorama has a well-equipped gym that is free for hotel guests and open 24 hours a day.

name: Best Western Tidbloms Hotel
description: The Best Western Tidbloms Hotel welcomes you to our hotel with a friendly staff and a building from the turn of the century, English style library and a Georgian restaurant in an original cellar environment. All this will make you feel welcome! The Best Western Tidbloms Hotel lies in a quiet area, only two kilometers from the city center and Svenska Massan/Liseberg. The tram station is close by, takes only ten minutes to the city center. Hotel parking is 150 SEK per night.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Backadal
description: Scandic Backadal is located in Gothenburg and offers free Wi-Fi and an indoor pool. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and a playground. The hotel's amenities, such as photocopier, children's play area, and honeymoon suites make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms are air conditioned and include a desk, an in-room closet and a private bathroom. There are also several rooms available for families. Serving international and local dishes, Scandic Backadal Hotel Gothenburg's relaxed restaurant provides a convenient dining option for those wishing to dine on site. In the evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Scandic Hotel Backadal provides a convenient place to discover Gothenburg Cathedral and Liseberg, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every traveller has a comfortable visit.Revato

name: Arken Hotel & Art Garden Spa
description: CLOSE TO BOTH CITY & SEA - 15 minutes to Gothenburg City and close to Volvo Company headquarters, Arendal and the Ports of Gothenburg. With access to exclusive and indulgent experiences in a calm and tranquil world. Arken Hotel & Art Garden Spa are exactly that. We have done our outmost to create a sanctuary, where it is great to just be. We offer you 149 comfortable, fully equipped and non-smoking guest rooms. 28 conference rooms with capacity and flexibility for 2-800 delegates and a high quality restaurant with excellent service. Art Garden Spa offers you an array of baths, saunas and activities at an additional charge. Children under 15 years are only allowed in the spa area during certain school holidays. The fitness gym is available to all guests, free of charge.iHotelier/iStay

name: Quality Hotel 11
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel 11 in Gothenburg, SE near the Port of Gothenburg, Goteborgs Stadsmuseum museum, Gothenburg Opera, Goteborg Museum of Art and the Ostindiefararen, an old freight ship. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless Internet, a sauna, meeting space and copy, print and fax services. Guest rooms come with TVs, trouser presses, irons, ironing boards and more. Get more value at our Quality Hotel 11. Book now. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Treetop Spa Hangout & Hotel
description: Located 7 minutes by car from Gothenburg, this hotel offers a 2000 m² big outdoor and indoor spa. Guests have free access to the gym. The individually decorated rooms include free WiFi and a flat screen TV. Private parking is also available free of charge. The property features both indoor and outdoor pools, and a spa that guests can access for a fee. It is possible to book massage. The guests can enjoy the in house restaurant and four different bars. The restaurant offers a breakfast buffet and an internationally inspired à la carte menu. Treetop Spa Hangout & Hotel is 100 metres from Berghöjdsgatan Bus Stop. The No. 42 bus reaches central Gothenburg in 12 minutes.

name: Hotel Villan
description: Situated in the Eriksberg district, just a 10-minute ferry ride from Gothenburg city centre, this intimate waterfront hotel offers rooms with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Hotel Villan is housed in a refurbished wooden building from the early 1900s. The stylish guest rooms have a seating area and a work desk, and each room features a tiled bathroom with underfloor heating. Complimentary hot drinks, fruit and candy are available at all times in the lobby. A buffet breakfast is included in the room rates and served each morning. Guests can enjoy a restaurant and bar at the property, and conference rooms are available as well. A shoe polishing service is offered at the hotel. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, located 32 km from the property.

name: Spar Hotel Gårda
description: Spar Hotel Gårda is located 1.5 km from Gothenburg Central Station and Liseberg Amusement Park. It offers a popular buffet breakfast and free WiFi. A terrace is open throughout the summer. All rooms have cable TV, a work desk, wooden floors and a private bathroom. Facilities at the hotel include free gym and sauna access, as well as a children's playroom in the summertime.

name: Barken Viking by Dialog Hotels
address: Lilla Bommens Torg 10, 411 04 Gothenburg, Västra Götaland
description: This charming hotel is set on a restored 1907 windjammer in Gothenburg’s Gullbergskajen Quay. It offers great views of the waterfront, free Wi-Fi access in public areas and spacious maritime-themed rooms. The bright rooms at Hotell Barken Viking feature wood panelled walls and original work by marine artist Franz Glatzl. Flat-screen TVs and private bathrooms are standard in all. Barken Viking Hotell is within 5 minutes' walk of Nordstan Shopping Centre and Gothenburg Central Station.

name: Hotel Isbolaget
description: Located on the beachfront in an island called Donsö, Hotel Isbolaget features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi. The hotel provides sea views and a terrace. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. At Hotel Isbolaget each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel Isbolaget. Gothenburg is 22 km from the hotel, while Kungsbacka is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 46 km from Hotel Isbolaget.

name: Apple Hotel
description: Located 200 metres from Kaggeledstorget Tram Stop, this hotel is 3.5 km outside central Gothenburg. It offers an on-site lobby bar and a free dinner. Private parking and WiFi are also free. A TV, work desk, as well as a private bathroom are featured in each Apple Hotel & Konferens Göteborg guest room. Guests can work out at Apple Hotel's gym or relax in the outdoor pool during summer. A sauna is also available. A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the restaurant. Guests can enjoy meals by the pool during summer. The hotel is a 11-minute tram ride from Liseberg Amusement Park. Sävenäs Train Station is 700 metres from the hotel. Nya Ullevi Stadium is a 5-minute tram ride away.

name: Comfort Hotel City
description: Comfort Hotel City is a welcoming urban base camp in the centre of Gothenburg, ideal for a pleasant and central accommodation at a reasonable price. It lies right in the centre of the pulsating restaurant and shopping district, only 3 minutes walk from Central Station. Accommodation suits single, double, twin or four-bedded rooms with effective sound insulation and comfortable beds to ensure a good nights sleep. The Barception with delicafe is open around the clock with local food and drinks, a town guide, a blazing campfire and there is a guest kitchen with laundry facilities.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Eggers
description: Htel Eggers is located in a carefully restored, heritage, building right in the city center, only 78 footsteps from Gothenburg Central Station - an excellent location for both business travelers and tourists. Htel Eggers is one of Gothenburg's most historic hotels and is actually one of Sweden's oldest still in operation. This hotel has been run since 1859 and history is explicit in the walls. Generations of guests from all over the world have stayed with us - everything from royalty and diplomats to artists, wedding couples and rock musicians. Not to mention all the business travelers who have stayed at Htel Eggers of all time, which for many is and has been an obvious choice given the proximity to the city and the railroad. The hotel rooms, conference rooms and restaurant are all unique, high standard and are tailored to today's requirements but with contemporary charm and aesthetics. The personal service we try to keep as it was before.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Heden, BW Signature Collection
description: This hotel is 500 metres from the Avenyn shopping street and 10 minutes’ walk from Liseberg Amusement Park. It offers free in-room WiFi, a free wellness centre. Hotell Heden’s rooms feature typical Scandinavian design and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Heden Hotell's fresh, wellness centre includes a gym and sauna. The lobby has a cosy fireplace area and a bar serving light meals. The Swedish Exhibition Centre is 500 metres from the hotel.

name: Spoton Hotel
description: Spoton Hotel is located in Gothenburg and offers free WiFi throughout the property. Liseberg amusement park is just 150 metres away. Guests can enjoy à la carte and buffet options at the hotel’s sports bar. Gothenburg Central Station is a 30-minute walk away from the hotel, as well as the city center. Each of the modern hotel rooms are soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning. All rooms include a private bathroom with a shower. There is a shared lounge area where guests can relax. There are also 3 microwaves and vending machines on site. The hotel also offers bike hire. Korsvägen is 700 metres away, where the Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre is located. Scandinavium is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Spoton Hostel & Sportsbar
description: Spoton Hostel & Sportsbar is located in Gothenburg, only 150 metres away from the south entrance of Liseberg Amusement Park. The closest tram station is just a 2-minute walk away.The rooms include air conditioning and free WiFi. Bathrooms are either private or shared. At Spoton Hostel & Sportsbar you will find a bar and restaurant serving internationally-inspired dishes. A buffet is offered during lunch and an a la carte menu for dinner. Shared facilities include a kitchen and communal lounge. The hostel is 850 metres from the Swedish Exhibition and Congress Centre, 1.1 km from Scandinavium Arena and 2 km from Ullevi stadium. Gothenburg Central Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Spar Hotel Majorna
description: This hotel is 2 minutes’ walk from Chapmans Torg Tram Stop and 700 metres from Gothenburg’s Ferry Terminal. It offers a popular breakfast buffet, free WiFi and a terrace open during summer. Spar Hotel Majorna’s rooms have a cable TV and work desk. The tram can be heard in the rooms facing the street. Facilities at Spar Majorna include free gym access and a sauna. A children’s play area and a shuffleboard is available in the lobby. Hotel Spar Majorna lies close to Gothenburg’s Linnéstaden and Haga districts. Hotel staff can recommend local cafés and restaurants. Slottsskogen Park is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotell Göta Avenyn
description: Located next to main pedestrian street Avenyn, the convenient City Hotell Avenyn offers easy access to all of Gothenburg's sights. Stay just a 10 minute walk from the Liseberg Amusement Park and the Svenska Mässan Conference Centre. All of City Hotell Avenyn's comfortable guest rooms have wooden floors, TV, phones and radios. The high room ceilings keep the air fresh. All rooms include 24 hours of free internet access. For relaxing moments after a busy day exploring Gothenburg, there are a variety of restaurants and bars just within 5 minutes' walk.

name: Apartments At Hotel Riverton
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 6 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and ovens. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include microwaves and electric kettles, and housekeeping is provided weekly. Amenities Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a spa tub, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Gothenburg? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 1625 square feet (14 square meters), including a conference center. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Apartments at Hotel Riverton, you'll be centrally located in Gothenburg, a 4-minute drive from Nya Ullevi Stadium and 6 minutes from Liseberg Amusement Park. This aparthotel is 1 mi (1.6 km) from Nordstan Shopping Center and 1 mi (1.7 km) from The Avenue. Dining Satisfy your appetite at one of the aparthotel's 2 restaurants. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM. Optional Charges Self parking fee: SEK 225.00 per night Pet fee: SEK 500 per pet, per stay The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve rollaway/extra beds This property accepts credit/debit cards; cash is not accepted Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. During summer, check-in is at 4 PM and check-out is at 11 AM. Check-Out Checkout is done at 10:00 AM Pets Pets allowed Only dogs are allowedViajes Exito Hotels

name: Mayfair Hotel Tunneln
description: Just 150 metres from Malmö Central Station and Stortorget Square, this historic hotel offers free WiFi and a popular breakfast buffet served in a medieval cellar vault. Guest rooms include tea/coffee facilities and a flat-screen TV. Mayfair Hotel Tunneln is set in a 14th-century building once used by Swedish royalty. Some rooms have original, exposed ceiling beams. The on-site restaurant Que serves Vietnamese fusion cusine. Södergatan shopping street is only 3 minutes’ walk away. Mayfair Hotel Tunneln’s friendly staff can provide tourist information and recommend attractions to visit.

name: Clarion Hotel Malmö Live
address: Dag Hammarskjolds torg 2, Malmö, Skane Lan
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Malmo Live in Malmo, Sweden near the Malmo Arena, Folkets Park, Rundan sightseeing boats and the Caroli shopping center. Amenities at our hotel include free breakfast, free WiFi, a business center, an exercise room and two restaurants. All guest rooms have desks, hair dryers, mini bars and irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Best Western Plus Park City Malmo
description: This modern hotel is located in the Western Harbour area of Malmö, right next to the World Trade Centre. It offers a popular restaurant, a gym and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of Park Inn Malmö are decorated in bright colours and include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and a fresh bathroom. Some rooms overlook the famous Turning Torso skyscraper. RBG Bar & Grill offers gourmet burgers, steaks and salads. In summer, the garden terrace is a popular meeting place for afternoon coffee or evening cocktails. A local bus stops by Park Inn, bringing guests to the city centre and Malmö Central Station in less than 10 minutes.

name: Profilhotels Garden
description: ProfilHotels Hotel Garden is 250 metres from Malmö’s main square, Stortorget, and about 5 minutes’ walk from the Central Station. It offers free WiFi, sauna. After sauna, guests can relax in the charming rooftop gardens, surrounded by fruit trees and herbs. All guest rooms include cable TV and work desk. Some also have a seating area with sofa. Ironing facilities are available. A large complimentary breakfast buffet is served every morning at the in-house restaurant. Later in the day, an á la carte menu is available at the restaurant La Gare on the grownd flor of the hotel. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar from Tuesday until Saturday. On Sundays it's possible to order a drink from the reception. The hotel’s central location provides easy access to culture, dining and entertainment. The Södergatan shopping street is just 150 meters away.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Temperance
description: The pet-friendly Clarion Collection Hotel Temperance is perfectly located for both business and leisure travelers, just minutes from train stations and public transportation. We also provide easy access to many local attractions, including the Casino Cosmopol, Malmohus Castle, Malmo Theatre and the award-winning Turning Torso skyscraper. Enjoy hotel amenities like free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, an exercise room and sauna, copy services, meeting space and coffee, tea and fruit 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms come with hair dryers, cable TVs, irons and ironing boards. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Hotel Esplanade
description: Elite Hotel Esplanade is located beside the Lilla Torg Square in the heart of Malmö. It offers 24 hour room service and air conditioned rooms with luxury bedding and free WiFi. All the stylishly decorated rooms at Elite Hotel Esplanade feature a 49-inch flat screen Smart TV. Each room has a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available at Quan, an Asian eatery where you can unwind and relax. Quan serves the hotel's breakfast buffet as well as a well composed à la carte menu with clean and healthy Asian flavors. American-style dishes are offered at T.G.I. Friday’s restaurant, located next door. (Please note that, Quan is closed for summer holidays till 14th of August, 2023). Guests can socialize in the hotel bar after working out in the fitness room. Slottsparken Park, with the Malmöhus Castle, is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Malmö Central Station can be found 450 metres away.

name: Scandic Kramer
description: Scandic Kramer offers elegant accommodation in Malmo and is within walking distance of Malmo Central Station. It has a gym, as well as free Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna.
