After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all boast an en suite bathroom where a hair dryer can be found. Kramer features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of the day. Alternatively, there is a large selection of international restaurants nearby. The area surrounding Scandic Kramer Hotel Malmo is well-known for its shopping. Lund University and Malmo Arena are just a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Noble House
description: The Best Western Plus Hotel Noble House is a newly renovated hotel in down town Malmo. The most exciting hotel in Malmo is situated at Gustav Adolfs Square. Here you will find a mixture of modern design, classical art and personal service, which creates an atmosphere you are longing to return to. You will find the best shopping in town, just around the corner, nearby you also can enjoy our beautiful parks and canals. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Quality Hotel View
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our smoke-free Quality Hotel View in Malmo, SE near the Malmo Arena, Mobila shopping center, Moderna Street, Folkets Park and the Malmohus Castle. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free WiFi, an exercise room, a restaurant and a business center, to name a few. Guest rooms come with sofa sleepers, hair dryers and irons and ironing boards. Get more value at our Quality Hotel View. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Good Morning+ Malmö
description: This hotel is situated 3 km from Malmö Exhibition & Conference Center. Rooms are modern with hardwood floors, flat-screen TVs and free WiFi access. Swedbank Stadium is 600 metres away. A work desk is featured in all the brightly decorated rooms at Good Morning+ Malmö. Each room has a fully-tiled bathroom with shower. Some rooms have tea/coffee facilities, bathrobes and slippers. A continental buffet breakfast with local specialities is available each morning. In the evening, the restaurant offers a range of dishes on an a la carte. Meals and drinks can be enjoyed in the garden during summer. Guests enjoy free access to the gym, sauna and relaxation area. Private parking is possible in the garage or on the outdoor deck. A bus stop is found 250 metres from Good Morning+ Malmö. Central Malmö is a 10-minute bus ride away. Copenhagen Kastrup Airport is 23 km away, while Malmö-Sturup Airport is 24 km from the hotel.

name: Scandic Stortorget
description: Located a short walk from Malmo Central Station, Scandic Stortorget is an ideal base when in Malmo. It also features a sauna and a gym. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour reception, free bicycle rental and meeting rooms. There is off-site parking for those travelling with a car. All the rooms at Scandic Stortorget provide a desk, plus all the essentials for an enjoyable stay. They are also equipped with a hair dryer and a shower. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. Guests can also try one of the various bars and restaurants in the local area. The hotel is located in the city's premier shopping district. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Malmo.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Malmo
description: Situated under a 10-minute walk from Malmo Central Station, Radisson Blu Hotel Malmö offers guests a convenient base while visiting Malmo. It is conveniently positioned for guests wanting to visit local attractions. This modern hotel features a number of amenities, such as a 24-hour reception, a concierge and a currency exchange. It is dog-friendly and has disabled parking for those travelling with a car. Just minutes from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the local nightlife. Rooms at Radisson Blu Hotel Malmo provide a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the complimentary tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's sitting area. Radisson Blu Hotel Malmo's in-house restaurant, Thott´s, is a popular place to have a meal. A choice of cafés and restaurants can also be found in the area. Radisson Blu Hotel Malmö is an ideal base to explore nearby Malmo Arena and Frihamnen. Guests are also able to visit Malmo University and Malmo Concert Hall.Revato

name: Scandic Triangeln
description: Located in Malmo, Scandic Triangeln is an easy drive from Malmo Arena and provides public parking on site. It has a spa and wellness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, free bicycle rental and a sauna. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They provide a flat-screen TV, a desk and a private bathroom. In-house dining options include Lean Grill & Bar, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the area. Scandic Triangeln is close to Triangeln Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Malmo and its surrounding areas. The local neighbourhood is also famous for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Elite Hotel Savoy
description: This hotel is set in a historic building, directly opposite Malmö Central Station and the airport bus stop. It offers free WiFi, sauna access and a popular breakfast buffet. Elite Hotel Savoy’s rooms feature cable TV, tea/coffee facilities and luxury toiletries. Some rooms include street or courtyard views. The on-site Bishop’s Arms pub stocks whiskies and beers from around the world. The Södergatan shopping street is just a few minutes' walk from Elite Savoy. Staff will gladly offer tips on local restaurants and attractions.

name: Elite Plaza Hotel Malmö
address: Gustav Adolfs Torg 49, 201 80 Malmö, Skane Lan
description: Set in an elegant 19th-century building, this hotel is next to Gustav Adolf Square and 700 metres from Malmö Central Station. WiFi, gym and sauna access are free. Tea/coffee facilities, cable TV and air conditioning are standard at Elite Plaza Hotel Malmö. All rooms feature modern decor, furniture and bathrooms. The Bishop’s Arms Pub serves traditional pub dishes. In addition, guests can choose from a variety of selected beers and whiskies. Elite Plaza Hotel's central location provides easy access to culture, shopping and entertainment. Malmö Castle and its beautiful gardens are only 500 metres away.

name: First Hotel Jörgen Kock
description: This hotel is about 5 minutes' walk from Malmö Central Station. It is also less than 10 minutes’ walk from Malmö’s main square and shopping area. It offers free Wi-Fi. First Hotel Jörgen Kock’s guest rooms all feature modern furnishings and cable TV. A seating area and work desk are also offered. The bistro-style restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and light evening meals. Jörgen Kock’s cosy bar has an open fireplace for added comfort. Hotel staff can recommend restaurants and stores nearby. Västra Hamnen harbour and Dockan are about 700 metres from the hotel. Guests can enjoy a round of golf at Malmö Golf Club, 5 km away.

name: MJ's
description: MJ's is located only 50 metres from Lilla Torg Square in central Malmö. This hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with a seating area and flat-screen TV. All rooms at MJ's feature a work desk and beds from Grange, as well as wall-to-wall carpeting. Breakfast is served in MJ’s fresh breakfast garden. Guests are also welcome to enjoy a drink in the bar. Several restaurants are available in the immediate area. The King’s Park with the Malmöhus Castle is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Malmö Central Station is 300 metres away.

name: Best Western Malmo Arena Hotel
description: Best Western Malmo Arena Hotel is located in the southwestern part of Malmo. Besides 395 guest rooms, we offer six rooms for meetings and events, a restaurant, a sports bar and a sky bar on the 15th floor. Free gym, sauna and Wi-Fi are included for all staying guests. The hotel is located 150 meters from the train station Malmo Hyllie where you can reach Malmo Center in three minutes, Kastrup in 12 minutes and Copenhagen Center in 25 minutes. Enjoy your stay!bestwestern.com

name: Scandic S:t Jörgen
description: Situated in Malmo, Scandic St Jorgen provides a peaceful base, close to everything the area has to offer. It provides free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a sauna. The hotel has a fitness centre with cardiovascular equipment, free weights and a sauna. For those travelling with children Scandic St Jorgen offers a children's play area. Rooms at Scandic St Jorgen are well-appointed and provide a desk and a telephone. All offer an en suite bathroom where a hair dryer can be found. Sample authentic local cuisine at Scandic St Jorgen's restaurant, followed by a drink at the cosy bar. The hotel is close to Malmo Central Station, making it easy for guests to explore Malmo and its surrounding areas. It is also within walking distance of Malmo Castle and the Malmo Opera and Music Theatre.Revato

name: Scandic Segevång
description: Located in Malmo, Scandic Segevang offers complimentary wireless internet and a gym. It also features free bicycle rental. Scandic Segevång offers modern accommodation, and is an ideal base for holiday makers or business travelers alike. The spa and wellness centre provides a chance to get pampered and relax. The rooms at Scandic Segevang are comfortable with facilities including a private bathroom. They feature blackout curtains, ironing facilities and a desk. Scandic Segevång Hotel features both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind at the end of the day. There is a range of breakfast options to choose from each day. Scandic Segevang Hotel Malmo is under a 25-minute drive from Malmo Airport. Lund Cathedral, Malmo Arena and Lund University are within an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Scandic Malmö City
description: Scandic Malmo City provides a comfortable setting when in Malmo. It is conveniently positioned for guests wishing to visit local attractions. This 4-star hotel provides luggage storage, an express check-in and check-out feature and a 24-hour reception. For those travelling with children Scandic Malmo City offers a games room. Malmo Kaptensgatan Hotel has 243 rooms, all of which are equipped with a range of facilities to ensure a comfortable stay. There are also a number of rooms especially for families. Scandic Hotel Malmo features a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax at the end of the day. Alternatively, there is a large choice of international restaurants close by. Scandic Malmö City is also moments from the area's well-known nightlife destinations, and the Malmo Stadsbibliotek is a 10-minute stroll away. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Triangeln Railway Station and Malmo Central Station, which allows convenient access in and around Malmo.Revato

name: Best Western Hotel Royal
description: Welcome to the little hotel with personal service located in the heart of Malmo, The Best Western Hotel Royal. We are within a five-minute walk from the railway station, Malmo Casino, shopping, entertainment, sights, restaurants, and parks. The owner Bayram Altuntas along with the staff will do their best to make sure all your needs are met. The reception desk is open 24-hours. Enjoy your stay!bestwestern.com

name: Comfort Hotel Malmö
description: The Comfort Hotel Malmo is a modern and urban city hotel offering effective solutions. With recently added rooms, this is one of the largest hotels in Malmo and is located near the City Tunnel, Malmo Central Station, airport buses and the train to Copenhagen. Enjoy hotel amenities like one of the best gyms free of charge, a hotel bar, breakfast, meeting space and more. Our reception area sells light meals, salads, sushi, sandwiches, soups and various beverages. Guest rooms come with Hilding beds, Jetson chairs, LCD TVs, wireless Internet and tiled bathrooms with shower or bath. We also offer compact living in some rooms, accommodating up to four people. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Story Hotel Studio Malmo, part of JdV by Hyatt
description: Located just a 5-minute walk from Malmö Central Station, Story Hotel Studio Malmö offers modern designer rooms with a 48-inch LED TV with Apple TV, free WiFi and a private bathroom with a rain shower. Complimentary mineral water and a safe are standard at Story Hotel. All rooms have views either of Malmö city or Öresundsbron and the ocean. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries. Guests can enjoy Story Hotel's restaurant and bar, Kasai in the Sky, which is located on the 14th floor of the hotel. It features a large outdoor terrace with impressive city and ocean views. This is where breakfast is served every morning. The hotel also has a 24-hour front desk. Malmö Arena is 5 km away, while Malmö Airport is 25 km away.

name: Havshotellet
description: Located in Malmö just 50 metres from the sea side, this marine themed hotel offers guest rooms with décor inspired by historic and contemporary ships and boats. Limhamn marina is right in front of Havshotellet, and from some rooms you can also see the Öresund bridge. Central Malmö is 15 minute's drive away. Every room is equipped with YouBeds which firmness can be easily adjusted according to guests’ own preference via a remote control. Room facilities include a refrigerator, coffee/tea facilities and complimentary chocolate. The bathrooms have comfortable underfloor heating, a shower and free toiletries. A breakfast buffet is served daily in Havshotellet's cosy dining room, which features photos of Limhamn's history. Free parking and WiFi are available for guests. Staff can gladly provide tips about the surroundings and restaurant recommendations. Strandparken is located across the street from this hotel and offers walking trails for leisure. Sibbarp beach is just 900 metres away. Emporia Shopping Centre is 5 km away, while Copenhagen Airport is 28 km away.

name: Camp Ripan
description: Surrounded by mountain nature, the family-owned Camp Ripan.is a 10-minute car ride from Kiruna city centre. It offers free WiFi, in-room flat-screen TVs and traditional, seasonal Swedish and Sami food. Parking is free on site. Spread across 3 buildings, Ripan’s cosy, chalet-style rooms have private entrances and bathrooms with showers. Many offer kitchenettes and convenient private ski storage. Restaurant Ripan features local Nordic ingredients including reindeer and fish. The Aurora Spa can be accessed for a surcharge. Ski tracks and hiking trails are right next door. Snowmobiling, ice fishing and dog sledding are popular in winter. Summer leisure options include horse riding, guided city tours and hiking. Camp Ripan is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Scandic Kiruna
description: No description found

name: Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden
description: The Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden is a Sami inspired family-owned hotel with a big heart and focus on the guest. The building was from the beginning a school but has been converted into a modern hotel of high class where style and design have been tastefully combined with today´s demands for comfort and service. The inspiration for the hotel genuine interior comes from the Sami culture and the Sapmi Region. The ownerd bought in 2006 the old school Norrmalmskolan and renovated it to the hotel that we proudly can offer our guests today. The hotel is centrally located within walking distance to the train, bus stations and city center. We offer our guests comfortable and bright airy rooms that are well suited for vacation as well as for work. All rooms are tastefully decorated with Sami inspired art. The hotel has two restaurants on site, PUB eden and Arctic Thai & Grill. As a guest at the Best Western Hotel Arctic Eden, you also have access to the hotel´s relaxation area with sauna and swimming pool. Wireless Internet is available in the entire hotel and is free of charge.bestwestern.com

name: Spis Hotel & Hostel
description: SPiS Hotel & Hostel is just 150 metres from Kiruna’s main street, Föreningsgatan. It provides free WiFi and a free sauna and relaxation area. All hotel rooms have a flat-screen TV, a fully-equipped shared kitchen and shared bathroom facilities located on each floor. Guests have free access to shared laundry facilities. The lobby offers a gift shop and a selection of books and magazines. Kiruna Bus Station is about 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Kiruna Airport is 6.5 km away. On-site parking is free.

name: Máttaráhkká Northern Light Lodge
description: No description found

name: Abisko Turiststation Stf
description: No description found

name: Icehotel
description: Situated in Jukkasjärvi in northern Sweden, the Icehotel features rooms entirely made out of sculptured ice from the neighbouring Torne River. Warm rooms are also offered. A bookable sauna experience featuring a sauna, wood-burning hot tub and ice bath is available for a fee. Holding a temperature between -5 to -8 degrees Celsius, the individually themed cold rooms include hand-carved ice furnishings by international artists. Guests sleep in thermal sleeping bags on beds covered in reindeer hides. In the morning, guests can enjoy the shared sauna. All warm rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, dining area, and a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Free WiFi is offered in all rooms. The on-site Icehotel restaurant serves traditional dishes with locally produced ingredients. Guests can relax with hot drinks and snacks in the warm lounge, or enjoy cocktails served in glasses made out of ice in the below-freezing Icebar. Guests can enjoy a complimentary entrance ticket to the Icehotel. The area around the property is popular for outdoor winter activities such as dog sledding, reindeer sled excursions, and snowmobile tours. The staff will also be happy to arrange activities such as river rafting, hiking, and fishing. During summer season, guests will experience midnight sun. In the winter, guests can enjoy northern lights if lucky. The closest airport is Kiruna Airport, 14 km from the property. Bookable shuttle service is available upon request for a fee.

name: Donners Hotell
description: No description found

name: Clarion Hotel Wisby
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Wisby in Visby, SE near the Visby City Center, Botanical Garden, Gotlands Fornsal museum and the Visby Airport. Amenities at our hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Visby hotels like our Clarion Hotel Wisby. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Hotell Visby Börs
description: Set within 200 metres of Almedalen Park and 1.8 km of Visby Ferry Terminal, Hotell Visby Börs features rooms in Visby. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is situated 400 metres from Wisby Strand Congress & Event. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotell Visby Börs, rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. You can play billiards at Hotell Visby Börs, and bike hire is available. Gotska Golf Club is 3.7 km from the hotel, while Lugnet Golf Course is 7.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Visby Airport, 3 km from Hotell Visby Börs.

name: Börsen Apartment Suites
description: With a stay at Börsen Apartment Suites in Visby (Innerstaden), you'll be steps from Gotlands Art Museum and Almedalen. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Visby? This hotel has facilities measuring 2691 square feet (250 square meters), including a meeting room.Hotels.com

name: Hotell Breda Blick
description: Set in the medieval and historic town of Visby on the island of Gotland, Hotell Breda Blick offers guest rooms and apartments near the Botanical Gardens. WiFi is free in public areas. All rooms have a TV, fridge and a bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Some also have a balcony or a private outdoor seating area. Other facilities at Breda Blick include a garden to relax in and an on-site café during summer. The ferry terminal with connections to Oskarshamn and Nynäshamn is only a 5-minute drive away.

name: Best Western Solhem Hotel
description: Welcome the Best Western Solhem Hotel - the most price worthy hotel in Visby, located outside the famous 12th century city wall in the midst of a beautiful park known as 'Palissadparken', just one step away from the city center of Visby. The beautiful harbor, the medieval town and Visby's many pubs and restaurants are all within walking distance, but not in any way interfere with the sense of calm surrounding the hotel. The Best Western Solhem Hotel has 99 rooms and three conference halls, with beautiful surroundings and warm atmosphere. We offer high standards and great service at a low cost. We have a limited number of rooms where dogs and cats are allowed at an additional cost. Please contact the reception for availability and price.bestwestern.com

name: Novi Resort
description: Located by Norderstrand Beach, this property offers guest rooms and apartments in Visby and just 1 km from Visby’s UNESCO-listed medieval town centre. It offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool and a large terrace. NOVI Resort’s rooms feature modern décor, designer furniture and flat-screen TVs with DVD players. All options have private patios or balconies with Baltic Sea views. Most have a kitchenette. Guest can hang out by the poolside or eat at NOVI's summer restaurant Grill & Bar between June and August. It offers light dishes, gourmet dining and great sea views. NOVI Resort is a 10-minute walk from Visby’s 13th-century city wall and Almedalen Park. Gotska Golf Course is less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Scandic Visby
description: This harbour side hotel is just across the street from Gotland’s ferry terminal and 10 minutes’ walk from Visby’s medieval city centre, itself a UNESCO World Heritage Site. WiFi internet access is free in all rooms. Guests enjoy free gym, pool and sauna access. Bookable spa treatments are available for a fee. Each guest room at Scandic Visby offers a TV and private bathroom. Many of the ground-floor rooms have private furnished patios. Guests can book boat tickets and rent bicycles at Visby Scandic’s reception. Young children will appreciate the on-site playground. The lobby bar serves snacks and drinks. Guests can enjoy the poolside Restaurant Koggen year-round. Private parking spaces are found on-site. additional cost will apply. Within a 5-minute drive are attractions such as Visby Museum and the 12th-century cathedral.

name: Best Western Strand Hotel
description: A first class hotel with a service minded staff and environmental certification. The hotel is located in the middle of the town, near the sea inside the city wall of the World Heritage town of Visby. Beautiful medieval houses and alleys in Visby surround the hotel. The Best Western Strand Hotel is the old Visby Brewery which became a hotel in 1982, from a family owned hotel with 13 rooms to one of the largest hotels in Visby today with 124 rooms and suites. Ferry and airport are within easy reach. Please note: Management reserves the right to refuse to provide accommodation to persons less than 20 years of age if no parents are attending.bestwestern.com

name: Visby Gustavsvik
description: This holiday village lies by the beach, 3 km north of the medieval town of Visby. It offers parking, a beach sauna and a communal laundry room. Guests can choose between self-catering apartments or guest rooms. The apartments at Visby Gustavsvik have a kitchen and a private patio. Guests rooms include a patio, TV and a private bathroom with shower. During summer, guests can enjoy dinners at the on-site restaurant Viken. Gustavsvik’s facilities include bicycle rental and a barbeque area. The surrounding area offers hiking trails and jogging tracks as well as activities such as football and volleyball. Guests can borrow sports equipment at the reception.

name: First Hotel Kokoloko
description: Located in Visby, 1.3 km from Visby Ferry Terminal, First Hotel Visby has a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and 2 barbecue areas, as well as free WiFi. Among the various facilities are a garden and a terrace. The hotel features a hot tub. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. All rooms include a private bathroom. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property. Almedalen Park is 2 km from First Hotel Visby. The nearest airport is Visby Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: Värdshuset Lindgården
description: This hotel is located within the medieval city walls of Visby and offers free WiFi access and an on-site restaurant. Almedalen Park is 150 metres away. Guest rooms at Värdshuset Lindgården have a private entrance and views of the town or garden. Each room includes a flat-screen TV, desk and a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The restaurant serves traditional Swedish dishes and has a large selection of wines. Outdoor serving in the garden is possible in nice weather. During summer, live music events are arranged. Lindgården is located on Strandgatan Street, which offers several cafés, bars and restaurants. Kallbadhuset Beach is a 2-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Helgeand Wisby
description: This hotel is housed in a medieval, 13th-century building, only 100 metres from Visby Cathedral. Free WiFi is offered. Each room at Hotel Helgeand Wisby is individually decorated with designer furniture in solid wood and medieval-themed interior. All have a work desk and satellite TV. Some also feature a luxurious in-room bathtub. Shared facilities at Helgeand Wisby include an inviting lounge bar with an open fireplace and comfortable armchairs. In summer, guests can relax in the garden. The hotel is centrally located in the inner city of Visby with walking distance of 2-10 minutes to all the restaurants, parks and to the seafront.

name: Quality Hotel Friends
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Arena in Solna, Sweden near the Friends Arena, Haga Park, Stockholm city center, Stockholm Bromma Airport and the Stockholm Arlanda Airport. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a gym, a restaurant, a banquet hall and more. Guest rooms come with hair dryers and desks. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Arena. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Arlanda Airport Terminal
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Arlanda Airport Terminal in Stockholm-Arlanda, SE near Sky City, Rosersberg Palace and Skansen. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, a fitness center, a business center and meeting space. All guest rooms have refrigerators, TVs, mini bars, desks, coffee makers and hair dryers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Children 12 and younger stay free when they share the same room with their parents or grandparents, if no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Etage
description: The pet-friendly Clarion Collection Hotel Etage is a luxurious hotel, located minutes from exciting attractions like Lake Malaren, the third largest lake in Sweden. This hotel is also minutes from Malardalen University, Vasa Park, Turbine House and the Skrapan skyscraper, which houses the highest cocktail bar in Sweden. Enjoy hotel amenities such as meeting space, copy and fax machines, free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, free wireless Internet, a sauna and coffee, tea and fruit 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms come with desks, hair dryers and TVs. Book with us today.Choice Hotels

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal
description: Explore the fascinating city of Stockholm from modern AC by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal. Our 4 star hotel is located in Solna, 10 minutes from Stockholm city center, and perfect for business meetings and events. It is strategically located near public transport and walking distance to Friends Arena, Arenastaden och Mall of Scandinavia. Our pet friendly hotel offers an urban, modern, high-style design for a feeling of harmony and creativity. Featuring 223 hotel rooms and suites, AC by Marriott Stockholm Ulriksdal also offers meeting rooms, a bar and restaurant PicPoc by Pontus Frithiof, and Viitalize Gym and Wellness. The conference center includes 3 multi-functional meeting rooms with the capacity to host 110 guests in the largest meeting room. The meeting rooms are all equipped with the latest technology, necessary equipment as well as hi-speed WiFi for a successful business event. Relax in our Nordic hotel spa and fitness center with saunas, pools, and treatments.Marriott

name: Grand Hotell Hörnan
description: Grand Hotell Hörnan is set in an early 20th-century building, 400 metres from Uppsala Central Station. All rooms include a flat-screen TV, a seating area and free WiFi access. The comfortably designed rooms at Hotell Hörnan offer old-world charm and a work desk. Some include a private balcony with city views. All bathrooms are equipped with a shower and hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s stylish dining room. Drinks and light meals are available in the cosy Lobby Bar. The hotel is situated 50 metres from Kungsängsgatan, Uppsala’s main pedestrian street. Uppsala Cathedral is located 500 metres from the hotel.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Kung Oscar
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Kung Oscar in Trollhattan, SE near the Wheeler Opera House, Trollhattan Convention Center, shopping, transportation and dining. We are also near the SAAB Car Museum, Innovatum Science Center and the Elk and Royal Hunt Museum. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free WiFi, a restaurant and guest laundry facilities. All guest rooms have desks, electric kettles, hair dryers and bathrooms with showers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Parking at locked courtyard can be pre-booked.Choice Hotels

name: Best Western Hotel Baltic
description: The Best Western® Hotel Baltic is situated in a beautiful central location in Sundsvall, - close to the harbor, central station (600 meters), shopping, restaurants and the casino. Over the last few years the hotel has undergone careful renovation in keeping with its superb standards and comfort, and appeals to both business travelers and people on the lookout for somewhere special to stay when on holiday. The hotel has a total of 94 hotel rooms and four apartments, a restaurant and a modern hotel gym with a sauna/relax area. The conference facilities date back to the late 19th century. This beautiful room is 250 square meters in area, renovated in 2013 and enjoys views over the harbor. Now its primary function is as a source of inspiration at meetings, conferences, training courses and other get togethers. Welcome to the Best Western Hotel Baltic in Sundsvall.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Hotel Gillet
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Gillet in Uppsala, SE near Uppsala University, Fyris River, Uppsala Botanical Garden, Uppsala Cathedral and Old Uppsala. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, two restaurants, an exercise room and sauna, copy services, conference facilities and an indoor heated pool. All guest rooms have TVs, coffee makers, desks and hair dryers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Uppsala hotels like our Clarion Hotel Gillet. Pet charge, 250 kr per stay. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Grand Hotel Gävle
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 124 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including a health club and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a reception hall. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include limo/town car service, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Elite Grand Hotel Gävle places you in the heart of Gävle, within a 5-minute walk of Gavleborg County Museum and Old Town Gävle. This 4-star hotel is 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Stortorget and 0.6 mi (1 km) from Gavle Goat. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary local cuisine breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM. name: Slottshotellet i Kalmar
description: Situated among 18th and 19th century villas in a park setting, this charming hotel is 3 minutes’ walk from Kalmar Castle. Free WiFi is available. All individually decorated guest rooms at Slottshotellet have a TV, crystal chandelier and wooden floors. Many are decorated with antique furniture. Some have fireplaces or views of the inner courtyard. The Kalmar Art Museum is directly across the street from the hotel, while Kalmar Central Station is 500 metres away. Slottshotellet is only a 5-minute walk from the main shopping street.

name: Clarion Hotel Sense
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Sense in Lulea, SE near the COOP Arena, Kulturens Hus, World UNESCO Heritage Gammelstad and the Lulea Tekniska Universitetet. Amenities at our hotel include free breakfast, high-speed Internet and meeting space. All guest rooms have flat-screen TVs, desks, mini bars, pillow-top mattresses, hair dryers and irons and ironing boards. Some rooms feature robes. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues.Choice Hotels

name: Hoom Park & Hotel
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from Ulriksdal Station, this modern hotel is 10 minutes’ train ride from Stockholm Central Station. It offers free WiFi access and guest rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Friends Arena is 3 km away, while Kista Convention Center is 5 km from the property. The air-conditioned guest rooms at HOOM Park & Hotel feature wooden floors. Many include a seating area. The in-house à la carte restaurant serves Scandinavian cuisine with an international twist. The hotel bar is a nice place for an after-dinner drink. The E4 Highway is just 100 metres from the hotel. Arlanda Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Quality Hotel The Weaver
description: Welcome to our Quality Hotel The Weaver located in Molndal just south of Gothenburg. This magnificent hotel consists of 21 floors, 369 modern rooms, and a fully-equipped gym. Brasserie X, the hotel restaurant, serves a combination of classic french dishes influenced by international flavors. Our meeting and event facilities accommodating up to 600 guests are perfect for celebrating special moments, both big and small. Jumpstart your day with a free full breakfast each morning. We have a reception desk staffed 24 hours a day. A hotel safe is available, and you can stay connected with our free WiFi. Added amenities include a popcorn machine and a lounge/bar. As part of our digital guest experience, you can take advantage of mobile check-in and mobile keyless room entry.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Winn
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Winn in Gavle, SE near the University College of Gavle, Baltic Sea, Swedish Railway Museum, Mackmyra Whisky distillery and the Valbo Shopping Centre. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, free weekday newspapers, an indoor heated pool, meeting space and a business center with copy, print and fax services. All guest rooms have standard room amenities. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no extra bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Stora Hotellet, BW Premier Collection
description: Umea has a long history as a seafaring town. During the 1800s ship building and sea travel were big business and the seaman’s mission constructed an impressive building down by the river, a combination of mission house and hotel. When the Stora Hotellet opened in 1895 it was a place where those two worlds met. This was Umea’s major hotel for over a century and extensive refurbishment was carried out prior to the reopening to mark Umea being name European Capital of Culture 2014. The hotel stands once again in its seafaring finery, ready to welcome guests for another 100 years. The Stora Hotellet, BW Premier Collection has 82 unique rooms that run from spacious suites to compact cabins. There is also a restaurant, bar, library and conference rooms.bestwestern.com

name: Frösö Park Hotel
description: Located on the stunning island of Froson, the Hotel Froso Park, Ascend Hotel Collection, is surrounded by a golf course, as well as outdoor activities like running, cycling, hiking, skiing and snowmobiling. This pet-friendly hotel is also close to Ostersund and all the attractions you will want to check out on your trip, including Winter Park, Moose Garden and the Froso Zoo. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant and bar, a hot tub, meeting space, spa facilities, a dance floor, free breakfast, free weekday newspapers, free WiFi and an indoor and outdoor gym and fitness center, to name a few. Guest room amenities include desks and sofa sleepers. Ask about our suites and superior rooms. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Sundsvall
description: A top hotel in Sundsvall in a new part of the city, which is still very centrally located and also very close to the Selangers river. We are inspired by the Sundsvall stone town, and by the Medelpad landscape stone, the Alnoit and also by the contrast between the light and dark seasons. The hotel provides 270 rooms, restaurants, bars, rooftop terrace, spa and a large conference area.Choice Hotels

name: The Lamp Hotel Norrkoping
description: This boutique hotel is housed in a refurbished 18th-century building. Just 50 metres from Norrköping’s main street, Drottninggatan, it features and on-site spa, free WiFi internet access and garden in the summer time. The Lamp Hotel’s modern, guest rooms feature a comfortable seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar are also provided in each room. All bathrooms have underfloor heating and luxurious shower amenities from Babor. Housing Sweden’s largest floor lamp, The Lamp Restaurant serves Asian-Swedish Fusion dishes. In summer, meals can be taken out onto the garden. The Lamp Hotel & Spa is in the heart of central Norrköping. Norrköping Central Station is a 10-minute walk away from the hotel and the Louis De Geer Concert Hall & Congress Centre is 350 metres away. You will find shopping, restaurants and cafés just a few steps from the hotel.

name: Scandic Infra City
description: This modern hotel in Upplands Vasby offers free Wi-Fi, as well as a sauna and a swimming pool. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. After a day of sightseeing in the local area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature a flat-screen TV, blackout curtains and an in-room closet. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. A wide variety of cafés and restaurants are also found close by. Stockholm-Arlanda Airport is less than a 15-minute drive from Scandic Infra City. Kista is within an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Mölndals Bro
description: Located 200 meters from Mölndals Station, Hotel Mölndals Bro offers free Wi-Fi and rooms with cable TV. Amusement Park Liseberg and the Swedish Fair are a 5-minute tram ride away. A buffet breakfast is served daily and is served in the hotel's restaurant ROY, in the building next door. ROY is open 24 hours a day and also offers entertainment. As a hotel guest, you always have free entrance and a discount on live music events. Contact the hotel for room reservations and information about our gigs. The rooms at Mölndals Bro Hotel have a seating area, a minibar and a private bathroom with a shower or bathtub. The hotel also offers its guests free "Swedish fika". Mölndal's museum is 1 km away and Mölndal Galleria with around 70 shops is 200 meters from the property. Landvetter Airport is 18 minutes' drive from the hotel.

name: Park Hotel Linköpings Fawlty Towers
description: Set in a charming 1880s building, this hotel is directly opposite Linköping Central Station. Guests can enjoy free WiFi as well as free 24-hour, self-service tea/coffee in the lobby. Private parking is available at an extra cost. The individually decorated guest rooms at Park Hotel Linköping Fawlty Towers have triple-glazed windows and a flat-screen TV. All include a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast with a extensive selection of teas is served each morning. Guests can also enjoy free access to First Class Gym, directly across the street. SAAB Arena is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while the city square is about a 7-minute walk away. Staff will gladly recommend restaurants, stores and attractions, many just 7 minutes’ walk away.

name: Elite Hotel Knaust
description: Elite Hotel Knaust is located in a historic 19th century building in central Sundsvall, just 100 metres from Sundsvall Museum. It offers charming rooms with free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All the rooms at the elegant Hotel Knaust have a safety deposit box, work desk and minibar. Many rooms include a seating area and high ceilings with stucco works. Breakfast and lunch can be enjoyed in the stylish Spegelsalen Hall, which also serves as a venue for various events. The Bishops Arms Pub serves light meals and a wide selection of beer and whisky. The small relaxation area offers a selection of training equipment and a sauna free for guests’ use. The hotel is an attraction in itself, featuring a stylish marble staircase from 1890. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00. Stora Torget Square is situated 200 metres from the hotel. Centralen night club is a 3-minute walk away.

name: Profilhotels Savoy
description: This hotel is located in the heart of Jönköping, with the city right outside the doorstep and Lake Vättern 500 metres away. It offers a popular breakfast buffet, a relaxation area and modern rooms with free WiFi. The individually designed rooms of ProfilHotels Savoy include luxury beds, flat-screen TVs and large bathrooms with underfloor heating. In addition, dumbbells are provided in each room. Guests also have free access to a fitness room with sauna. Brasserie Sofiehof offers Swedish specialities as well as international dishes for lunch and dinner. After-work specials and other events are hosted throughout the year. Free tea and coffee is available in the lobby around the clock. Savoy Hotel’s central location offers easy access to culture, shopping and entertainment. The Match Museum is a 10-minute walk away, while Jönköping Central Station is about 5 minutes’ walk away. Elmia Congress Centre is within 10 minutes' drive.

name: Best Western Plus Savoy Lulea
description: Offering free spa and gym entrance and a modern restaurant and bar, this hotel is centrally located in Luleå, just 300 metres from Luleå Central Station. The spa includes 2 hot tubs, a steam sauna, a traditional sauna and an ice shower. Guests can also book treatments such as massages and facials. Each room features a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and seating area. The bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. The restaurant offers a varied á la carte menu based on local Swedish cuisine, open Monday to Saturday. A rich lunch buffet is also served on weekdays. The lobby café is open 24-hours and offers light dishes and beverages. On Saturdays, Hotel Savoy hosts a nightclub as well as live music on occasions. The hotel is 1.4 km from Coop Arena and 400 metres from the cultural centre Kulturens Hus. Kallax Airport is 9 km away.

name: Best Western Plus Aby Hotel
description: The Aby Arena is the only meetings and event venue in Scandinavia that combines a top modern trotting race course with an exhibition center, meetings, a hotel, a fitness center and a variety of dining opportunities. It is a dynamic destination for attendees seeking a truly unique experience. With 223 bedrooms, the Best Western Plus Aby Hotel forms an important part of the Aby Arena. In order to strengthen the ambiance of a venue that is full of action, expectations and joy, the interior design of the hotel has been inspired by an amusement park. Regardless of the purpose of your stay, we hope that our guests regard the Best Western Plus Aby Hotel as an arena full of action and exciting moments. The room types we offer include standard rooms, superior, deluxe, extended stay and economy. In addition to the normal sized double rooms we offer 72 rooms that can accommodate up to 5 guests. Restaurant Lyon is closed until further notice. We refer our guests to our own lobby bar in the hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Comfort Hotel Norrköping
description: Conveniently located downtown near the river Motala strom, the smoke-free Comfort Hotel Norrkoping is within walking distance of the Norrkoping Central Station and the city center. Additional nearby attractions include the Louis de Geer Congress Music Hall, Soderkoping Medieval City, Ingelsta Shopping Mall, Kolmarden Wildlife Park and Ingelsta Industrial Park. Enjoy hotel amenities like a hotel lounge, meeting space, free full breakfast, free WiFi and an exercise room, to name a few. The Comfort Hotel Norrkoping will get you rested and ready for anything on your trip to Sweden. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Ad Astra by Elite
description: Located in Södertälje, 220 meters from Tom Tits Experiment, Ad Astra by Elite provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Each room has a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and some have river views. The hotel has a spa with both indoor and outdoor pools, a private movie theater and activities on site like shuffleboard and pool game. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet with delicious ingredients catering to all sorts of preferences. Guests can enjoy drinks and pizza by the fountain on the Italian piazza during the summer time. Stockholmsmassan Exhibition & Congress Centre is 28 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bromma Stockholm Airport, 39 km from Ad Astra by Elite.

name: Quality Hotel Royal Corner
description: The non-smoking Quality Hotel Royal Corner offers real value for your hard-earned money in the heart of Vaxjo, Sweden near the Vaxjo City Centre, shops, nightlife and attractions like Grand Samarkand shopping mall, the house of Emmigrants, Vaxjo Cathedral, Kingdom of Crystal and Little Rock Lake Zipline. Hold your next work or social event in in one of our 11 meeting rooms, grab breakfast in our La Castellina restaurant and enjoy amenities like free WiFi, free parking, an indoor heated pool, sauna and fitness center. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel Grand Boras
description: Situated along the Viskan River in the heart of Boras, the pet-friendly Quality Hotel Grand is only a five minute walk from the Boras Central Station and gives you real value for your hard-earned money. Additional attractions near our smoke-free hotel include the Stadsparksbadet Water Park, Caroli Church, Textile Museum of Boras, Boras Zoo and the Boras Arena. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant, a club, free full breakfast, a spa and wellness center, free WiFi, free coffee and meeting space, to name a few. All of our rooms have views of the Boras Centre or City Park. Book a guest room today.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund in Ostersund, SE near Mid Sweden University, Storsjon Lake, the Jamtli museum, Froso Zoo and Froso Kyrka. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast buffet, wireless Internet access, a restaurant, an indoor heated pool and meeting and convention facilities. All guest rooms have trouser presses, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards and desks. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Ostersund hotels like our Clarion Hotel Grand Ostersund. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Livin Station Hotel
description: Livin Station Hotel is situated right by Örebro Central Station. Örebro University Hospital is 800 metres from the property. Each room has a flat-screen TV. Certain units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. The rooms come with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. You will find a gift shop at the property. Conventum.is 1.4 km from Livin Station Hotel, while Örebro Castle is 750 metres away.

name: Bauergården
description: Located next to Bunn Lake in Gränna, 10 km from Grenna Museum, Bauergården features a common terrace where you can enjoy views of the garden. A communal sauna offers relaxation. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some room have outdoor seating. The restaurant menu offers Nordic-style dishes. A range of activities is offered in the area, such as fishing and canoeing, or you can simply find a spot on the lake beach. The nearest airport is Linköping City Airport, 86 km from the property.

name: Piteå Stadshotell
description: This historic hotel is located in central Piteå, only 5 minutes’ walk from the bus station. It offers a restaurant and on-site gym. WiFi is free in all rooms. Piteå Stadshotell was built in 1906. The individually decorated guest rooms have modern tiled bathrooms and flat-screen TVs. Some rooms have a bath. Restaurant Fiore serves Italian cuisine in a light and airy venue. Free tea, coffee and cakes are available at all times in the lobby. From Monday to Friday, a lunch offer with prices starting from SEK 115 is available. The hotel bar regularly hosts music and entertainment. Hotel guests mostly enjoy free entry. Activities such as wine or chocolate tasting can also be arranged. Within easy walking distance of Piteå Stadshotell are attractions such as the Rådhustorget square, Piteå Museum and 2 shopping centres. The hotel offers private parking at en extra surcharge including access to power outlets. Piteå Golf Club is 3 km away.

name: Clarion Hotel Örebro
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Orebro in Orebro, SE near Orebro Castle, Wadkoping village, Gustavsvik water park, Karlslund Manor House, Orebro University and the Orebro Airport. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, a restaurant, an exercise room, sundeck, a business center and meeting facilities. All guest rooms include work desks, hair dryers, irons and ironing boards. Some rooms also have coffee makers and refrigerators. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Orebro hotels like our Clarion Hotel Orebro. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing a room with parentsgrandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet charge 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: U&Me, BW Signature Collection
description: The U&Me, BW Signature Collection is an innovative hotel located in the very center of Umea. Create your own stay by deciding whether you are in a compact or spacious mood. Spice up your stay with affordable add values or luxury experiences in the immediate vicinity of your hotel room. Our 162 rooms are located on floors 6 thru 13 of the newly built Vaven Complex. We offer room sizes from small, medium, large to extra-large. All rooms face towards a panoramic window, ensuring that you will always wake up with a view of the city or the river. Upon arrival you will be greeted by something totally different to a traditional hotel desk. You will meet our continental indoor square within Umea’s cultural hub Vaven, including the city library, bakery, cafes, deli, restaurants and a flower shop. An unconventional lobby and multi choice hotel restaurant all rolled into one. The check in and check out is quick and easy at our digital check in counters (similar to ones used in airports). As you enter the indoor square you will find the counters next to the elevators, which after check in, takes you to your room. If you need assistance, staff can always be available a phone call away by using the hotel phone by the check in counter.bestwestern.com

name: Profilhotels President
description: ProfilHotels President is 300 metres from Norrköping Central Station. It offers a sauna and free Wi-Fi. The Cactus Park is 200 metres away. All rooms at President Hotel include a work desk, tea/coffee facilities and comfortable Carpe Diem beds. President's lobby bar is a pleasant setting for a relaxing drink. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Relaxation options include a sauna. Drottninggatan shopping street is 5 minutes’ walk away. The Museum of Work is an 8-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection
description: Welcome to the home of Gio! April 1st 2020, Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection opens the doors to a meeting place for the ones who wants to live, eat, socialize and work in a warm and undemanding environment. At Gios, you can stay for a short while, or for a longer visit, eat relly good food at Mama Gios, have a drink at the terrace or work in the living room. At Gios you will come home to a grand family. In the large living room there are possibilities to work or socialize with friends. That is why we call Gio "the social hub hotel". Here you will also find Mama Gio, a restaurant that focuses on straight forward hospitailty and simple, well cooked food that tastes really, really good. Gios rooms has an ambience of Italy in the 50's, both the standard double rooms and the slightly larger longstay rooms for those who wants to stay a little longer, or comes back time and again. There are also family rooms that comfortably houses the whole family when needed. Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection is located right next to the park of Haga, where parts of the royal family resides, and within walking distance you will fiend Friends arena, Mall of Scandinavia and the Karolinska hospital. Right outside the hotel, the buses to Stockholm centre and Arlanda airport has a stop. The center of Stockholm is reached within 12 minutes, and Arlanda airport within 40 minutes. In the living room there is room to work or just to relax, or why not mingle with your colleagues? We can arrange mingle or events for up to 150 people, but we also have meeting rooms if you need a smaller space. After 60 years of office workers walking the stairs, through the doors and looking at the artwork, we now open the doors for the guests of Hotel Gio, BW Signature Collection.bestwestern.com

name: Mojo Hotell
description: Set in Örebro and within 300 metres of Örebro Castle, Mojo Hotell features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a business centre and luggage storage space. Guests can enjoy city views. At the hotel, every room includes a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. At Mojo Hotell you will find a restaurant serving international cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Conventum, Örebro Train Station and Örebro County Museum. The nearest airport is Orebro Airport, 13 km from Mojo Hotell.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Plaza
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Hotel Collection Plaza in Karlstad, SE near Lake Vanern, the Karlstad Conference Center, Karlstad University and the Karlstad Airport. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free full breakfast, a restaurant, a fitness room, a sauna, a hot tub and copy and fax services. All guest rooms are air conditioned and come equipped with refrigerators, hair dryers, free wireless Internet and flat-screen TVs. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Karlstad hotels like our Clarion Collection Hotel Plaza. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Phone charge of 1 SEK per minute. Pet charge 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Mårtenson
description: Time-honored Hotel Martenson is extensively renovated and reopened to guests in a completely new shape. The hotel is once again a full-service hotel with a great offer within foods and drinks and with an amazing roof top bar. Hotel Martenson is the hot spot in Halmstad whether you are meeting up old friends for a drink, making new acquaintances, celebrating life or simply just longing for a great night sleep. It is a well composed hotel where the 1920s meets the 2020s with a strong and attractive offer to the audience including a gym, co-working area and a top notch service.Choice Hotels

name: Best Western Hedasen
description: Welcome to the friendly Best Western Hedasen, located by the Sandviken Golf Course, 300 meters from Lake Storsjon and three kilometers from central Sandviken. All rooms have a work desk, an electric kettle and a television with DVD player. DVD films can be borrowed for free at the front desk. The hotel offers and indoor pool, sauna, free parking and free Wi-Fi. Central Sandviken is only 3 kilometers from the hotel.bestwestern.com

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Bolinder Munktell
description: The Clarion Collection Htl Bolinder Munktell is ideally located on Lake Malaren, within walking distance of the Munktells Museum. We are also minutes from Malardalen University, Tingsgarden Glasbruk garden, Eskilstuna Art Museum and the Parken Zoo. Enjoy hotel amenities like free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, free wireless Internet, a sauna, afternoon tea, meeting space, guest laundry facilities and coffee, tea and fruit 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms have cable TVs. Irons and ironing boards are available upon request. Book a room with us today.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel The Box
description: Get more for your hard-earned money at our hotel in Linkoping, SE. You will love our convenient location, friendly service and more. Amenities include free WiFi, free hot breakfast, meeting space, a fitness center and a restaurant and bar. Guest rooms feature refrigerators and microwaves, premium bedding, work desks, flat-screen TVs and coffee makers. Our hotel in Linkoping is near the Linkoping Arena, Saab Arena, Max Burgers, Rico Restaurant and BK Living Room Restaurant. At our pet-friendly Quality Hotel, our affordable rates and central location lets you focus on making your trip a memorable one. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with Our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: First Hotel Statt Karlskrona
description: Enjoy free breakfast and WiFi at this elegant hotel, which is situated in the heart of Karlskrona. First Hotel Statt offers a combination of comfortable, modern accommodation and turn-of-the-century charm. Most guest rooms at Hotel Statt feature individually designed décor. Guests enjoy free wireless internet access throughout the building. Statt’s location right on the central pedestrian street gives easy access to everything Karlskrona has to offer. There are plenty of shops, bars and restaurants nearby. Within easy walking distance are attractions such as Saint Frederick’s Church (Fredrikskyrkan), which is a UNESCO world heritage site.

name: Comfort Hotel Arctic
description: Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, the Comfort Hotel Arctic is a modern hotel located in the center of Lulea, 50 metres from the train station. Here you stay in quiet surroundings, but with everything Lulea has to offer right on your doorstep. We offer a relaxation area with a sauna on our sixth floor, as well as amenities like free WiFi and free full breakfast. Earn rewards with every stay with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Grand
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Grand Sundsvall near the Galleri Versalen, Bergsaker horse racing track, Adventure Park theme park, Sundsvall Park Arena football and entertainment facility and the Casino Cosmopol Sundsvall. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a health club, a restaurant and more. All guest rooms have mini bars, desks, hair dryers and TVs. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Sundsvall hotels like our Clarion Collection Hotel Grand Sundsvall. Front desk available: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Indoor parking SEK 120 per day booked in advance. Subject to change. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Björkbackens Karaktärshotell
description: Just 3 km from Astrid Lindgren World Theme Park, Björkbackens Karaktärshotell offers free parking and rooms with free wired internet. Vimmerby Station is 1.5 km away. A summer water park is also found on site that guests can enjoy for an additional fee. All rooms have a TV, heated bathroom floors and soft, Swedish-made beds. Some rooms are named after historical characters from around Vimmerby. A sauna can be found on site. Children will enjoy the 12-hole minigolf course and playground. BBQ facilities are available in the garden. The large restaurant at Björkbackens serves lunch and is decorated in a charming, typically Smålandian style. Evening meals can be enjoyed in the lobby restaurant.

name: Comfort Hotel Arlanda Airport Terminal
description: A new hotel opened Feb 2020 with 503 rooms, a large lobby with working stations, 24/7 bar/reception with lunch and dinner service, a modern gym, laundromat and 4 meeting rooms up to 24 persons. The top floor bar, Anorak has great views over the airport. The hotel is located next to SkyCity and 5 minute walking distance from terminal 4, 5 and the Arlanda Express train station. Indoor parking is available on site.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Stadshotellet Eskilstuna
description: This riverside hotel is 500 metres from Eskilstuna Central Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, gym and sauna access. All rooms feature flat-screen TVs and minibars. Work desks and wardrobes are standard at Elite Stadshotellet Eskilstuna. Each room has bright, modern décor. Some include a sofa while some have wooden floors. The British-style Bishop’s Arms bar offers numerous whiskies and craft beers, plus classic pub dishes. The hotel restaurant offers an international à la carte menu. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 11:00. Elite Eskilstuna is 3 minutes’ walk from shopping, cafés and a cinema. Eskilstuna Art Museum is 1 km away.

name: Hotell Arkad
description: This eco-friendly hotel is a few minutes’ walk from Västerås’s main streets, Vasagatan and Stora Gatan. It offers free Wi-Fi, a free relaxation area with sauna and individually decorated guest rooms. Wooden floors, a TV and a desk are standard room features at Hotell Arkad. Some rooms also include a seating area. Guests can relax with a game of dart or billiards. Other facilities include a common room with TV and a small library. The hotel serves a daily breakfast buffet. In the evenings, guests can order wine, beer and light dishes at reception. Västerås Central Station and Aros Congress Center are within 5 minutes’ walk of Arkad Hotell.

name: Quality Hotel Park Södertälje City
address: Saltsjotorget PO Box 130, Södertälje, Stockholms Lan
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Park Sodertalje City in Sodertalje, SE near Lake Malaren, Torekallbergets Museum, Open Air Museum and the Tom Tits Experiment. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like breakfast, wireless Internet access, meeting space, a restaurant and an exercise room. Guest rooms come with refrigerators and coffee makers. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Park Sodertalje City. Book now. Pet accommodations and breakfast are both available for a small fee, please contact the hotel for more information. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Orsa Järnvägshotell
description: Orsa Järnvägshotell in the centre of Orsa provides accommodation with a luxurious touch for both leisure and business travellers. Built in 1894, the 19th century atmosphere is preserved in the interior design with all modern necessities added. All rooms feature an espresso machine, flatscreen-TV and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk and/or seating area, private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast, weekend brunch and a meal at the on-site restaurant. The accommodation also features a bar and a terrace where guests can relax with a drink. Skiing and fishing are among the activities that guests can enjoy near Orsa Järnvägshotell. Bicycling is also popular in the area, and the property provides both ski and bicycle storage. Grönklitt Ski Centre is 16 km from the property. The bus stop for the ski centre is just across the street from the hotel.

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Vilsta Sporthotell
description: A popular and value living hotel, the Sure Hotel by Best Western Vilsta Sporthotell is located just outside of Eskilstuna Centrum with the Vilsta Nature Reserve just around the corner. The environment is friendly for children and families. The hotel has free parking and a charging station for electric vehicles. Free Wi-Fi and breakfast is served every day from 6:30 a.m. In the Nature Reserve is Eskilstuna’s biggest area for motion and recreation with trails for jogging and cycling. Sormlandsleden nature area includes bath areas, ski trails, ski slope, football area and much more. You can rent bikes, skis and canoes. The hotel has a relaxing area with a sauna and spa pool, a sport hall with a gym. The Conference Center is available for up to 150 persons. The Congress seating in the Sport Hall is available for up to 800 persons. The Restaurant and Sport pub serves food and drinks. Our hotel is a good place for events, kick-offs, training camps, shows and much more.bestwestern.com

name: Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel Stockholm
address: Between Terminal 4 And 5, Box 82, 190 45 Arlanda, Stockholms Lan
description: Conveniently located with direct access to Stockholm-Arlanda Airport, Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel offers modern 4-star accommodation complete with free Wi-Fi. It is surrounded by a range of popular eateries and is within a five-minute walk of Arlanda North Station. This stylish hotel offers meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, a laundry service and a wake-up service are available on enquiry. Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel offers 260 air conditioned rooms filled with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Hot drinks can be made with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's seating area. Guests of Radisson Blu Airport Terminal Hotel can relax at the on-site bar, suitably based for socialising in the evening. Lunch and dinner are served daily at Horizon. The hotel is well-connected to the rest of the area, with Arlanda Central Station within a minute's walk. Solna and Marsta are also a short car ride away.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Jazz
description: The Comfort Hotel Jazz is located in Boras, known as the city of tradesmen. The hotel is located near the Big Square, the shopping district of the city. Other points of interest near this hotel include the University College of Boras, Boras Zoo, Stadsparksbadet, Boras Golfklubb and the Boras Art Museum. Enjoy hotel amenities like free full breakfast, wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant with a bar, a sauna, parking, to name a few. Guest rooms come with cable TVs, hair dryers, desks. Be sure to make the Comfort Hotel Jazz your home base when visiting this exciting city. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Comfort Hotel Västerås
description: Get rested and ready for anything at the non-smoking Comfort Hotel Vasteras near Kokpunkten water park. We are a two-minute walk from the central station. We are about 5-10 minutes from shopping, dining and the local marina. Nearby attractions include Gallerian Shopping Mall, Stomsholms Castle, Vasteras Cathedral, Engso Castle and Kungsbyns Zoo. Amenities include free full breakfast, free WiFi, an exercise room and guest laundry facilities. Some rooms feature sofa sleepers.Choice Hotels

name: Vadstena Klosterhotell Konferens & Spa
description: Housed in a former monastery from the Middle Ages, this historic hotel is located on Lake Vättern in quaint Vadstena. Guests can relax with in the peaceful settings or at the on-site spa. It features free WiFi and an on-site restaurant. Vadstena Klosterhotell’s classically decorated guest rooms feature cable TV and a separate seating area. Some are located in the monastery building, while others are in a grand 19th-century building. The spa can be accessed for a surcharge and includes hot baths, a sauna, a steam bath and a variety of spa and massage treatments. Guests can also enjoy an outdoor hot tub, a cafe/bar, a relaxation room and a gym. Guests can rent bicycles to explore the neighbouring Vadstena Castle and the town’s idyllic main street. Vadstena Golf Club is 10 minutes’ drive away. Motala Train Station, 17 km away, is the closest stop to the hotel.

name: Scandic Strömmen
description: This hotel is just around the corner from Norrköping Central Station and 10 minutes’ drive from Norrköping Airport. It offers a rooftop hot tub, free guest bicycles and free WiFi internet. Scandic Strömmen’s rooms feature colourful, modern décor and wooden floors. Each has a flat-screen TV. The on-site restaurant serves wholesome Swedish cuisine, and a children’s menu is offered. The hotel also cooperates with the neighbouring Renströmmen Conference Centre. Leisure options include a sauna and a hot tub that offers city views. More active guests can use the hotel gym. The lobby features a communal table, perfect for working guests. The small on-site shop sells snacks, drinks and toiletries.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Bergmastaren
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Bergmastaren in Falun, SE near the Great Copper Mine, the Dalarnas Museum, the home of Carl Larsson in Sundborn, Dalhalla amphitheater, and Lake Runn. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a full organic breakfast and light evening buffet, wireless high-speed Internet access, a sauna and hot tub, free afternoon tea and more. All guest rooms have TVs and hair dryers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Falun hotels like our Clarion Collection Hotel Bergmastaren. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no extra bedding is required. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Landvetter
description: Set in Landvetter, 19 km from Vattenpalatset, Scandic Landvetter offers air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Offering a restaurant, the property also has free bikes, as well as a fitness centre and a sauna. The hotel has a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Scandic Landvetter also have free WiFi. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. You can play table tennis at Scandic Landvetter. Liseberg is 24 km from the hotel, while Swedish Exhibition & Congress Centre is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gothenburg Landvetter Airport, a few steps from Scandic Landvetter.

name: Hotell Nova
description: Set in Karlstad, 3.1 km from Karlstad Central Station, Hotell Nova offers accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The property is allergy-free and is located 6.1 km from Löfbergs Lila Arena. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units feature a wardrobe. Hotell Nova offers a halal or gluten-free breakfast. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Karlstad, like skiing. Karlstad Golf Course is 12 km from Hotell Nova, while University in Karlstad is 8.8 km away. The nearest airport is Karlstad Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Åtellet Hotell
description: The Åtellet Hotell re-opened in April 2009. It is located at the mouth of the Norrtälje River, with the archipelago and sea at walking distance. Stockholm city centre is at a convenient distance by bus. The hotel is built in 19th century style, with top modern facilities. The idea was to recreate the character of Norrtälje and the atmosphere of that time. Åtellet offers restaurant, café and bar services, a sauna, lounges and conference facilities. The guest rooms have an atmosphere inspired by the archipelago. Most rooms have balconies or French balconies and offer wonderful views of the Norrtälje Bay. The interiors are inspired by timeless Nordic style with emphasis on comfort and convenience. The furniture has been custom made for Åtellet by a small carpentry in Småland.

name: Granen Hotell & Restaurang
description: Neighbouring Åre’s ski slopes, this lodge-style hotel is just 250 metres from Åre Train Station. It features a cosy fireplace lounge, free Wi-Fi and a restaurant serving traditional Swedish cuisine. Quality Dux beds and a LCD TV are provided in each tastefully decorated room at Hotell Granen, as well as a bathroom with a shower. Breakfast is offered daily. After a long day, guests can relax in the hotel’s sauna or in the warm and inviting fireplace library. Ski school classes are arranged on site, along with ski storage facilities. Free private parking is also possible.

name: Best Western Vimmerby Stadshotell
description: In the center of town on Stora Torget in Vimmerby is the Best Western Vimmerby Stadshotell, the town's oldest hotel which dates back to the 1860s. Here the guests are greeted by a kind face where they can also enjoy the comforts of home so typical of Smaland. Free parking and a wide selection of free TV channels goes without saying, ensuring that our guests enjoy their stay. If you wish to have dinner in our restaurant, please book a table in advance.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Amalias Hus
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 19 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Amalias Hus, you'll be centrally located in Granna, just a 2-minute walk from Granna Church and 5 minutes by foot from Grenna Museum. This 4-star hotel is 20.3 mi (32.7 km) from Elmia Exhibition Center and 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Vättern. Dining Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar/lounge and a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Self parking fee: SEK 100 per night Pet fee: SEK 200 per accommodation, per night Service animals are exempt from fees Crib (infant bed) fee: SEK 150 per night Rollaway bed fee: SEK 350 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 20 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, a first aid kit, and window guards If you are planning to arrive after 6:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property in advance for check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.
