Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions No elevators Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Individually-wrapped food options are available for dinner Individually-wrapped food options are available through room service Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measuresViajes Exito Hotels

name: Värdshuset Glada Hudik
description: This family-owned hotel is located just off the E4 Motorway, 2 km from Hudiksvall town centre. It provides free WiFi and an in-house restaurant with a bar. A petrol station with a store is also on site. Modern furnishings, a flat-screen TV and desk are offered in each room at Värdshuset Glada Hudik, as well as a private bathroom with a shower. A daily breakfast buffet is offered. Free private parking is possible on site. Cross-country ski tracks are within 300 metres of Värdshuset Glada Hudik. Other area activities include sledging and alpine skiing at Hedebacken, 500 metres away. The large, indoor playground Buspalatset is a 5-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Quality Hotel Ekoxen
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Ekoxen in Linkoping, SE near the Linkoping University, Kinda Kanal, Linkoping-Saab Airport, Ostergotlands Lansmuseum museum and the Swedish Air Force Museum. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless Internet, an exercise room, an indoor pool and sauna, meeting space and more. Guest rooms come with safes, computer hook-ups and trouser presses. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Ekoxen. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Place Lund
description: Situated in Lund, 1.4 km from University of Lund, Place Lund features accommodation with free bikes, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel offers some units with city views, and the rooms are fitted with a private bathroom. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Place Lund offers a children's playground. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Lund, like cycling. Triangeln Shopping Centre is 23 km from Place Lund, while Malmo Arena is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malmo Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: La Hotel
description: Located on the island of Lidingö, this property is a 20 minutes' ride with public transportation from central Stockholm. Free WiFi is provided. Street parking is free and garage parking is provided for a fee. Millesgården Art Museum is a 10 minutes' walk from the hotel. Shared facilities at LA Hotel include a washing machine, iron equipment and a communal kitchen. Some rooms have a private kitchenette. All rooms have private bathrooms (some next to the room) and a TV. Guests also have access to a gym in the same building. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet that is served daily in the breakfast room. Free coffee, tea and hot chocolate are available for guests at all times. Bicycles are available for rent 100 metres away, while car rental is 50 metres from the property. Värtahamnen and Frihamnen harbours are both about 3 km from the hotel. Arlanda Airport is 34 km away. The area of the property provides a ski lift, golf courses and beaches.

name: Comfort Hotel Umea City
description: Comfort Hotel Umea City is located in the center of Umea. Next to the river of Umea and the shopping area is just a minute away. The hotel has 131 rooms, a lobby bar and free wifi and breakfast is always included in the room price. We are a cashfree hotel.Choice Hotels

name: Annas Hotell
description: Housed in a refurbished 19th-century building, within 5 minutes’ drive of central Kristianstad, this hotel offers free WiFi and parking. All rooms have luxury beds and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Annas Hotell’s guest rooms feature wooden floors and private bathrooms with showers and fog-free mirrors. Each also includes a seating area and tea/coffee-making facilities. The hotel restaurant serves Swedish and international cuisine. Guests can relax in Annas Hotell’s garden. Laundry facilities are available, and bicycles can be rented on site. Local buses stop right next to Annas Hotell, and the ride to Central Station takes about 5 minutes. Kristianstad University College is less than a 10-minute walk away. Kristianstad Airport is 18 km away.

name: Hotel Göingehof
description: Situated 300 metres from Hässleholm Central Station, this family-run hotel offers free Wi-Fi, free sauna access and an in-house pub. Hässleholm’s Culture House, with its theatre and restaurants, is 100 metres away. Wooden furnishings and warm colours decorate each guest room at Hotel Göingehof. All of the soundproofed rooms include a work desk and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Light meals and drinks are available for dinner at Göingehof’s bar. The daily breakfast buffet offers a nice selection of fresh choices. Wanås Castle, 20 km away, displays both indoor and outdoor art exhibitions. Guests arriving by car can enjoy free private parking at the hotel.

name: Comfort Hotel Eskilstuna
description: The Comfort Hotel Eskilstuna is conveniently located near many popular attractions and local points of interest, including the Faktori Museum, Malardalen University and the Parken Zoo, one of the most popular zoos and amusement parks in Sweden. The third-largest lake in Sweden, Lake Malaren, is located just minutes from this hotel. Enjoy hotel amenities like free full breakfast, an exercise room and copy, print and fax machines, to name a few. All tastefully-decorated guest rooms come with TVs and hair dryers. We look forward to having you as our guest. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Karlstad City
description: This eco-friendly hotel is 200 metres from Stora Torget square and 5 minutes’ walk from Karlstad Central Station. It offers free access to a relaxation area with gym, sauna and hot tub. Air conditioning, TV and private bathrooms are standard at Scandic Karlstad City. Dinner and cocktails can be enjoyed in the hotel's restaurant and lounges. Snacks, drinks and toiletries are available in Scandic’s lobby shop. Bicycles and Nordic walking poles can be borrowed for free on site. All children staying at the hotel receive a welcome present.

name: Best Western Hotel City Gavle
description: The Best Western Hotel City Gavle is a charming and newly renovated hotel in the best downtown location. The hotel is located next to the shopping mall Galleria Nian and the main square and has 92 clean rooms that are pet and smoke free. All rooms have cable television, Internet access, shower and toilet. Directly connected to the hotel you can find the shopping streets Drottninggatan, Nygatan and the main square, with dozens of restaurants, bars and cinemas. Nearby are also the Gavle Concert Hall, Adventure Bath, Gavle Museum, city library, Prison Museum, County Hospital, Gavle High School and the famous city park Bolougnerskogen. There are 700 parking spaces in the house next door, Galleria Nian and the railway station is located about 800 meters, and approximately nine minutes walk from the hotel. In the area around Gavle you can find the animal and amusement park called Furuviksparken, the Mackmyra Whisky Distillery, the Swedish Railway Museum, Kungsberget downhill skiing, four golf courses, Dalalven salmon fishing, and a lovely coastline at the Baltic Sea. Our nearest international airport is Arlanda which is the largest airport in Sweden, and from Arlanda to Gavle it takes around 60 minutes by train.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Bishops Arms Kristianstad
description: This traditional hotel is centrally located opposite Kristianstad Central Station. It offers a traditional British pub, free private parking and rooms with flat-screen TVs and free WiFI, as well as British-inspired furnishing. All rooms at Hotel Bishops Arms Kristianstad feature wooden flooring, Persian carpets and large windows overlooking Kristianstad city centre. The Bishops Arms pub offers an à la carte menu as well as a wide range of draught beers and ales. After dinner, guests can relax in front of the open fireplace in the charming library. Hotel Bishops Arms Kristianstad offers easy access to culture, shopping and entertainment. The City Park of Tivoliparken, is an 8-minute walk. The Absolut Vodka "Absolut Home Experience" is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Quality Hotel Galaxen
address: Jussi Björlings Väg 25, 784 32 Borlänge, Dalarnas Lan
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Galaxen in Borlange, SE near the Kupolen area, Kupolen Kopcentrum, Hogskolan Dalarna University and the nearby Jussi Bjorling Museum. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, a sauna, a hot tub, a convention center and copy, print and fax services. Guest rooms come with TVs and hair dryers. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Galaxen. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Profilhotels Calmar Stadshotell
description: The hotel is situated on the main square in Stortorget, in the very centre of Kalmar, whith the whole of Kalmar on its doorstep as well as a real piece of medieval history. The shopping and business districts are also located in the immediate vicinity. The train station is within walking distance and the airport bus stops just outside the hotel. Kalmar's main atrractions are just a few minutes away: Kalmar Castle, Ölands Zoo, Kingdom Of Crystal, several beaches and several golf courses. Vaxjo is an hour away by car. Facilities The hotel features 126 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. The upper floors can be reached by lift. Amenities include a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a breakfast room, a bar and a pub. A library is also among the amenities at the hotel. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Other services include a laundry. Rooms Special family rooms are available for families with children. All rooms feature central heating and a bathroom. The carpeted accommodation units feature a double bed or a king-size bed. A desk is also available. Additional features, including internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio and wireless internet access, contribute to a great stay. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a bathtub. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers a selection of sport and leisure opportunities. Leisure options available to guests include a sauna. Meals Various meals and board options are bookable. Guests can choose from breakfast, lunch, dinner and half board. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Motel L Lund
description: Motel L Lund has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Lund. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.3 km from University of Lund. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. At Motel L Lund rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Languages spoken at the reception include Danish, German, English and Swedish, and guests are invited to request advice on the area when needed. Triangeln Shopping Centre is 21 km from Motel L Lund, while Malmo Arena is 29 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malmo Airport, 30 km from the hotel.

name: Billingehus
description: For over fifty years, the iconic hotel has balanced like a monument on Billingen's escarpment. Equal parts of course as the special. Check in with family, love, friends, the training group or why not by yourself, for some well-deserved alone time? Billingehus is the hotel for those looking for warm and welcoming accommodation in Skvde, with closeness to nature and a nice mix of experiences both inside and out.iHotelier/iStay

name: Quality Hotel Statt
description: The pet-friendly Quality Hotel Statt in Hudiksvall, Sweden puts guests close to golfing, shopping at Guldsmeden and Fyren and the beach. Amenities at our smoke-free hotel include a meeting space, a hotel restaurant and bar, free breakfast, free WiFi, free parking, an indoor pool and a fitness center. Get your money's worth at the Quality Hotel Statt. Hotels in Hudiksvall offer comfortable rooms with the amenities you have come to expect. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Hotel Entré Norr
description: Offering a barbecue and views of the garden, Hotell Entré Norr is set in Umeå, 5 km from Umeå universitet. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free parking is available. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. You will find a kettle in the room. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy an evening buffet, for an additional cost which is served Monday until Sunday. The dinner must be booked in advance via the hotel. Free use of bicycles is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. Aula Nordica is 6 km from Hotell Entré Norr, while Norrlands Opera House is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Umea Airport, 9 km from Hotell Entré Norr.

name: Quality Hotel Sundsvall
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our smoke-free Quality Hotel Sundsvall in Sundsvall, Sweden near the Norrporten Arena, Birsta Shopping Mall and Mid Sweden University, as well as outdoor activities including ice skating, golfing, fishing, skiing and cycling. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, meeting space, a sauna, an exercise room and a business center. Guest rooms come with flat-screen TVs, mini bars and irons and ironing boards. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Sundsvall. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Elite Stadshotellet Luleå
description: Overlooking Stadsparken and the North Harbour, this hotel is situated on Luleå’s main street, Storgatan. It offers free WiFi and gym access and a popular breakfast buffet. All rooms at Elite Stadshotellet Luleå are individually decorated and include a minibar, a work desk and a flat-screen TV. The bathrooms feature Italian marble. A wide selection of different whiskies and beers are available at the English-style Bishop Arms Pub. In addition to free gym entrance, guests are welcome to take part in group classes at discounted rates. Other facilities include rental bicycles. On Sundays, guests can enjoy breakfast until 12:00. Elite Stadshotellet Luleå provides easy access to local transport, with only 100 metres to the nearest bus stop. Luleå Central Station is less than 15 minutes’ walk away. The airport shuttle also stops 300 metres from the hotel.

name: Good Morning Jönköping
description: Located off the road E4, this hotel is 5 minutes’ drive from both central Jonköping and the Elmia Congress Centre. Free parking and a 24-hour snack menu are featured. Private bathrooms, flat-screen TVs and simple décor are standard features in all rooms at Good Morning Jönköping. The bistro serves light dishes such as pasta, soup and toasted sandwiches. Live sports and other events are shown on the bar's wide-screen TV. Breakfast is served from 06:00. Good Morning Jonköping is 2.5 km from the Match Museum and Jönköping Central Station. Jönköping Kämpevägen Bus Stop is 200 metres away.

name: Halltorps Gästgiveri
description: Set in a traditional manor house on Öland island, this hotel offers free Wi-Fi and parking, plus Kalmar Strait views. Locally produced meat, fish and vegetables are used in the restaurant. All the individually decorated rooms at Halltorps Gästgiveri have a TV and a private bathroom with shower. Most overlook the large garden. Croquet and boules can be played outside. The terrace is a pleasant setting for relaxation. Halltorps Gästgiveri Hotel is 2 km from Ekerum Golf Club. Borgholm Castle is a 20-minute drive away.

name: ArenaHotellet i Uppsala
description: Located 1.4 km from Gränbystaden shopping centre, ArenaHotellet i Uppsala features a restaurant, bar and views of the city. Free private parking is available on site subject to availability. The city centre is 4 km away. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units have a seating area where you can relax. You will find a 24-hour front desk and children's playground at the hotel. Children can also enjoy the Playstation and Xbox consoles in the game room. Linneaus museum and garden are 4.5 km from ArenaHotellet i Uppsala, while Uppsala Konsert & Kongress is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Arlanda Airport, 40 km from the property.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Fregatten
description: The Clarion Collection Hotel Fregatten is ideally located within walking distance of the Varbergs Fortress historic site, Lansmuseet Varberg museum, Fun City theme park and the Getterons Naturcentrum, offering a wildlife exhibition and a number of services. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant, a hotel lounge, free organic breakfast, a light evening buffet, an exercise room, a hot tub, a sauna, massage therapist and coffee, tea and fruit available 24 hours a day, to name a few. Guest rooms have cable TVs. We are the perfect hotel for business and leisure travelers.Choice Hotels

name: Teleborgs Slott
description: No description found

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Cardinal
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Cardinal in Vaxjo, SE near the Kronoberg Castle Ruin, Swedish Glass Museum and Vaxjo University. Amenities at our hotel include free breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet, a restaurant, an exercise room, a sauna, meeting space and copy services. All guest rooms have TVs, desks and hair dryers. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties.Choice Hotels

name: Brunsbo G:a Biskopsgård Hotell & Konferens
description: This 16th-century manor features a spacious garden and a restaurant focusing on seasonal, local produce. Guest rooms and self-catering apartments are offered here. WiFi and parking are free. Skara town centre, Skara Sommarland and Axevalla Racecourse are within 10 minutes’ drive. Traditional décor and garden views are standard in Brunsbo G:a Biskopsgård Hotell & Konferens’s rooms. Guests can choose between rooms with private or shared bathrooms. The apartment option has a private patio and fully equipped kitchen. All units have free toiletries and a TV. Set in a heritage-listed building, Kungsgården Restaurant provides classic Swedish cuisine made from fresh, locally sourced ingredients. At Brunsbo G:a Biskopsgård Hotell & Konferens, guests can relax in the lounge, on the terrace or use the BBQ facilities. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking.

name: Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar
description: Dramatically set where the Hallandsåsen Ridge meets the Kattegatt Sea, Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar Hotell offers a spa, rooms with private balconies and free WiFi access. Båstad is just 15 minutes’ drive away. Each of Hotel Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar’s rooms has a private bathroom with shower. All include a refrigerator, a tea/coffee maker and an LCD TV with cable channels. The in-house restaurant offers local specialities and panoramic sea views. Guests can explore the cliffs, beaches and caves of the surrounding Hotell och Restaurang Hovs Hallar Nature Reserve. Treatments can be reserved at the on-site wellness centre.

name: Good Morning Karlstad City
description: This hotel is 8 minutes’ walk from Karlstad Central Station and 5 minutes’ drive from Lake Vänern. Early breakfast from 06:00 and rooms with flat-screen TVs and free WiFi access are offered. All the brightly decorated rooms at Good Morning Karlstad City have a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. A number of dishes are served in Good Morning Karlstad City’s lounge from 18:00 to 22:30. Light snacks and drinks are available at the bar at all times. The hotel is 4 km from Löfbergs Lila Arena.

name: Story Hotel Signalfabriken
description: This industrial-chic hotel is located in the Signalfabriken building, only a 10-minute walk to Solna Business Park. It is located next to Sundbyberg Station, which offers connections to Arlanda Airport and central Stockholm via buses, metro and trains. Story Hotel offers rooms with a 49-inch LED TV, free WiFi and private bathroom with rain shower and high quality toiletries. Additional amenities include laptop comfort pads and complimentary mineral water. Each room also features organic cotton linen. Grab a tasty burger at the in-house restaurant Phil's Burger or enjoy a drink at the bar. Additional restaurants, cafe and shopping are within walking distance. The Mall of Scandinavia and Friends Arena are just 10-minutes away by tram. Arlanda Airport is about 45-minutes away via the airport shuttle bus, while Stockholm Bromma Airport is just 2 km away from Story Hotel Signalfabriken.

name: Scandic Örnsköldsvik
description: This hotel is just 2 km from central Örnsköldsvik, Paradisbadet Water Park and Fjällräven Center. Guests enjoy free access to the gym, pool and sauna. Scandic Örnsköldsvik offers guests a free organic breakfast buffet and Wi-Fi internet access. All guest rooms have easy chairs, desks and satellite TV with movie channels. Scandic Örnsköldsvik serves Fairtrade coffee and also has a 24-hour shop. The in-house Bistro Höga Kust serves both local and international delicacies. The Lobby Bar offers snacks and drinks.

name: Scandic Mölndal
description: Situated less than 5 minutes’ walk from Mölndal Centrum Tram Stop, guests can reach Gothenburg’s city centre in 15 minutes by car or tram. This hotel offers free WiFi. Classic Scandinavian design with wooden floors and floor-to-ceiling windows are featured in each Scandic Mölndal guest room. Each bright room also has a TV, arm chair and work desk. The glass atrium provides a light and spacious lobby and dining area. Seasonal Swedish cuisine is served in Mölndal Scandic’s contemporary restaurant. Guests can enjoy a stylish bar indoors and an attractive terrace outdoors. Leisure facilities include free access to a gym and relaxation area with a sauna and hot tub. An indoor playroom has toys and games for children. Hotel staff will gladly recommend area activities and attractions, such as Gothenburg’s beautiful archipelago.

name: Rasta Hallandsåsen
description: This budget hotel is just off the E6, 10 minutes’ drive from Båstad. It offers free Wi-Fi and free private parking. All rooms have a TV and a private bathroom. Rasta Hallandsåsen’s rooms feature bright, Scandinavian-style décor and a seating area. The in-house restaurant serves traditional Swedish specialities, salads and light meals. The daily breakfast buffet includes freshly baked bread. Other facilities include a shop and a café. Rasta Hallandsåsen Hotel is 6 km from the Hallandsås Ridge. Ekereds Nature Reserve is 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Strand Hotell
description: This central family-run hotel lies next to the port canal, just 250 metres from Vänersborg Central Station. It offers good-value accommodation and a popular breakfast buffet. Wi-Fi is free in public areas. The functional guest rooms at Strand Hotell include cable TV and a private bathroom. Strand’s dining room offers canal views. In summer, guests can enjoy their breakfast on the terrace. The surrounding area has plenty of bars and restaurants. About 400 metres from Strand are a gym and a public indoor pool. Gothenburg is about 70 minutes’ drive.

name: Scandic Luleå
description: Just 1 km from Coop Arena and 10 minutes’ drive from Luleå Airport, this eco-friendly hotel offers free sauna, pool and gym access. Luleå Central Station and the city centre are 3 km away. All rooms at Scandic Luleå have a TV, desk and private bathroom with shower. Some rooms include tea/coffee facilities, bathrobes and movie channels. The in-house Norrport restaurant serves a daily breakfast buffet, weekday lunches and dinner from Monday to Saturday. Bicycle rentals can be arranged, and a body massage chair is also available. Måttsundsbacken Winter Sports Centre is 20 minutes’ drive from Scandic Luleå.

name: Hotell Hehrne
address: Dr Hehrnes Väg 1, 462 23 Vänersborg, Västra Götaland
description: With picturesque views of the River Göta, a wood-fired hot tub and a variety of leisure facilities, this Vänersborg hotel is found close to Lake Vänern. The hotel offers free WiFi and all rooms include a bathroom with a shower, cable TV and a writing desk. Spend a pleasant evening in Hotel Hehrne´s restaurant with panorama windows offering views of Göta River. The terrace features 2 hot tubs wich could be booked at the reception. Hehrne Hotel has peaceful gardens and is 15 minutes’ drive from Hunneberg Nature Reserve. Fishing licenses for the Göta River can also be arranged. Football, frisbee golf and basketball can be enjoyed on site. An outdoor gym is available and free access to a nearby gym is offered.

name: Scandic Karlskrona
description: This hotel is located by the water on Karlskrona’s largest island, Trossö. It offers free WiFi internet and free gym access. All rooms have wooden floors and a flat-screen TV. Scandic Karlskrona’s rooms come with cable TV channels, a private bathroom and complimentary toiletries. Facilities include a terrace and a restaurant that offers pleasant sea views. Bikes can be borrowed from reception. Scandic Karlskrona is 1 km from Karlskrona Central Station and 2 km from the Maritime Museum.

name: Hotell Drottninggatan 11
description: No description found

name: Nynäs Havsbad
description: This early 1900s property is in Nynäshamn, on Trehörningen Island. It offers spa treatments, panoramic sea views and fine dining. Stockholm city centre is just 45 minutes’ drive away. Nynäs Havsbad’s modern rooms have a TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Modern European cuisine made from seasonal, local produce is served in the restaurant. A set 3-course menu is offered Monday-Thursday, with à la carte options at weekends. The hotel offers pool and sauna facilities for an extra fee. Various treatments are offered at the on-site spa. In the wintertime, it is possible to take a dip in a hole in the ice. Free public parking spaces are found nearby. Nynäs Havsbad Hotel is 1.5 km from Nynäshamn Station, and Nynäshamn Ferry Terminal is within 5 minutes’ drive.

name: Best Western Hotel Botnia
description: The Best Western Hotel Botnia, offers 65 well-appointed rooms. All rooms include cable television with free movie channels, Internet access and non-smoking rooms. Complimentary evening food is available Sunday through Thursday. Pets are accepted for the extra fee of 250 SEK. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Nya Pallas Hotel
description: With a peaceful, yet central location in the coastal town of Falkenberg, Nya Pallas Hotel offers a lush garden. The rooms feature a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Hotel Nya Pallas include a writing desk and a seating area. Garden views, old-style furniture and beautiful paintings create a charming atmosphere in each room. Breakfast and light dishes are served in the elegant dining room. For relaxation, guests can book the sauna or visit the relaxation area. In addition, the on-site Västkusthälsan Spa offers a variety of face and body treatments.

name: Best Western Hotell Hudik
description: The Best Western Hotell Hudik in Hudiksvall. Our hotel is conveniently situated in the center of Hudiksvall within easy walking distance of restaurants, shopping, entertainment and railway/bus stations. Guests arriving by car can make use of our free parking facilities. The hotel offers 67 stylishly designed rooms, light and comfortable conference room as well as a mini gym with sauna. In the summer, guests are able to enjoy our outdoor pool. Our new lobby bar offers a light menu and a good selection of beverages in the evening. Welcome to Best Western.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Elmia
description: This hotel is found next to Elmia Exhibition Centre and Rosenlundsbadet Water Park, 10 minutes’ walk from the shores of Lake Vättern. Sauna, gym and guest bicycles are free. The bright rooms at Scandic Elmia feature wooden floors, modern décor and cable TV and free WiFi is offered throughout the building. The hotel restaurant serves a hearty breakfast buffet. Guests can enjoy an apéritif or after-dinner coffee in the bar. Neighboring area contains multi-sporting arenas such as tennis, bowling, paddle, curling, swimming, football, and ice hockey. Scandic Elmia offers free private parking on site, you need to register your car at check in. 10 minutes’ drive from Jönköping Central Station.

name: Arena Hotell
description: Opened in summer 2010, this hotel offers rooms and apartments just 10 minutes’ walk from Vänersborg Central Station. Guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi internet access. Best Western Arena Hotel’s guest rooms have cable TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All suites have a spa bath. Arena Hotel is about 300 metres from the nearest beach. Vänersborg Arena is 400 metres away.

name: Elite Hotel Mimer
description: Situated in the heart of Umeå, Elite Hotel Mimer faces the Twin Towns Park and the main commercial pedestrian street. Guests have free WiFi along with free access to a sauna and fitness centre. The hotel features an in-house restaurant as well as a bar. All hotel rooms feature a TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and room service is available. Nolia is 1.6 km from Elite Hotel Mimer, while Umeå Central Station is 800 metres away. The nearest airport is Umea Airport, 4.4 km from Elite Hotel Mimer.

name: Åre Torg Hotell
description: Set in Åre and with Åre Train Station reachable within 500 metres, Åre Torg Hotell offers a restaurant, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and ski-to-door access. 200 metres from Åre Torg, the property provides ski storage space. The hotel has a sauna and luggage storage space. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. At Åre Torg Hotell all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Åre, like hiking, skiing and cycling. The nearest airport is Åre Östersund Airport, 87 km from Åre Torg Hotell.

name: Strandpiren Hotell
description: Situated 1 km from the centre of Hudiksvall, Strandpiren Hotell features free WiFi access and free private parking. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Some units feature a seating area for your convenience. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. You will find luggage storage space at the property. Bicycles can be rented at the hotel, and the area is also popular for golfing.

name: Best Western Motala Stadshotell
description: The Best Western® Motala Stadshotell is a classic hotel situated in the heart of Motala, close to Lake Vattern, Gota Kanal and to Europe’s largest lake beach, Varamon. We are within walking distance from shopping, waterfront and guest harbor. Close by are also the golf courses of Motala and Vadstena. All rooms are non-smoking, and many of them have a fantastic view of the lake. We do not accept pets. Our multilingual and service minded staff will give you personalized service. On the ground floor you find our restaurant, the gastro pub Berggrens Öltapp & Mat. They also serve our large breakfast buffet, which is something we are especially proud of. The conference and gala floor previously housed Moala’s town hall. In the magnificent Anglasalen (Angel's Hall) everything from conferences, exhibitions and balls, to banquets and local reviews can be arranged, underneath the cut glass chandeliers. Come experience the charm of the Best Western® Motala Stadshotell!bestwestern.com

name: Comfort Hotel Solna
description: A welcoming experience awaits when you stay at our Comfort Hotel Solna located next to the Westfield Mall of Scandinavia, known as the second largest mall in the Nordic countries. You can also enjoy convenient access to the city train of Solna, Hagaparken, Friends Arena and restaurants within walking distance, including MAX Burgers, Noori and Pocket by Pontus. Our Solna hotel welcomes you with event space, a laundry facility and luggage room. All rates include full breakfast each morning. The hotel has a Barception with everything you need 24/7 from snacks to beer/wine and coffee. Stay connected with friends using free WiFi. Get in a calorie-burning workout in the 24-hour fitness center. Added perks include a large lobby with community tables and meeting and event space.Choice Hotels

name: Good Morning Mölndal
description: Good Morning Mölndal is 300 metres from Åby Race Track. The hotel has free parking and brightly decorated rooms with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Sisjö Golf Club is 2 km away. A work desk, hardwood floors and a bathroom with shower are standard features in all rooms at Good Morning Mölndal. Dishes like pork fillet, salmon and pasta are served at the bistro. Light meals, as well as hot and cold drinks, are offered in the hotel’s snack bar. Breakfast is served from 06:00. WiFi access is available throughout the hotel. The reception is open 24 hours. Gothenburg city centre is a 12-minute drive away. Liseberg Amusement Park is 6.5 km from the hotel.

name: Hotell Stortorget
address: Prästgatan 17 Bbq Garden, 831 31 Östersund, Jamtlands Lan
description: Set in Östersund and within less than 1 km of Mid Sweden University, Hotell Stortorget, Östersund features a bar, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is located 9.3 km from Östersund-Frösö GK. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The units feature a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near Hotell Stortorget, Östersund include Östersund Bus Station, Jamtli and Östersund Train Station. The nearest airport is Åre Östersund Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Nivå
description: Hotell Nivå is right across the street from Boden Central Station. Guests enjoy free WiFi and parking. Nivå Hotell offers functional guest rooms, all of which are equipped with a TV and private bathroom. General facilities at Hotell Nivå include a sauna. The surrounding mountains and rivers offers activities such as hiking and fishing, and the Björknäs recreational area is only a few minutes’ drive away.

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Norre Park
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Norre Park in Halmstad, SE near the University of Halmstad, Orjans Vall football stadium, the Halmstad Museum and Halmstad Castle. Amenities at our pet-friendly hotel include a free organic breakfast, wireless Internet access, a restaurant, a fitness center and more. All guest rooms have hair dryers, desks, TVs, irons and ironing boards. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues and explore all the best at Halmstad hotels like our Clarion Collection Hotel Norre Park. Pet charge: 200 kr per stay. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required.Choice Hotels

name: Quality Hotel Prisma
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Prisma in Skovde, SE near the Skara Sommarland amusement park, Lake Hornborga Nature Reserve, Lacko Castle and the University of Skovde. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, a restaurant, a sauna and free coffee. Guest rooms come with refrigerators, hair dryers, TVs and computer hook-ups. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Prisma. Book now. Both pet accommodations and local phone calls are available, please contact the hotel for more information. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties.Choice Hotels

name: Best Western Plus Skogshojd
description: With a stay at Scandic Skogshöjd, you'll be centrally located in Sodertalje, just a 4-minute walk from Torekallberget Open Air Museum and 10 minutes by foot from Tom Tits Experiment. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.Hotels.com

name: Good Morning+ Halmstad
description: Good Morning+ Halmstad is located 4 km from Halmstad Central Station and the Nissan River. It offers free WiFi and parking. All rooms have a satellite TV. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the morning and meals at the in-house restaurant. Other facilities include a relaxation area with a sauna and a gym. Located just off the road E6, this hotel is directly connected to Hallarna, Halmstad’s biggest shopping centre. Many golf clubs are located in the area, and Halmstad's long sandy beaches are just a short drive away. There are good local bus connections to the city centre and Tylösand beach, 14 km from the property.

name: Gylle Hotell & Restaurang Brödernas
description: Situated in Borlänge, 19 km from Falun Mine, Gylle Hotell & Restaurang Brödernas features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. 23 km from Lugnet Sports Centre and 33 km from Carl Larsson House, the property provides ski storage space, as well as a bar. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while selected rooms also boast a patio. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at Gylle Hotell & Restaurang Brödernas can enjoy a buffet or a continental breakfast. You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for hiking and skiing. The nearest airport is Borlange Airport, 6 km from Gylle Hotell & Restaurang Brödernas.

name: Scandic Star Sollentuna
description: Located beside Sollentuna Centrum shopping mall, this hotel is only a 15-minute train ride from central Stockholm. Guests enjoy free access to the relaxation area with pool, gym and sauna. Each spacious room at Scandic Star Sollentuna is decorated in warm colours and features a work desk and cable TV. Most rooms have a separate bedroom and living room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Hotel Scandic Sollentuna’s restaurant offers classic Scandinavian cuisine as well as international dishes. Afternoon coffee and evening cocktails can be enjoyed in the lotus shaped bar. For relaxation, guests can visit the on-site Star Spa and try a variety of face and body treatments, including massage, facial treatments and nail care. More active types will find walking and jogging trails nearby. Sollentuna Train Station is only 250 metres away, and Stockholm Arlanda Airport is reached within a 20-minute drive.

name: Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, Stockholm-Arlanda
address: Kabinvaegen 3, P O Box 103, 190 60 Arlanda, Stockholms Lan
description: Set in Arlanda, this modern hotel features valet parking, a 24-hour reception and an express check-in and check-out feature. Just moments from Stockholm-Arlanda Airport, it offers a stylish stay in a convenient location. Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel provides rooms equipped with converters/voltage adaptors, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. They provide an in-room safe, a laptop safe and a private bathroom. Those staying at Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel can sample international dishes at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay nearby for a meal. There are a variety of restaurants and cafés near Radisson Blu Arlandia Hotel, and Rosersberg is an easy car ride away.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Jönköping
description: The Comfort Hotel is centrally located in the heart of Jonkoping. The Jonkoping Airport and Jonkoping University are just minutes away. Visitors will enjoy touring the various local museums nearby, including the Match Museum, Munksjo Museum, Jonkopings lans Museum and the Husqvarna Fabriksmuseum. Enjoy hotel amenities like a restaurant and bar, free wireless Internet, free full breakfast, a sauna, to name a few. Guest rooms have mini bars, desks and hair dryers. Some rooms come with coffee makers and refrigerators. Come experience service with a smile.Choice Hotels

name: Hotell Rättvik
description: Situated in Rättvik, within 300 metres of Siljansbadet Beach and 9.2 km of Dalhalla Amphitheatre, Hotell Rättvik features accommodation with a bar and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Built in 1948, this 3-star hotel is within 48 km of Falun Mine and 29 km of Dala Horse Museum. The property is non-smoking and is located 37 km from Vasaloppet Museum. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Hotell Rättvik provides some rooms with city views, and the rooms have a kettle. The rooms have a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a continental or American breakfast. At Hotell Rättvik you will find a restaurant serving American cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Zorn Museum is 38 km from the hotel, while Lugnet Sports Centre is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Mora Airport, 47 km from Hotell Rättvik.

name: Landvetter Airport Hotel, BW Premier Collection
description: Looking for a place to stay in Landvetter? Then look no further than Landvetter Airport Hotel, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Landvetter to your doorstep. Rooms at Landvetter Airport Hotel provide a flat screen TV, a seating area, and a desk, and guests can stay connected with free Wi-Fi. In addition, while staying at Landvetter Airport Hotel guests have access to a 24-hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. You can also enjoy a fitness center and breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Landvetter Airport Hotel. We're sure you'll enjoy your stay at Landvetter Airport Hotel as you experience everything Landvetter has to offer.bestwestern.com

name: Good Morning Arlanda
description: Situated 1.5 km from Stockholm Arlanda Airport, this hotel offers breakfast for an additional cost from 04:00, free Wifi and a 24-hour free airport shuttle service in connection with arrival and departure. All the modern rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All the brightly decorated guest rooms at Good Morning Arlanda have wooden floors and a private bathroom with shower. Each room is equipped with a work desk. Nordic dishes are served at the on-site restaurant & bar. A snack menu is available at all times. Guests can enjoy drinks while watching sports events on the TV in the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout Good Morning Arlanda. Long term parking is possible on site. Arlandastad Golf Course is an 8-minute drive away. Stockholm city centre is a 30-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Elite Plaza Hotel, Örnsköldsvik
description: This central Örnsköldsvik hotel is situated at the Inner Harbour. It offers free Wi-Fi, an on-site British pub and a top-floor relaxation area with a gym and impressive views. Modern furnishings, wooden floors and a flat-screen TV with cable channels are provided in all Elite Plaza Örnsköldsvik rooms. Some feature a minibar and views over the harbour. On-site dining can be enjoyed at the Bishop's Arms pub and restaurant which also has a waterfront, outdoor terrace open during the summer. On Sundays, guests can enjoy Elite Örnsköldsvik's breakfast until 12:00 and check-out until 18:00, except during high season. Örnsköldsvik Central Station is about 5 minutes' walk away, while the E4 Motorway is just 400 metres away from the hotel.

name: Best Western Malmia Hotel
description: The Best Western Malmia Hotel is situated in the heart of the town of Skelleftea, right next to shopping, restaurants and other diversions all lying within easy walking distance. Our property offers a nice relaxation area with sauna and enjoy the evening sun on the balcony! We feature a complimentary full breakfast, restaurant, bar/lounge and our guest rooms offer cable television, dataports and hair dryer. Some rooms with balcony. Children under 12 may stay in parent's room at no extra charge. Dogs and small pets are welcome to stay. Parking available on request. We are able to help you obtain tickets to various venues, such as theatre, a football match or book a game of golf. Welcome to the Best Western Malmia Hotel where our personal service will ensure an enjoyable stay with us. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Princess Hotel
description: The Best Western Princess Hotel is located in the very city center of Norrkoping, near the shopping galleries, movie theatre, and many restaurants and pubs. The famous Concert and Congress Hall Louis de Geer is also nearby. The hotel has a very pleasant lobby and bar where lighter food dishes and all kinds of drinks are served. All guests are offered free coffee and biscuits in the lobby. One floor down from the lobby you find the cozy tapas restaurant La Uva. This is a perfect place to have a good meal or a drink in the evening. You also find a new fitness center and sauna in the hotel, free of charge for all hotel guests.bestwestern.com

name: Quality Hotel Vanersborg
description: Get more value for your hard-earned money at our pet-friendly Quality Hotel Vanersborg near the Gota Canal, Vanersborg Museet museum, Naturskola Nature Center and the Vanersborg Doll Studio and Museum. Our smoke-free hotel caters to your needs with amenities like free breakfast, free wireless Internet, a restaurant, an indoor pool, an exercise room and meeting space. Guest rooms come with desks and TVs. Get more value at our Quality Hotel Vanersborg. Book now. Children 12 and under stay free if sharing room with parents or grandparents when no additional bedding is required. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Gävle Väst
description: Set next to the river Gavleån and Motorway E4, this hotel provides free Wi-Fi and free access to gym, sauna and indoor pool. Central Gävle is 5 minutes’ drive away. The rooms at Scandic Gävle Väst feature bright, Scandinavian décor. All include a work desk and many also have a seating area. The in-house restaurant serves a varied seasonal à la carte menu as well as daily specials. Scandic Gävle Väst’s bar has a wide-screen TV and offers a selection of light dishes. Next to the restaurant is a playroom with toys, films and computer games. In addition, the hotel has a playground. Bicycles can be borrowed for free on site, and drinks, snacks and other amenities are available in Scandic’s lobby shop. Next to the hotel are free public parking spaces. Local buses stop nearby, and the ride to Central Station takes less than 15 minutes. Scandic Gävle Väst is certified as an environmentally friendly hotel.

name: Best Western Valhall Park Hotell
description: The Best Western Valhall Park Hotell is a family friendly hotel with a relaxing atmosphere surrounded by fruit trees, Copper Beech trees and historic sites from the bronze age, located in a beautiful and serene Angelholm. The hotel has 70 rooms, restaurant, bar, conference facilities and from June 2021 relax and spa and hotel gym. Our guests praise us for our high quality, locally sourced made from scratch food, where we focus on seasonal ingredients to enhance your culinary experience. The Bjare Peninsula and the countryside of Kulla offers a rich and accessible nature with its beaches, parks, hiking and biking trails, vineyards, local stores and farmers market, shopping, churches, and historical sites, some dated back to the bronze age. Valhall Park offers a peaceful environment where you can collect your thoughts, with its own walking and running paths, paddle lanes, as well as a gym and group exercise activities at Friskis & Svettis. The hotel is located close to the north Atlantic Ocean (1.5 kilometers), with long stretches of white sandy beaches by Skalderviken. The Kattegatt Trail offers excellent biking, walking, and running paths. The hotel has a unique location being close to the Angelholm-Helsinborg Airport, the E6 Interstate, and the train station Barkakra, connected to Halmstad and Helsingborg.bestwestern.com

name: Best Western Hotell Ett
description: No description found

name: Ten Hotel, BW Signature Collection
description: The Ten Hotel, BW Signature Collection is an effortless ecosystem of living comforts for smart and active people. From the expertly outfitted gym to the health-conscious cafe and restaurant and spacious common areas with co-working possibilities, here you can count on premium functionality at a reasonable price. And a good night's sleep, of course. Select from a range of flexible arrangements, from economy to a room with a connecting office. No matter which room you stay in, you can always count on the essential contemporary comforts. Like a great bed, lightning-fast Wi-Fi, and your very own balcony for refreshing moments in peace. Expertly outfitted by casall PRO and Matrix Fitness, the Ten Gym offers all you could desire in terms of strength, cardio, mobility, and recovery training.all in one spacious, playful, and state-of-the-art facility. Our Ten Restaurant is open Monday to Saturday from 5 p.m. We serve a great variety of international dishes. Or why not stop by after work to enjoy a refreshing drink in good company? The Ten Cafe offers a range of health-conscious and delicious options that fuel your activities and keep you feeling good. Start the day with a wholesome breakfast and a great cup of coffee. Meet up for lunch and feast on a salad, sandwich, or seasonal hot dish. Or why not stop by after work to enjoy a drink in good company? We have plenty of seating options and far-reaching views for your dining pleasure. With its warm and spacious interiors and versatile meeting points, our Ten Hotel, BW Signature Collection is the perfect place to gain clarity and energize new ideas. Enjoy our private conference and break-out rooms with flexible arrangements. Or expand your gathering to our common areas with endless possibilities for memorable dining and entertainment experiences or other group activities.the entire hotel is at your service!bestwestern.com

name: Holiday Club Åre
address: Are Strand Box 68, 830 13 Åre, Jamtlands Lan
description: Location This family-friendly Are hotel is located near the airport, within 1 mi (2 km) of Are Beach and Are Ski Resort. Are Cable Car and Are Old Church are also within 10 minutes. Åre Station is only a 4-minute walk. Room All rooms offer free WiFi and free wired Internet, plus room service and flat-screen TVs. Hair dryers, safes, and showers are among the other amenities that guests will find. Amenities Along with 2 restaurants, this smoke-free hotel has an indoor pool and an outdoor pool. Free buffet breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Additionally, a health club, a bar/lounge, and a coffee shop/café are onsite.WebBeds

name: Mountain Lodge
description: Located in Stöten, 35 km from Experium, Mountain Lodge provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. 35 km from Snötorget, the property offers a ski pass sales point, as well as ski-to-door access. The accommodation features room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The area is popular for skiing, and ski equipment hire is available at the hotel. The nearest airport is Scandinavian Mountains Airport, 18 km from Mountain Lodge.

name: Aurum Hotel
description: Situated next to the E4 highway in Skellefteå, Aurum Hotel offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and tastefully decorated rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs. Skellefteå city centre is 1.5 km away. All guest rooms at Aurum Hotel have beds by Lectus and a private bathroom with shower. Most rooms include a seating area. Guests have access to the relax area, featuring an indoor swimming pool, uni-sex sauna and hot tub. Massages can be booked at the in-house Daggdroppen Spa. Other facilities include a pool table and a mini golf course. A buffet breakfast is offered each morning. Refreshing drinks can be enjoyed in the bar. Boda Borg Family Entertainment Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Skellefteå Golf Club is 5 km away.

name: Best Western Hotel Anno 1937
description: The Best Western Hotel Anno 1937 is a small hotel with an at home feeling. We offer a relaxing and pleasant environment. Our 33 rooms include comfortable bedding, shower, toilet, telephone, complimentary cable television and all rooms are decorated with their own unique style. After a good night sleep you will enjoy our fabulous breakfast buffet served in the dining room including 24 hour room service. Throughout the hotel is a non-smoking policy. Best Western Hotel Anno is centrally located in a charming centenary building with parking available onsite. Guests will enjoy nearby shops, restaurants, pubs, cinemas and other entertainment. Other entertainment within a short distance include five golf courses and just 15 minutes from the city visit our sommercity, Ahus, with fine beaches, shops, restaurants and local designer shops.bestwestern.com

name: Scandic Uplandia
description: Located less than a 10-minute stroll from Uppsala Central Station, Scandic Hotel Uplandia provides guests with an ideal base while in Uppsala. It is situated a brief walk from the Gustavianum, the Linnaean Garden and Uppsala Cathedral. This 3-star hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a coffee bar and a sauna. Reception operates 24/7 and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. There are also a number of rooms available for families. Scandic Uplandia houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood features a number of bars and restaurants serving a choice of varied cuisines. Scandic Uplandia Hotel Uppsala is also located near the area's popular restaurants and bars, plus Newman Institute for Catholic Studies is within walking distance. Guests can also visit Uppsala Castle and the Carolina Rediviva.Revato

name: First Hotel Örebro
description: First Hotel Örebro is housed in an Art Nouveau building, 500 metres from Örebro Central Station and 5 minutes’ walk from Örebro Castle. Free WiFi is avaialble. All guest rooms at Örebro First Hotel have an armchair, a work desk and cable TV. All room offer a flat-screen TV and a seating area. The Svartån River is only a few minutes’ walk away, and a rich variety of shops and restaurants are found just around the corner.

name: Hotel Bishops Arms Piteå
description: This hotel is right on Piteå’s main street, Storgatan, and is 650 metres from Piteå Bus station. It offers free WiFi, along with the on-site restaurant and pub, Bishops Arms. The modern rooms at Hotel Bishops Arms Piteå features a TV, desk and armchair. The private bathroom comes with a shower. A safety deposit box and electric kettle can also be found in each room. Bishops Arms Piteå is 2.2 km from Piteå Golf Club, while Pite Havsbad is within 15 minutes’ drive. Luleå Airport is 55 km away.

name: Knistad Herrgård
description: This hotel is set in the tranquil Skövde countryside, on the premises of Knistad Golf & Country Club. It offers free WiFi, a sauna and restaurant with bar. Skövde city centre is a 10-minute drive away. A TV and tea/coffee facilities are provided in each guest room, as well as views of the golf course. The bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. Guests can enjoy free use of bicycles at Knistad Hotell. Other on-site activities include golf, team building and wine tasting in the wine cellar. Lake Vättern is 30 minutes' drive away, while Skara Sommarland Amusement Park is 30 km away.

name: Best Western Gustaf Wasa Hotel
description: Welcome to the Best Western Gustaf Wasa Hotel, Borlange's leading hotel best known for quality accommodations and prize winning architecture. Our hotel is located in the heart of Borlange's business district neighboring some of Sweden's largest corporations within the steel, railway and highway sectors. We are also located in the famous tourist region of Dalecarlia which includes other attractions such as Romme Alpin Ski Centre, Falu Copper Mine and Carl Larsson. Our warm professional staff and personal charm will make you feel right at home!bestwestern.com

name: Sure Hotel by Best Western Focus
description: Centrally located in Örnsköldsvik, this comfortable hotel offers a sauna with relax area. The city’s main shopping area and restaurants are right around the corner. Fjällräven Event Centre is 900 metres away. Free parking is available. Rooms at Sure Hotel by Best Western Focus have an electric kettle and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. The private bathroom has a shower. Free WiFi is available. Additional services on site include a free fitness centre and a communal terrace. Paradiset Spa and Adventure Bath is 200 metres from Sure Hotel. Car owners can borrow engine heaters from the hotel.
